Champion Select.Annie_Select: "You wanna play too? It'll be fun!"

Movement.Annie.move8: "Come out, come out, wherever you are!"

Taunt.Annie.taunt2: "You can't come to Tibbers' tea party! Bleh!"

Champion Select.Olaf.taunt: "C'mon, I won't hurt you. I promise!"

Taunt.Olaf.taunt: "C'mon, I won't hurt you. I promise!"

Joke.Olaf.joke: "The worth of a man can be measured by the length of his beard, and the girth of his belt buckle."

Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start01: "You know what's hard about fighting? Nothing! Come on, I'm made of stone."
Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start02: "I've got a high tolerance for magic. Takes a lot for me to feel it."
Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start03: "As a symbol of this great nation, I say... let's go mess up some mages!"
Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start04: "Know of any battles? Just looking to get my wings dirty."
Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start05: "People are funny. They pass beneath me doing the same thing day after day."
Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start06: "I'd like to apologize in advance for ruining this place."
Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start07: "Let someone else be a statue, I got stuff to do."
Upon Starting a Game.Galio.start08: "I don't wake up 'til its time to squash something and I'm awake right now."

Attacking.Galio.attack02: "So... what do you people do when you're not fighting?"
Attacking.Galio.attack15: "We don't have to fight. Let's do though!"
Attacking.Galio.attackTower05: "There is only room for one of us."
Attacking.Galio.attackBlueSentinel02: "You're a sentinel? I'm a sentinel! We should fight!"
Attacking.Galio.attackBlueSentinel03: "It's like a weaker version of me."
Attacking.Galio.attackBlueSentinel04: "Let us make violence, fellow rock man!"
Attacking.Galio.attackDragon02: "Hello beautiful, what are you doing here?"
Attacking.Galio.attackBaron02: "Now this will be a fight for the ages."
Attacking.Galio.attackBaron03: "Yes... now that's a fellow I can punch!"

Movement.Galio.move01: "Ahh, feels good to stretch my wings."
Movement.Galio.move02: "I didn't choose to come to life, but I definitely prefer it."
Movement.Galio.move03: "I've seen much, not sure I understand it but... it... it happened."
Movement.Galio.move04: "Hahaha, majestic? Is that what I'm supposed to be?"
Movement.Galio.move05: "I might be made of stone, but that doesn't mean my heart is."
Movement.Galio.move06: "I wish mountains had fists - that'd be a good fight."
Movement.Galio.move07: "Hmm, must be some powerful magic around here."
Movement.Galio.move08: "Somehow I always end up in the center of everything."
Movement.Galio.move09: "The guy that made me, he was pretty good right?"
Movement.Galio.move10: "Tragedy is worse when you can do nothing about it."
Movement.Galio.move11: "I wish they'd chisel me a friend. Someone who won't break!"
Movement.Galio.move12: "I know, it's completely unfair. I didn't ask to be this impressive."
Movement.Galio.move13: "I always wonder what lies beyond this land. Something to fight, I hope."
Movement.Galio.move14: "I am not going back on the pedestal, not yet... "
Movement.Galio.move15: "They made me to stop magic, and yet I hate when it's gone."
Movement.Galio.move16: "I sleep, I wake, I break things"
Movement.Galio.move17: "Whoa, I didn't know I had a tail!"
Movement.Galio.move18: "Do I get to crush that? Oh, please say yes!"
Movement.Galio.move19: "I don't know why life chose me, but I'm glad it did."
Movement.Galio.move20: "I'm supposed to be a symbol. Of what, I'm not so sure."
Movement.Galio.move21: "It's hard to be a symbol, when you've got a soul."
Movement.Galio.move22: "Let's move! I've got people to inspire!"
Movement.Galio.move23: "It's not easy when everyone looks up to you."
Movement.Galio.move24: "Can someone please get the pigeons out of my head?"
Movement.Galio.move25: "Ah, mages. I love the way they squish."
Movement.Galio.move27: "I fought a house once. I'm pretty sure I won."
Movement.Galio.move28: "People vanish! And new ones take their places! It must be magic."
Movement.Galio.move30: "The best defense is a good magic absorbing colossus."
Movement.Galio.move31: "I love walking, it sounds like thunder!"
Movement.Galio.move32: "Ah, the world, it goes by in a flash."
Movement.Galio.move33: "It's time to move! Shake off the moss."
Movement.Galio.move34: "I'm going, you try moving three hundred tons."
Movement.Galio.move35: "They just don't make doorways big enough."
Movement.Galio.move39: "They say I'm all made of petricite, I say I'm all guts!"
Movement.Galio.move40: "I fell in love with a crag-beast once. Oh... wasn't meant to be."
Movement.Galio.move41: "I haven't been to many places, so I might as well like this one."
Movement.Galio.move45: "I'm a big man, with big needs."
Movement.Galio.move47: "I love Demacia! It's the only place I've been."
Movement.Galio.move49: "Apparently I'm some sort of big deal."
Movement.Galio.move51: "Excuse me, but... which king are we on now?"
Movement.Galio.moveNexus01: "Greetings, giant glowing mineral! I must break you."
Movement.Galio.moveNexus02: "Ooh, a giant crystal? I'll fight it."

Joke.Galio.joke01: "My middle name is Justice. Galio Justice Justice."
Joke.Galio.joke02: "I came to chew bubblegum and kick butt, and I'm all out of butt."

Taunt.Galio.taunt01: "I'm sorry, I just woke up. Were we fighting?"
Taunt.Galio.taunt02: "Hey, you. Don't mess with Demacia, I saw you thinking about it."
Taunt.Galio.taunt03: "Didn't I fight you yesterday, or was that a different puny thing?"
Taunt.Galio.tauntJarvanIV01: "You're a Jarvan? I swear, I've met at least three others."
Taunt.Galio.tauntAlly01: "Would you like to ride on my massive shoulder?"
Taunt.Galio.tauntLux01: "You. Young girl person. Can you stay and accompany me wherever I go?"
Taunt.Galio.tauntPoppy01: "I like you, small blue thing. You're the one who doesn't change."
Taunt.Galio.interactionTauntPoppy01: "Gargoyle? No, I'm more of a magic-nullifying colossus."
Taunt.Galio.tauntYordle01: "Looks like I'll have to punch down. Hmph. Way down."
Taunt.Galio.tauntYordle02: "I don't fight small things. Come back with something bigger and meaner."
Taunt.Galio.tauntSion01: "Hahaha! Ours would be a fight for the ages! They'd find pieces of us for miles around!"
Taunt.Galio.tauntUrgot01: "You look horrid! I should give you the name of my sculptor."
Taunt.Galio.tauntAurelionSol01: "You're from space, huh? I'd fight space. Bring it on!"
Taunt.Galio.tauntChoGath01: "Hey, World Eater, I've got something you can snack on. It's my fist!"
Taunt.Galio.tauntIllaoi01: "Summon your god, painted priestess, and we'll see who's mightier."
Taunt.Galio.tauntMalphite01: "Hm. How strange. No-one bothered to sculpt you?"
Taunt.Galio.tauntNautilus01: "So, what's it like living underwater? Fought any whales?"
Taunt.Galio.tauntRekSai01: "Back to your hole, giant crawly worm."
Taunt.Galio.tauntVolibear01: "Do not raise your claws at me, furry growly man."
Taunt.Galio.tauntZac01: "What awful material were you sculpted from?"
Taunt.Galio.interactionTauntEnemy01: "Climb up here and say that my face."
Taunt.Galio.interactionTauntEnemy02: "You speak a lot, loud talky thing."
Taunt.Galio.interactionTauntEnemy03: "Hmph. Good thing I don't have ears."

Upon Buying an Item.Galio.item03: "I don't know what this is. I bet it's great though!"
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemClothArmor01: "Can I exchange this for a size seven-thousand?"
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemClothArmor02: "Hmm... it doesn't fit. Well, guess I'll just hold it."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemClothArmor03: "Armour, kinda makes you feel like you're made of stone."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemClothArmor04: "Cloth will protect my rock hard skin!"
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemAmplifyingTome01: "Eh, never been much of a reader."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemAmplifyingTome03: "A book! Oh, just need someone to turn the pages for me."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemGlacialShroud02: "From the frozen loom! Whatever that is."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemIcebornGauntlet02: "So cold, yet it makes me feel all warm inside."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemRodofAges03: "This is perfect! I too am very old."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemHextechProtobelt0101: "Might need to loosen that a few hundred notches."
Upon Buying an Item.Galio.itemHextechProtobelt0104: "I know, I'll wear it as a ring!"

Upon Casting Recall.Galio.recall01: "Oh, I hate to miss out on the action... "
Upon Casting Recall.Galio.recall02: "Everyone stay put, I'll be right back."

Upon Death.Galio.respawn04: "Well, we lost that one. Let's go fight something else!"
Upon Death.Galio.respawn05: "What happened? Was it a frost troll again?"

Joke.TwistedFate.joke1: "Never lost a fair game... or played one."
Joke.TwistedFate.joke2: "Cheater's just a fancy word for winner."

Taunt.TwistedFate.taunt1: "Only two Jokers in the deck, and I get dealt you."
Taunt.TwistedFate.taunt2: "Only a fool plays the hand he's dealt."

Attacking.XinZhao.attack6: "Here's a tip, and a spear behind it!"

Taunt.XinZhao.taunt: "I may be outnumbered, but not even the odds can stand against me!"

Joke.XinZhao.joke: "Find me an immovable object, and I'll put this question to rest!"

Champion Select.Urgot_Select_new: "You cannot know strength... Until you are broken."
Champion Select.Urgot_Ban: "Cling to hope... it is all you have."

Upon starting a game.Urgot.start1: "If they could only comprehend the truth of the Dredge... I wouldn't need to drive it into their skulls."
Upon starting a game.Urgot.start2: "Enjoy this final moment... before your trial begins."
Upon starting a game.Urgot.start3: "It is time... for them to die."
Upon starting a game.Urgot.start4: "Controlling them will be simple... with my hand around their throats."

Attacking.UrgotClassic_002: "What will you do to survive? Tell me!"
Attacking.UrgotClassic_005: "The fortunate will be the first to fall."
Attacking.UrgotClassic_006: "The barons are not your masters - fear is."
Attacking.UrgotClassic_008: "Hahaha... Is that crying I hear? Or are you mewling?"
Attacking.UrgotClassic_009: "They put me in chains. They gave me my weapon."
Attacking.UrgotClassic_010: "You cannot rule what I have turned to ash!"
Attacking.UrgotClassic_015: "What didn't kill me, will kill you!"
Attacking.UrgotClassic_016: "Your cries will give voice to chaos."
Attacking.UrgotClassic_020: "You listen to my words, while my weapons speak!"
Attacking.UrgotClassic_025: "You will thank me, between the screams."
Attacking.UrgotClassic_029: "Feel this. The pain will prove useful later."

Movement.UrgotClassic_067: "A city, choking in the chembaron's grasp."
Movement.UrgotClassic_069: "I want to see their faces when I tear their hope away."
Movement.UrgotClassic_070: "Few will endure the chaos to come."
Movement.UrgotClassic_071: "Their future is carved into my flesh."
Movement.UrgotClassic_072: "I was not reborn in the depths. I merely refused to die."
Movement.UrgotClassic_074: "If they do not stop me, they will die. It is just that simple."
Movement.UrgotClassic_075: "Zaun will be redeemed... in the flames."
Movement.UrgotClassic_076: "If you hide in the shadows, you are only drawing me home."
Movement.UrgotClassic_078: "Cast into a pit of despair, I climbed out on the corpses."
Movement.UrgotClassic_079: "I answer to no one. No matter how loudly they beg."
Movement.UrgotClassic_080: "Where will they run when the whole city burns?"
Movement.UrgotClassic_083: "I will guide you to a new age, born of destruction."
Movement.UrgotClassic_085: "I am stronger than man, stronger than machine, I am an idea."
Movement.UrgotClassic_091: "This is the only truth that matters: a weapon aimed at your head."
Movement.UrgotClassic_092: "I am the very definition of a self-made man."
Movement.UrgotClassic_093: "We will rise from the rubble, stronger than before."
Movement.UrgotClassic_094: "Only those who survive this city deserve it."
Movement.UrgotClassic_095: "Think how much stronger they'll be... if they live."
Movement.UrgotClassic_096: "Tear their weakness away, and nothing is left!"

Taunt.UrgotClassic_122: "What is strength if you do not use it?"
Taunt.UrgotClassic_124: "It is not violence. It is... philosophy."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntZaun1: "Think of all that you have survived."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntZaun3: "Zaun welcomed me with open arms... and a knife to my back."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntAhri: "Do you think me so weak as to fall for your charms?"
Taunt.Urgot.tauntCamille1: "My, my. What have they been up to in Piltover?"
Taunt.Urgot.tauntCamille2: "I must admit, I have a thing for... legs."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntDarius: "The hand of Noxus can be cut off; ask your master."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntEvelynn: "If you feed on pain, I welcome you to the feast."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntFiddlesticks: "Give me a reason to fear you."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntIrelia: "You defeated Noxus. For that, I will make this quick."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntJanna: "I heard you like to give hugs."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntJinx: "The city calls for chaos. She is but the first to answer."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntKatarina1: "Where do your loyalties lie? I will bury you next to them."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntKatarina2: "I hope your father begged when Swain betrayed him."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntKled: "This is not your land, and that lizard doesn't even like you."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntRenekton: "Let the rage carry you... into my chains."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntRengar: "You respect strength. Good. Then you understand."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntRiven: "Noxus failed you... when it did not punish your betrayal!"
Taunt.Urgot.tauntShen: "Caught between two worlds? I'll drag you out of both."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntSoraka: "You've felt my pain. Now feel yours."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntSwain: "I will not kneel to a deceiver."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntTahmKench: "Your coat isn't even as nice as mine."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntTeemo: "Compared to what you do, this is merciful."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntTwitch: "Don't be greedy, there's enough pain for all of us."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntVi2: "The only thing you enforce is limitations."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntXinZhao: "You can die beside them, but you will never be a Demacian."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntZac1: "You were made to be a weapon. Embrace it."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntResponseDiana: "No, please, tell me about your religion."
Taunt.Urgot.tauntResponseEkko: "That is what I want you to think."
Taunt.Urgot.jokeResponseKarthus: "But I still have so much to kill for."

Joke.Urgot.joke02: "Hold on... there's something... ah, that's better."

Upon tagging an enemy with Fear Beyond.Urgot.tagCaitlyn: "Keep struggling. Maybe you can save your hat."
Upon tagging an enemy with Fear Beyond.Urgot.tagDarius: "Scream louder, I want Swain to hear it!"
Upon tagging an enemy with Fear Beyond.Urgot.tagGangplank: "Think of all the innocent barrels I'm saving."
Upon tagging an enemy with Fear Beyond.Urgot.tagLucian: "She'll never escape, and neither will you."

Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeBilgewater: "You'd think a nation of pirates would never bow."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeDarkin: "I am all the weapon I need."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeMountTargon: "The stars are too far away to help you."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeVastaya: "In the depths, we are all animals."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeVoid: "The Void may learn, but not quickly enough."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeAmumu: "No one will shed a tear. That is why you cry."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeAnnie: "What kind of monster would kill a child? Oh... right."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeBraum: "Those who stand behind you will share your fate."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeCamille: "I considered you my equal. I was wrong."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeEkko: "Your friends are the chain you could not break."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeGalio: "Hmph. I thought you would be bigger."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeGnar: "I don't know what he said, but he screamed it."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeIllaoi: "Of all the people to fail a test."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeJhin: "I never saw the beauty in death... until now."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeKassadin: "A father should be with his  daughter."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeLeBlanc: "Every one of you, as dead as the last."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeMalphite: "I had my fill of stones in the Dredge."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeMissFortune: "You finally live up to your name."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeOlaf: "As the bones foretold: a quiet, peaceful death!"
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executePantheon: "You died the moment you let a god control you."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executePoppy: "You were the hero. Now you're dead."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeQuinn: "I'm sure Valor will swoop down any second..."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeRyze: "Don't worry, I'll take care of those runes."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeSion: "Ah, Sion. You were already dead to me."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeSwain2: "You've betrayed me for the last time!"
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeTrundle: "You bargained away your freedom... for a frozen stick."
Upon executing an enemy with Fear Beyon.Urgot.executeVi: "You could have been so much more."

Scoring Kills and Objectives.Urgot.kill02: "Raise them up on chains. Zaun will see my message."

Upon Enemy Champion using a Health Poti.UrgotClassic_101: "Did you think that would save you?"

Upon enemy champion recalling.UrgotClassic_106: "You try to flee, not realizing... you are in chains."

Upon casting Recall.UrgotClassic_102: "Gather your strength. Soon, I will take it."

Champion Select.LeBlanc_Select: "The Black Rose shall bloom once more."

Taunt.LeBlanc.taunt: "For a moment I thought I'd broken a sweat."

Joke.LeBlanc.joke1: "For my next trick I'll make their life bar disappear."
Joke.LeBlanc.joke2: "Lying is, like, ninety five percent of what I do."

Movement.Vladimir.move10: "I love a warrior with heart, never a stale moment."

Taunt.Vladimir.taunt: "You look like someone who's got a lot going on beneath the surface."

Joke.Vladimir.joke: "Go ahead, be negative. You'll be just my type."

Taunt.Fiddlesticks.taunt: "I think I'll let you suffer for a while... "

Joke.Fiddlesticks.joke: "I haven't got a brain, and soon... neither will you!"

Taunt.Kayle.taunt: "Come here! I'll teach you all about the afterlife."

Joke.Kayle.joke: "Are... you sure you're not in the wrong league?"

Movement.MasterYi.move10: "The focused mind can pierce through stone."
Movement.MasterYi.move11: "Do not let your pride blind you."
Movement.MasterYi.move15: "A true master is an eternal student."

Taunt.MasterYi.taunt02: "You wish to learn the hard way, I see."
Taunt.MasterYi.taunt03: "I will take an eye... heh, as if I don't have enough already."
Taunt.MasterYi.interaction01: "Pupil, show me what you have learned."

Taunt.Alistar.taunt: "Mess with the bull and you get the horns!"

Upon Starting a Game.Ryze.start02: "The things I've seen in the dark corners of Runeterra are better left unseen."
Upon Starting a Game.Ryze.start03: "Things to do today: find food, build shelter, fix the world."
Upon Starting a Game.Ryze.start05: "Can we make this quick? I have some place to be!"
Upon Starting a Game.Ryze.start06: "If I sound rude, it's because I've got a world to save."

Movement.Ryze.move01: "These runes are not for eyes such as yours."
Movement.Ryze.move02: "They know so little of the world they traverse."
Movement.Ryze.move04: "I work alone. Company weighs me down."
Movement.Ryze.move05: "What's on my back? That's not your concern."
Movement.Ryze.move07: "Every rune I find is another day we live."
Movement.Ryze.move09: "They have forgotten the fires that forged this world."
Movement.Ryze.move10: "You know what I could use? An ale."
Movement.Ryze.move11: "They want to read my scroll. It'll be the last thing they read."
Movement.Ryze.move12: "I could tell you what's on this scroll, but then I'd have to obliterate you."
Movement.Ryze.move14: "I dream in nightmares of the past."
Movement.Ryze.move15: "None are worthy of my task... even me."
Movement.Ryze.move16: "Everyone is doomed to repeat history. That's where I come in."
Movement.Ryze.move18: "I may fail, but I won't quit."
Movement.Ryze.move19: "Trust no-one, especially those who seek power."
Movement.Ryze.move20: "Just once I'd like a good night's sleep."
Movement.Ryze.move21: "Their minds couldn't handle what my eyes have seen."
Movement.Ryze.move22: "I care about these mortals. That's why I keep them at arm's length."
Movement.Ryze.move23: "In an instant, all could be gone."
Movement.Ryze.move24: "I long for the day when this is all over."
Movement.Ryze.move26: "Everyone wants to chat when you're busy saving the world."
Movement.Ryze.move28: "You know what I miss? Standing still."
Movement.Ryze.move29: "All that binds this world is will."
Movement.Ryze.move30: "Magic dooms us... but perhaps it can save us."
Movement.Ryze.move33: "One can only hold all this power for so long."
Movement.Ryze.move34: "If I had a rune for every mile I've run, I'd be done running."
Movement.Ryze.move35: "You want to help? Get out of the way."
Movement.Ryze.move36: "I remember when only one world weighed on my shoulders."
Movement.Ryze.move37: "When I've found them all, I'll fade away."
Movement.Ryze.move38: "If I fall, the scroll must be destroyed."
Movement.Ryze.move39: "I fight so they don't have to."
Movement.Ryze.move43: "My story? That would take ages to tell."
Movement.Ryze.move44: "Consider yourself lucky for the days you have."
Movement.Ryze.move46: "Fast and lean, that's how I travel."
Movement.Ryze.move47: "Ah, civilization. I remember when I was a part of it."
Movement.Ryze.move50: "All this would be so much easier if I didn't give a damn."

Taunt.Ryze.taunt01: "Hm. I'm hunted by things far worse than you."
Taunt.Ryze.taunt02: "I'm no doctor, but I think there's a spell for what you have."
Taunt.Ryze.taunt03: "To be ignorant is to be free. You must be very free."
Taunt.Ryze.taunt04: "If I had a tattoo that looked like you, I'd get it removed."
Taunt.Ryze.taunt05: "There's gonna be two sounds - me hitting you, and you disintegrating."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntNoxian01: "You wage your petty war, Noxian, but the real war is yet to come."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntYordle01: "Even your kind will know death in the cataclysm."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntAhri01: "Your charms are impressive, but I'm not into forest creatures."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntAnnie01: "Run along, child, this tome is not a bedtime story."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntAurelionSol01: "Space called, it wants its arrogant jerk back."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntBard01: "I don't suppose you'd want to get off your magical rear and help me save this world."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntDrMundo01: "I have a hard time believing you went to medical school."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntGraves01: "I would chide you for your idiocy, but you seem pretty proud of it."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntIllaoi01: "Nice tattoos, do they conduct runic energy? No? Oh, that's too bad."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntLux01: "Magic is more than sunshine and rainbows, girl."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntMalzahar01: "Hey, you're the one who summons bloodthirsty Void creatures, right? Yeah, brilliant work, good thinking."
Taunt.Ryze.tauntTwistedFate01: "Nice card trick, do you do birthday parties?"
Taunt.Ryze.tauntXerath01: "That remarkable arcane energy doesn't run through your entire body, does it?"
Taunt.Ryze.interactionTauntEnemy01: "We'll see how smart your mouth is when the world collapses."
Taunt.Ryze.interactionTauntEnemy02: "I'm surprised you can string enough words together for that one. You need a break?"
Taunt.Ryze.interactionTauntEnemy03: "So that's what you people do with your spare time."
Taunt.Ryze.interactionTauntEnemy04: "Not going to dignify that with a response."
Taunt.Ryze.interactionTauntEnemy05: "You should read more, expand your vocabulary."

Joke.Ryze.joke01: "What? You want to see a magic trick? Fine... tada."
Joke.Ryze.joke02: "Okay, fine, here's a magic trick. Tada."

Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.itemTearOfTheGoddess03: "I remember when such tears were shed."
Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.itemVoidStaff02: "I'd destroy it - if I didn't need it."
Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.itemVoidStaff03: "Such a weapon must be treated with respect."
Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.itemAbyssalMask02: "Many lives it's taken, and many souls."
Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.itemMorellonomicon02: "Not a book for the faint of heart."
Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.itemMorellonomicon03: "A sordid relic from a brutal time."
Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.itemRabadonsDeathcap02: "A hat with a face, huh? Sure, why not?"
Upon Buying an Item.Ryze.shopExit01: "I thought that guy would never stop talking."

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Ryze.spreeKillingSpree01: "That's what happens when you piss off an archmage!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Ryze.spreeKillingSpree02: "Better a few perish than the entire world."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Ryze.spreeKillingSpree03: "I tried to warn them, I really did."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Ryze.spreeKillingSpree04: "They make the same mistakes again and again."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Ryze.spreeKillingSpree05: "Too many have met the same fate."

Upon Placing a Ward.Ryze.ward03: "If I can see it, I can beat it."

Upon Casting Recall.Ryze.recall01: "A pause in the chaos. Let's make it count."
Upon Casting Recall.Ryze.recall03: "I'm not running away. I'm running at you the long way around."
Upon Casting Recall.Ryze.recall05: "Time to reflect on what we have learned."

Upon Death.Ryze.respawn01: "Thank the gods, the world's still here."
Upon Death.Ryze.respawn02: "A stupid mistake, one I won't make again."
Upon Death.Ryze.respawn03: "I still live, but for how much longer?"
Upon Death.Ryze.respawn04: "Let's try again, and this time do it right."

Attacking.Sion.attack12: "I'll use their bones to pick my teeth."
Attacking.Sion.attack17: "I'll rip your head from your spine!"
Attacking.Sion.attack21: "I'll drown you in your own blood!"
Attacking.Sion.attack22: "I'll rip the meat from your bones!"
Attacking.Sion.attack27: "I'll whet my axe on your bones!"
Attacking.Sion.kill04: "I'll make a mountain of the dead!"

Movement.Sion.move25: "Our drums will drown out their screams."

Joke.Sion.joke01: "I had a funny bone, then I crushed it. Laugh, worm!"
Joke.Sion.joke02: "The mewling of your orphan children amuses me! How's that for funny?"
Joke.Sion.joke04: "Your puny body is the only joke here."
Joke.Sion.joke05: "Your... puny body is the only joke here."
Joke.Sion.jokeJarvan01: "You look just like your ancestor: dead!"
Joke.Sion.jokeJarvan03: "Four Jarvans, and you're all still failures! That is funny."
Joke.Sion.jokeUrgot01: "Why don't I have coverage for prosthetics?"
Joke.Sion.jokeUrgot02: "So, uh, Urgot. We can't hang out any more. I'm cool now."

Taunt.Sion.taunt03: "Your bones will pave my road to glory!"
Taunt.Sion.taunt04: "More grist for the mill of war!"
Taunt.Sion.taunt05: "Your snapping bones are music to my ears!"
Taunt.Sion.taunt06: "I don't care what your name is!"
Taunt.Sion.tauntGalio01: "I know you... I want to remember killing you!"
Taunt.Sion.tauntGalio03: "One of us will finally die today!"
Taunt.Sion.tauntGalio04: "We've clashed a thousand times... no more!"
Taunt.Sion.tauntJarvan01: "I killed you once... I'll kill you again!"
Taunt.Sion.tauntJarvan02: "I'll plant that banner in your corpse!"
Taunt.Sion.tauntJarvan04: "Today, we'll see if ghosts can bleed."
Taunt.Sion.tauntPantheon01: "You will be privileged to die... under my boot!"
Taunt.Sion.tauntSwain03: "You are weak, Swain! You are no leader!"

Upon Buying an Item.Sion.item02: "I will drench it in their blood."
Upon Buying an Item.Sion.item06: "Hand it over before I kill you."
Upon Buying an Item.Sion.itemBotRK01: "This is not the first dead king's weapon I've taken."
Upon Buying an Item.Sion.itemBoots01: "These will wade through the blood of thousands."
Upon Buying an Item.Sion.itemFrozenHeart02: "Do you feel a shiver down your spine?"
Upon Buying an Item.Sion.itemFrozenMallet01: "I'll shatter the gates of Demacia with this hammer!"
Upon Buying an Item.Sion.itemWarmogs01: "This was made for war, as am I!"
Upon Buying an Item.Sion.itemWarmogs02: "This is the only fortress I need!"

Upon Placing a Ward.Sion.ward02: "Let them sneak, then let them die."

Uncategorized.Sion.unknown01: "This is the ground you'll die on!"
Uncategorized.Sion.moveInnate02: "Blood... on my... hands! This I remember!"
Uncategorized.Sion.moveInnate03: "I do not tire! I do not bleed!"

Champion Select.Sivir_Select: "I always take my toll - blood, or gold."

Movement.Sivir.move02: "I'll fight for a cause. I won't die for one."
Movement.Sivir.move03: "Kings come and go, but gold stays."
Movement.Sivir.move09: "Laws are whatever works at the time."
Movement.Sivir.move12: "The only thing I look up to is the sky."
Movement.Sivir.move13: "Honor is the rust on a dull blade."
Movement.Sivir.move14: "You've got a problem, I've got a price."
Movement.Sivir.move15: "I've got values - they stack up nicely."

Attacking.Sivir.attack06: "Don't get between me and my gold."

Joke.Sivir.joke02: "They say the desert is a cruel mistress. I like the sound of that."

Taunt.Sivir.taunt01: "You can't take it with you, so give it to me."
Taunt.Sivir.tauntAzir01: "Alright Azir, let's put your ascension to work."
Taunt.Sivir.tauntAzir02: "Looks like trouble runs in the family, eh Azir?"
Taunt.Sivir.Cassiopeiataunt01: "You always were a snake. Now you look the part."
Taunt.Sivir.Cassiopeiataunt02: "Your inner beauty really shines through, Cassiopeia."
Taunt.Sivir.Cassiopeiataunt03: "Oh, look. I'm about to step on a snake."
Taunt.Sivir.Cassiopeiataunt04: "That forked tongue could use a matching forked face."
Taunt.Sivir.Renektontaunt02: "I could use a pair of croc skin boots."

Ascension.Sivir.ascensionStart01: "Keeping the Ascended in line is a full-time job."
Ascension.Sivir.ascensionStart02: "Ascension is a problem. I'm the solution."
Ascension.Sivir.ascensionSelf01: "Hmm... I could get used to this."
Ascension.Sivir.ascension01: "They asked for Ascension. Give it to them."
Ascension.Sivir.unknown01: "Send more goons. I think it's working."
Ascension.Sivir.unknown02: "Takes a lot to stay at the top."
Ascension.Sivir.unknown05: "Come to my desert, pay my price."

Joke.Soraka.joke1: "No, I'm not happy to see you. Yes, that is a horn growing out of my head."
Joke.Soraka.joke2: "Yes, that was a banana. *giggles* No one expects the banana."

Taunt.Teemo.taunt: "Never underestimate the power of the Scout's code."

Champion Select.Tristana_Select_new: "Once a Bandle gunner, always a Bandle gunner!"

Upon starting a game.Tristana.start02: "I bravely volunteer to charge in recklessly!"

Movement.Tristana.move05: "Get in my way. I dare ya."
Movement.Tristana.move07: "You don't hurt 'em if you don't hit 'em."
Movement.Tristana.move12: "I just need a point in the right direction."
Movement.Tristana.move14: "A Bandle Gunner never turns tail. Unless it's to taunt you."
Movement.Tristana.move17: "If it's worth shooting once, it's probably worth shooting a lot!"

Joke.Tristana.joke01: "Is that a rocket in your pocket?"
Joke.Tristana.joke02: "Please allow my cannon and I to conflict resolve."
Joke.Tristana.jokeRumble01: "Nice suit, Rumble! What d'you call it?"
Joke.Tristana.jokeTeemo01: "Um, Teemo, are these mushrooms your rations or your ammo?"

Taunt.Tristana.taunt02: "You make it easy to be unimpressed."
Taunt.Tristana.tauntAmumu01: "Anyone ever tell you you're a little clingy?"
Taunt.Tristana.tauntCorki02: "You're not the only Yordle who knows how to fly, Corki."
Taunt.Tristana.tauntJinx01: "When you find the right gun, you only need one."
Taunt.Tristana.tauntVeigar01: "Aw, Veigar! You're cute when you're angry."
Taunt.Tristana.tauntVeigar02: "Oh, Veigar! Tell me all about your diabolical plan."

Dance.Tristana.dance01: "Let 'em come by land, by sea or air! Send 'em running home when the Bandle Gunners blare!"
Dance.Tristana.dance02: "One stump high and ten stumps tall! Bandle Gunners show 'em all!"
Dance.Tristana.dance03: "Bandle Gunners, what'd you see? Sir, just smoke and victory!"

Using Rapid Fire.Tristana.spellQ5: "Who wants some? You want some? Come on!"

Using Rocket Jump.Tristana.unknown07: "Maybe I cut that a little close. Maybe."

Using Rocket Jump.Tristana.unknown12: "Can't wait to tell the recruits about that one!"

Using Explosive Charge.Tristana.spellEOverkill03: "Now you see him, now you don't."
Using Explosive Charge.Tristana.spellEOverkill04: "How's that for a Bandle City beatdown?"

Using Buster Shot.Tristana.spellR7: "Point blank is the only blank I like!"

Upon buying an Item.Tristana.item04: "Let's see if this makes it through the first explosion."
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.item06: "Ooh, I like the look of this baby!"
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemBloodthirster02: "It can keep the blood. I'm thirsty for action."
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemGuardianAngel01: "All the risk and none of the consequences? I'm sold!"
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemGuardianAngel03: "Some people like backup plans. I like 'charge in' plans!"
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemInfinityEdge02: "If there's a sword for making things explode, this is it."
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemLastWhisper01: "It won't be so much a whisper as a deafening explosion."
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemLastWhisper03: "I don't take cover. I take cover out."

Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemStatikkShiv01: "Time to fill up my dance card!"
Upon buying an Item.Tristana.itemStatikkShiv02: "This'll put a little zing on things!"

Upon Starting a Game.Warwick.start01: "The blood you spilled calls to me."
Upon Starting a Game.Warwick.start02: "The chains are broken... the beast is free."

Attacking.Warwick.attack05: "It takes a monster to gut one."
Attacking.Warwick.attack09: "A monster's inside you... I'll tear it out!"
Attacking.Warwick.attack13: "It's not the beast you should be afraid of."
Attacking.Warwick.attack14: "The killing stops when Zaun is free."

Movement.Warwick.move05: "Zaun will watch you bleed, and it will do nothing."
Movement.Warwick.move07: "Vengeance is only a step behind you."
Movement.Warwick.move12: "All the blood you've spilled brought me here."
Movement.Warwick.move13: "I know Zaun's streets like the back of my claws."
Movement.Warwick.move14: "I became the monster I always was."
Movement.Warwick.move15: "The memories come back every time you scream."
Movement.Warwick.move17: "The man I was... I killed him first."
Movement.Warwick.attackW02: "Can't save you all... don't want to."

Joke.Warwick.joke03: "I'll do a trick for a Warwick snack!"

Taunt.Warwick.taunt01: "I ran these streets - now it's your turn to run."
Taunt.Warwick.taunt02: "Violence can be death - or a way of life."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntBlitzcrank01: "There's more to kill in a plague rat. You're all machine."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntCaitlyn01: "So deep in Piltover's pockets, I can only see your hat."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntCamille01: "I'll pick my teeth with your legs!"
Taunt.Warwick.tauntCamille03: "Progress is just what Piltovans call murder."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntEkko01: "Rewind too far, and you'll be back in my teeth!"
Taunt.Warwick.tauntEkko02: "The one person in Zaun who runs to the past."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntKindred01: "Which one of you is the wolf?"
Taunt.Warwick.tauntSinged04: "Zaun gave me claws long before you did."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntTwitch01: "There are more rats than men in Zaun."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntTwitch02: "And I thought the chem-barons were vermin."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntUrgot01: "Which one of us is the monster?"
Taunt.Warwick.tauntVi01: "The fear in your eyes. I've seen it before."
Taunt.Warwick.tauntYordle02: "First I'll kill you, and then I'll--- yordle!"
Taunt.Warwick.tauntZac01: "I don't know what you are, but I hope you bleed!"

Upon casting Recall.Warwick.respawn02: "More scars - as if I didn't have enough."
Upon casting Recall.Warwick.recall01: "If I don't kill you, Zaun will."

Upon respawning.Warwick.respawn03: "You killed Warwick, but left the beast."
Upon respawning.Warwick.respawn05: "One thing you should know; I honour my debts."

Movement/Attacking.Nunu.attack6: "Don't make the yeti angry, You won't like him when he's angry!"

Taunt.Nunu.taunt: "Don't make the yeti angry. You won't like him when he's angry!"

Joke.Nunu.joke: "Speak softly... and ride a big yeti!"

Movement.MissFortune.move6: "You've got dangerous eyes... I like that."
Movement.MissFortune.move8: "I've got a good feeling about this."

Taunt.MissFortune.taunt: "Watch your mouth kid, or you'll find yourself respawning at home!"

Joke.MissFortune.joke: "How do you like my guns... Shock, and Awe!"

Champion Select.Ashe.taunt02: "Take a good look; it's the last you'll get."

Attacking.Ashe.attack09: "Let's see how close they can get."

Movement.Ashe.move07: "Faster than my arrow? I think not."
Movement.Ashe.move12: "I do my best work from afar."

Taunt.Ashe.taunt01: "How do you like the curves? I was talking about the bow."
Taunt.Ashe.taunt02: "Take a good look; it's the last you'll get."
Taunt.Ashe.taunt03: "Keep staring... just don't look behind you."

Joke.Ashe.joke01: "No, really, put that apple on your head... ugh! Ah... ohh... hmm... "
Joke.Ashe.joke02: "I don't have to see you to shoot you... ow! Ugh... ooh, really?"
Joke.Ashe.joke03: "Ha hah! Check this out... ow! Ugh, who makes a bow out of ice?!"

Joke.Tryndamere.joke: "My right arm is a lot stronger than my left arm!"

Taunt.Jax.taunt: "Who wants a piece of the champ?!"

Joke.Jax.joke: "Imagine if I had a real weapon!"

Taunt.Chronokeeper.taunt: "I've seen your death, it was painful... "

Joke.Chronokeeper.joke: "Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like banana."

Starting a game.Evelynn.firstMove1: "Let's see... whose life shall I ruin today?"
Starting a game.Evelynn.firstMove2: "The moment they think they have me..." Evelynn laughs. "Yeah, that's what I live for."
Starting a game.Evelynn.firstMove3: "This place is so bland. It needs a splash of red."
Starting a game.Evelynn.firstMove4: "Show me the man who has everything, and I'll show you my next victim."
Starting a game.Evelynn.firstMove5: "Oooh, so many joyful people to hurt."

Attacking.Evelynn.attack02: "Ooh, you're so hot when you're hurt."
Attacking.Evelynn.attack08: "Like what you see? I'll rip off your eyelids!"
Attacking.Evelynn.attack11: "I can't wait to see your pain face."
Attacking.Evelynn.attack16: "I know you're hurting, but I can't feel without this."
Attacking.Evelynn.attack17: "Everyone's pain tastes different. What flavor is yours?"
Attacking.Evelynn.attack18: "Awww, you thought you were getting lucky!"
Attacking.Evelynn.attack38: "Nothing personal, I just need you to suffer horribly."
Attacking.Evelynn.attack39: "The more I cut away, the closer we'll get."
Attacking.Evelynn.attackDragon1: "Not the first time I've had dragon."
Attacking.Evelynn.attackDragon2: "What a magnificent creature... Let's kill it slowly!"
Attacking.Evelynn.attackDragon3: "Don't worry honey, I'm open to all types."
Attacking.Evelynn.attackBaron3: "The bigger they are, the more places you can hurt them."
Attacking.Evelynn.attackBaron4: "Finally! A man who can satisfy me."

Movement.Evelynn.move01: "Hate? No! I hurt them out of love."
Movement.Evelynn.move02: "I feel their looks like hot breath. They feel my claws like hot knives."
Movement.Evelynn.move05: "Just looking for that special someone to torment."
Movement.Evelynn.move06: "I can't feel anything... until they do."
Movement.Evelynn.move07: "Every smile is just a frown waiting to be turned upside down."
Movement.Evelynn.move08: "The height of their happiness is the depth of their pain."
Movement.Evelynn.move10: "Hate and love are just two words for passion."
Movement.Evelynn.move11: "I was born of a thousand screams. What's one more?"
Movement.Evelynn.move12: "Their mouths say no, but their bodies say "flay me alive.""
Movement.Evelynn.move13: "Drink the pain, toss away the rest."
Movement.Evelynn.move14: "Once I was overwhelmed by the agony. Now I can't get enough."
Movement.Evelynn.move15: "You really don't know someone 'til you've seen them beg for mercy."
Movement.Evelynn.move16: "I like the happy ones. They have so much farther to fall."
Movement.Evelynn.move17: "Without pain, how would they know pleasure?"
Movement.Evelynn.move18: "I hurt them 'til they hurt no more."
Movement.Evelynn.move19: "Misery loves whatever I tell it to."
Movement.Evelynn.move20: "One touch, with desire... that's all I need."
Movement.Evelynn.move21: "Someday they'll love me for who I really am."
Movement.Evelynn.move23: "Suffering is the meaning of life. Well... their lives."
Movement.Evelynn.move24: "Let's see... something to fill the emptiness..."
Movement.Evelynn.move25: "I remember when just a little pain did the trick."
Movement.Evelynn.move26: "Rend their flesh, flay them head to toe."
Movement.Evelynn.move27: "Girls just wanna tear your throat out with their teeth."
Movement.Evelynn.move29: "Need to find me? Just follow the trail of widows."
Movement.Evelynn.move30: "I use every part of their torment. Nothing is wasted."
Movement.Evelynn.move31: "I don't break hearts. I just tear them from rib cages."
Movement.Evelynn.move32: "They're all my favorites... until they break."
Movement.Evelynn.move33: "Through suffering they come to love me. Every. Single. One."
Movement.Evelynn.move36: "A man once told me to put on some clothes. So I wore his skin."
Movement.Evelynn.move37: "Who does a girl have to kill to start another Rune War?"
Movement.Evelynn.move39: "Always dress like you're seducing your next victim."
Movement.Evelynn.move40: "Ah, how their screams make me tingle."
Movement.Evelynn.move41: "Don't try to tell me I'm not gorgeous."
Movement.Evelynn.move42: "Every kill is just a lover who didn't work out."
Movement.Evelynn.move43: "People have too many emotions. What am I supposed to do with "empathy"?"
Movement.Evelynn.move44: "I tasted peace once. Didn't do it for me."

Joke.Evelynn.joke1: "I love it when they talk dirty. "No! Please! Stop torturing me!""
Joke.Evelynn.jokeResponse1: "Know what else is funny? Pulling your tongue out through your neck."

Taunt.Evelynn.taunt1: "I've had my eye on you. Now I'm gonna rip yours out."
Taunt.Evelynn.taunt2: "First time being tortured? Don't worry, I'll do everything."
Taunt.Evelynn.taunt3: "I'll suck every last drop of joy from your heart."
Taunt.Evelynn.taunt4: "That skin looks good on you, but it would look better on my bedroom floor."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntResponse1: "Naughty, naughty. That gets you a lashing."
Taunt.Evelynn.allyTauntResponse1: "I don't really have friends. Just people I haven't eviscerated yet."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntAmumu2: "Ugh. I wouldn't torture you if you were the last person on earth."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntAurelionSol1: "With infinite power comes an infinite capacity for pain."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntBard1: "I can make you do a lot more than jingle, space man."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntDrMundo1: "So, you're a masochist? Whatcha doing later?"
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntLeeSin1: "Blindfolds, huh? Whatever does it for ya."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntLowerLifeForm1: "Can your kind even feel? I don't want to waste my time."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntLucian1: "I've seen your wife. You can do better."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntMuscularChamp1: "Just the way I like 'em. Big and stupid."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntNocturne1: "Why don't we leave the lights on for this?"
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntTahmKench1: "So how are you, River King? I see you haven't missed a meal."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntTahmKench2: "I like your style, Kench, but stay out of my territory."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntTank1: "You look like someone I could hurt for days."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntThresh2: "How do you kill them so slowly? You have to teach me."
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntVayne1: "Have I told you how your parents cried with their final breaths?"
Taunt.Evelynn.tauntVayne2: "Don't worry, love. You'll join them soon."

Entering Demon Shade.Evelynn.enterDemonShade07: "The things we whisper in the dark."
Entering Demon Shade.Evelynn.enterDemonShade10: "They can touch, but they can't look."
Entering Demon Shade.Evelynn.enterDemonShade11: "They all look the same in the dark."
Entering Demon Shade.Evelynn.enterDemonShade12: "What they don't know won't hurt them... yet."

Using Allure.Evelynn.castAllure01: "The things I'm going to do to you."
Using Allure.Evelynn.castAllure02: "That's it, love. Let your guard down."
Using Allure.Evelynn.castAllure05: "Ooh, are you lonely? I can help."
Using Allure.Evelynn.castAllure06: "A little bit of heaven before the hell."

Killing an Enemy Champion.Evelynn.kill02: "I hate it when they don't last."
Killing an Enemy Champion.Evelynn.kill04: "Look at me! I need to watch you go."
Killing an Enemy Champion.Evelynn.kill06: "Ugh... I think we should break up."
Killing an Enemy Champion.Evelynn.kill07: "Oh well... Time to find a new toy."
Killing an Enemy Champion.Evelynn.kill12: "Was it as good for you as it was for me? No? Too bad!"
Killing an Enemy Champion.Evelynn.kill14: "We need to talk. I want to kill other people."

Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyClothArmor2: "It's a sin to cover something so perfect."
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyClothArmor3: "Why not give them something to take off?"
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyRabadonsDeathcap1: "Hello, hat. Ready to feast on the pain of others?"
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyRabadonsDeathcap2: "This land will become a sea of torment."
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyLichBane2: "The pain of a lich is eternal."
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyVoidStaff1: "Imagine what we can do with this."
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyVoidStaff3: "Think of all the places this can go."
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyLiandrysTorment1: "Aahh, still wet with the tears of Liandry herself."
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyLiandrysTorment2: "I do like your style Liandry, whoever you were."
Upon buying an Item.Evelynn.buyLiandrysTorment3: "Now they will all know true pain."

Upon casting Recall.Evelynn.recall01: "A girl's gotta know when to disappear."
Upon casting Recall.Evelynn.recall02: "Be right back. Gotta put my face on."
Upon casting Recall.Evelynn.enterDemonShade03: "Mind if I slip into something a little more... painful?"

Champion Select.Twitch_Select_new: "What doesn't kill you just isn't finished yet."

Attacking.Twitch.attack01: "They'll have more holes than my favorite cheese."
Attacking.Twitch.attack06: "Plenty more where that came from! Seriously, I carry a lot of ammo."
Attacking.Twitch.attack10: "How do you aim with all this light?"
Attacking.Twitch.attack11: "Stand still! My eyes are on the side of my head!"

Movement.Twitch.move03: "I can't even taste the air up here."
Movement.Twitch.move04: "It's sticky so you don't drop it."
Movement.Twitch.move08: "Don't trust any liquid you can see through."
Movement.Twitch.move13: "From out of the sewers comes... doom."
Movement.Twitch.move15: "Dip it in sewage... leave it in the sun for a while... oh, yes, that's perfect, yes!"

Joke.Twitch.joke01: "Always pack a snack a month in advance!"
Joke.Twitch.joke03: "Sneaking around really works up your appetite!"
Joke.Twitch.joke04: "I'm a connoisseur of the finer things!"

Taunt.Twitch.taunt01: "One of these is going to get stuck in your head."
Taunt.Twitch.taunt02: "They can play this at your funeral."
Taunt.Twitch.taunt04: "I hear you're trash! Bow before your king!"
Taunt.Twitch.tauntZac02: "I thought this place could use a little gooping up."
Taunt.Twitch.tauntSinged02: "I have this uncontrollable urge to follow you."
Taunt.Twitch.tauntLeona01: "The only thing the sun's good for is what it does to milk."

Upon Casting Venom Cask.Twitch.W4: "Now, there's a smell you can feel!"

Upon Being Rooted by Yordle Snap Trap.Twitch.Cupcake05: "Now I have to gnaw my leg off... oh, no, I'm good."

Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyItem03: "Ah, a little stench and it'll be perfect."
Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyPotion01: "My ears are tingling. My... tail is tingling."
Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyPotion04: "Ooh, this'll put hair on your tail."
Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyLastWhisper01: "My last whisper will be street bacon."
Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyLastWhisper02: "My last whisper will be maggot pie."
Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyLastWhisper03: "My last whisper will be curdle pops."
Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyLastWhisper04: "My last whisper will be yogurt mold."
Upon Buying an Item.Twitch.BuyWard03: "Trespassers will be shot, then looted, then... chewed on for a while."

Champion Select.Karthus_Select_new: "Agony, ecstasy, peace. Every passing has a beauty all its own."

Upon Starting a Game.Karthus.start02: "We all have a place among the divine. We have only to accept it."

Attacking.Karthus.attack15: "Die by my hand, and rise anew."

Movement.Karthus.move01: "In the end, only the dead shall remain."
Movement.Karthus.move05: "You all die, why not choose how?"
Movement.Karthus.move10: "The Shadow Isles sing louder than any siren."
Movement.Karthus.move14: "Death is a song all will hear."
Movement.Karthus.move16: "You have been dying from your first breath."
Movement.Karthus.move20: "You will forget breath, you will forget love."
Movement.Karthus.move22: "You are the candle burning unto nothing."
Movement.Karthus.move24: "Pain is the herald of your salvation."

Joke.Karthus.joke01: "I'm putting your name in my little black necronomicon."
Joke.Karthus.joke02: "Do you have a moment to talk about death?."
Joke.Karthus.joke03: "What's the incantation again... yes, erm... oh, right, R!"
Joke.Karthus.joke04: "Listen, mortals, as I speak the word of... my cookbook."
Joke.Karthus.joke05: "Dear diary, met a wonderful ghoul today..."
Joke.Karthus.joke06: "Sorry, I'm booked through... er, brrrr... forever."
Joke.Karthus.jokeUrgot01: "Urgot, hm, I highly recommend death at this point."

Taunt.Karthus.taunt01: "I will shred your body, and burn your soul!"
Taunt.Karthus.taunt03: "Life clings like a parasite to a soul!"
Taunt.Karthus.taunt04: "The song of your life will be brief."
Taunt.Karthus.taunt05: "To feel the caress of death for the first time... I envy you!"
Taunt.Karthus.tauntElise01: "You deceive your followers. I will enlighten them."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntHecarim02: "You are but the herald, Hecarim. Remember who you truly serve."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntLeona01: "Your light is but a candle in the infinite dark."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntLucian02: "Abandon your mortality, and find your precious Senna."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntLucian03: "You can always join her, Lucian. It will be bliss!"
Taunt.Karthus.tauntMordekaiser01: "You give the dead purpose, Mordekaiser. I give them meaning."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntMordekaiser02: "A shell of flesh or a shell of metal? Both ring hollow."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntSion01: "Sion, we must free your soul from the prison of flesh."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntSion02: "You are only the echo of greatness, but I can give you a voice again!"
Taunt.Karthus.tauntThresh01: "Death has more meaning than torment alone, warden."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntThresh02: "You may shackle the living, but the dead must walk free."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntUrgot01: "Abomination, you have cheated death too long."
Taunt.Karthus.tauntVarus01: "You are on the eve of liberation, Varus."

Upon Buying....Karthus.itemTear01: "A tear of loss, a tear of joy."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemGuardianAngel01: "Angels too are the messengers of death."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemGuardianAngel02: "Host of angels, or murder of crows?"
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemRodofAges01: "Its power grows with time... as does mine."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemDeathcap01: "A crown for the king of death."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemDeathcap02: "Its old master served my patron well."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemDeathcap04: "I hear the echo of a Rabadon; it is exquisite."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemRylais03: "When death's grip finds you, it clings tightly."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemVoidStaff02: "It will turn their mantles to shrouds."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemVoidStaff03: "What can protect you from the inevitable?"
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemZhonyas01: "The grave has all the time in the world."
Upon Buying....Karthus.itemZhonyas03: "Freeze that moment, on the threshold of oblivion."

Upon Casting Recall.Karthus.recall03: "When I return, more shall join my choir."

Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.WestAltar.Karthus2: "No good will come from your sorcery, Karthus."
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.WestAltar.Karthus3: "I also hear the songs of the dead."
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Karthus1: "A man who chose to join us... glorious."
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Karthus4: "The dark requiem will be the last thing they hear!"

Champion Select.Cho%27Gath_Select: "You'd wish the world you know to end! Yeeeesssss..."

Attacking.Greenterror.attack1: "You have stains upon your soul... perfect."
Attacking.Greenterror.attack4: "There will be no end to your suffering!"
Attacking.Greenterror.attack7: "No! I do not live under a bed! Fool!"

Movement.Greenterror.move5: "Your races are a scourge upon the world!"
Movement.Greenterror.move7: "You... are a scourge upon the world."

Taunt.Greenterror.taunt: "Death is not the end for you, I have seen to it. For eternity, you are mine!"

Joke.Greenterror.joke2: "Nom nom nom nom nom nom nom!"
Joke.Greenterror.joke3: "Nom nom nom nom nom nom nom!"

Attacking.Anivia.attack09: "I am the snow, wind, and ice."

Movement.Anivia.move03: "I am neither the first, nor the last."
Movement.Anivia.move12: "A thousand lives will I give for the Freljord."

Taunt.Anivia.taunt02: "Poor creatures, so confined by a single life!"

Joke.Anivia.joke01: "Laying an egg isn't as easy as it looks."
Joke.Anivia.joke02: "The chicken or the egg? Actually I came first."

Movement/Attacking.Shaco.attack6: "Now you see me, now you don't!"

Joke.Shaco.joke: "For my next trick, I'll make you disappear!"

Joke.DrMundo.joke: "Mundo say his own name a lot, or else he forget! Has happened before."

Champion Select.Kassadin_Select: "The balance of power must be preserved."

Joke.Kassadin.joke: "I tried to silence my mother once. Boy, did I regret that."

First Move.Irelia_071: "Let them come! This land will be their graveyard!"
First Move.Irelia_091: "We will live on... Either in victory, or in the scars we leave on them!"
First Move.Irelia_101: "They await my words... what should I tell them?"
First Move.Irelia_217: "We stand on the bones of the ones who came before us. For them, we fight!"
First Move.Irelia_226: "I have but one life to give for Ionia. I must make it count."
First Move.Irelia_301: "Yup, they're ice blades. Don't stick your tongue to them."

Movement.Irelia_001: "I have walked the silver plains and fished the rivers of grass. The land knows me."
Movement.Irelia_004: "Remember what's been lost. Fight for what hasn't been."
Movement.Irelia_013: "(Laughs) They thought they could tame our land."
Movement.Irelia_017: "To live under a boot is not to live."
Movement.Irelia_021: "My dance has 42 forms. They'll only see one."
Movement.Irelia_027: "I carry a lot more than these blades."
Movement.Irelia_031: "We are the children of the First Lands, and we will not be slaves!"
Movement.Irelia_032: "I remember when I danced for fun."
Movement.Irelia_035: "Live today like you're going to die tomorrow."
Movement.Irelia_039: "What strange power works through me, I do not know."
Movement.Irelia_041: "I move to unsung melodies and unbeaten rhythms."
Movement.Irelia_047: "Zelos told the worst jokes... How I miss them."
Movement.Irelia_058: "Never stop learning. There's always a form you don't know."
Movement.Irelia_061: "If they capture me they'll kill me... (Laughs) If."
Movement.Irelia_062: "We do this for those who came before us, and those who come next."
Movement.Irelia_068: "Ours is the land of magic, and that is worth dying for."
Movement.Irelia_072: "Their weapons are great, but our will is greater."
Movement.Irelia_084: "We are the only masters of our fate!"
Movement.Irelia_095: "Do we want to be safe? Or free? The choice is ours."
Movement.Irelia_103: "Better times there were, and will be again."
Movement.Irelia_104: "Dance with what brought you: in this case, blades."
Movement.Irelia_113: "I never meant to lead. I fought, and they followed."
Movement.Irelia_120: "An ocean separates us... for good reason."
Movement.Irelia_136: "These blades were whetted on the bones of tyrants!"
Movement.Irelia_140: "Act, and the whole world will move!"
Movement.Irelia_142: "They'll know me as the last to lay down her weapons."
Movement.Irelia_153: "The voices of my brothers still carry on the wind."
Movement.Irelia_161: "I am both the tranquil sea and the tempest."
Movement.Irelia_165: "Stay ready, and there is no need to get ready."
Movement.Irelia_167: "Each form has a name known only to the wind. At least that's what O-ma said."
Movement.Irelia_178: "I am not unfriendly! I am a warm and caring person."
Movement.Irelia_183: "I really should've stretched first... Oh well."
Movement.Irelia_190: "They came for our magics. They'll pay with their lives."
Movement.Irelia_193: "Harm no one... Unless they come for your home."
Movement.Irelia_205: "None can do what I do... So I will do it."
Movement.Irelia_208: "A single pebble may sink a warship. And a thousand pebbles... (laughs)"
Movement.Irelia_222: "Peace must sometimes be bought with blood."
Movement.Irelia_227: "There's a saying: 'Never fight Ionians on their home soil.'"
Movement.Irelia_230: "Even if they kill me, they'll still have to fight the land."
Movement.Irelia_238: "My O-ma always said I had angry feet."
Movement.Irelia_242: "Of course I can fight. I grew up with four siblings."
Movement.Irelia_259: "I've never killed a person... just a lot of Noxians."
Movement.Irelia_266: "Give them an inch, they'll take a kingdom."
Movement.Irelia_592: "I once served the light, until it cast me out."
Movement.Irelia_596: "I pledged myself to darkness. It has called in the debt."
Movement.Irelia_601: "I'm doomed to carry these blades... forever."
Movement.Irelia_286: "The rest of the plane? Eh, I don't need it."
Movement.Irelia_289: "If the mission goes to hell, there's always the blades."
Movement.Irelia_292: "If they find me, they'll regret it."
Movement.Irelia_293: "Hurt and subvert - that's how I do it."
Movement.Irelia_294: "Stay under their radar, and if that doesn't work, cut their heads off."
Movement.Irelia_296: "The frost gave me life. Now it takes it."
Movement.Irelia_299: "The cold? Eh, it never bothered me."
Movement.Irelia_303: "This ice never melts... just like our will."
Movement.Irelia_305: "I have walked the ice plains and fished the rivers of ice... The ice knows me."
Movement.Irelia_306: "Hope they brought armor... and a sweater."
Movement.Irelia_308: "Peace is not perennial. It must be constantly sowed."
Movement.Irelia_311: "The seeds of our order carry on the wind."
Movement.Irelia_313: "Beauty can grow from the murkiest water."
Movement.Irelia_316: "They see only the flower, but these roots run deep."

Teamfight.Irelia_107: "Press on! We can quit when we're dead!"
Teamfight.Irelia_115: "Take out their necks! The heads will follow."
Teamfight.Irelia_132: "Make them remember, so they do not return!"
Teamfight.Irelia_155: "Give me your all! I swear it will not be wasted!"
Teamfight.Irelia_170: "I will not let them harm you!"
Teamfight.Irelia_184: "I do not want your praise. Just your sweat and your blood!"
Teamfight.Irelia_185: "Dig in! This is where we make our stand!"
Teamfight.Irelia_244: "For the bones of our fathers, and the temples of our gods!"
Teamfight.Irelia_128: "Your sacrifice will not be in vain!"
Teamfight.Irelia_191: "I survive. And now I must earn it."
Teamfight.Irelia_203: "I will light their lanterns. They will see victory."

Killing an Enemy Champion.Irelia_028: "It's always the blade you don't see coming."
Killing an Enemy Champion.Irelia_297: "I just love the way blood pools on ice."
Killing an Enemy Champion.Irelia_052: "Leave them, as a warning to others!"
Killing an Enemy Champion.Irelia_067: "A fool forgets to watch his flank."
Killing an Enemy Champion.Irelia_010: "Bury them in Noxus! This ground will not have them!"
Killing an Enemy Champion.Irelia_160: "Killing you won't bring them back. But it still felt good."

Joke.Irelia_235: "Contrary to what you've heard, I have a great sense of humor."

Taunt.Irelia_038: "Can you not hear the music? I shall enjoy watching you trip."
Taunt.Irelia_154: "Raise a hand to us, and you'll find it missing."
Taunt.Irelia_159: "Here are our terms. You leave, and you live."
Taunt.Irelia_192: "We are all creations of the spirit. Still, I must kill you."
Taunt.Irelia_224: "Everyone has something clever to say... until the blades find their throat!"
Taunt.Irelia_143: "Where did you go wrong? Is there anything redeemable in you? It's time to find out."
Taunt.Irelia_127: "Keep your 'balance', ours is the only side that matters."
Taunt.Irelia_269: "Humans? Vastaya? We are all Ionians, facing a common threat!"
Taunt.Irelia_268: "Soon they will grieve in your village."
Taunt.Irelia_024: "Stop your flirting nine-tails, it's time to take up arms."
Taunt.Irelia_065: "I admire your spirit. Your attitude, not so much."
Taunt.Irelia_141: "In Ionia we have over 200 species of talking dragon. Sorry, not impressed."
Taunt.Irelia_204: "Ugh, your songs are impossible to dance to."
Taunt.Irelia_253: "We don't need legends to save us. We do our own fighting."
Taunt.Irelia_078: "Nice technique. I miss your old hair though. Why'd you change it?"
Taunt.Irelia_206: "Ioniaaaaaa!!! Hmm, that's me, if I was you."
Taunt.Irelia_194: "Somewhere, a forest is missing its idiot."
Taunt.Irelia_146: "I'm about to cut your wind!.. Wait, n-not like that, I meant my blades are going to...  Never mind."
Taunt.Irelia_189: "You claim to speak for the spirit, as if it doesn't move my blades."
Taunt.Irelia_276: "Your dances are good, but they lack a certain... soul."
Taunt.Irelia_236: "You want redemption? Join me, and kill your masters!"
Taunt.Irelia_199: "You know what it's like to lose everything. So you know why I must fight."
Taunt.Irelia_124: "Lobbing poison from your ship doesn't make you a genius. It makes you a coward!"
Taunt.Irelia_233: "Really? Flying blades? Get your own thing, sister!"
Taunt.Irelia_055: "Make yourself useful! Return your crystals to the earth."
Taunt.Irelia_007: "Were you the one who brought the ravens? Because I think they just got caught in my blades!"
Taunt.Irelia_108: "Did you wanna lose the other one too?"
Taunt.Irelia_256: "For a 'brilliant tactician' you sure pick unwinnable fights!"
Taunt.Irelia_243: "Once an Ionian, always an Ionian. You'll never be one of them."
Taunt.Irelia_163: "You dance to your own rhythm, but the land is beating the drums of war."

Upong Placing a Ward.Irelia_179: "The eyes are the first line of defence."
Upong Placing a Ward.Irelia_212: "This time, we'll be waiting for them."

Upon Buying Items.Irelia_126: "A sword with a grip? How quaint."
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_172: "Throw it in with the others, let's see if it flies."
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_089: "Give all and the spirit gives back!"
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_106: "The blades are honed, let us test their edges."
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_260: "Land, name and nation. Long may they live!"
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_008: "Steals their life, like they stole our land... I like it."
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_040: "Gives life as it takes it... much like the Spirit."
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_152: "I don't care who made it, so long as it kills invaders."
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_003: "Woe to all who would harm us now!"
Upon Buying Items.Irelia_090: "A beast of a blade for beastly foes!"

Upon Ally Pinging On the Way.Irelia_030: "I'll draw them in, you take their flank!"

Upon Recalling.Irelia_053: "We must stay moving! Keep them guessing."
Upon Recalling.Irelia_081: "(Sigh of relief) Alone at last... I'll make the most of it."
Upon Recalling.Irelia_094: "It's quiet now... time to find my own rhythm."
Upon Recalling.Irelia_134: "When no one's around, I dance for myself."
Upon Recalling.Irelia_261: "I am the great river, flowing where I please."

Upon Respawning.Irelia_097: "The spirit revives me. I will not disappoint."
Upon Respawning.Irelia_114: "This is far from over. We have not yet begun to fight."
Upon Respawning.Irelia_137: "Ugh! Need to get my rhythm back!"
Upon Respawning.Irelia_234: "My form was off... Can't let them see."

Upon Issuing a Move Command Over a Long.Irelia_593: "Father, mother, Zelos, O-ma, Ohn, Kai, little Ruu... None of them ever had a chance."
Upon Issuing a Move Command Over a Long.Irelia_595: "I did not light my O-ma's lantern. I don't want her to see this slaughter."
Upon Issuing a Move Command Over a Long.Irelia_602: "You do not know burden until you've seen a thousand people hanging on your every word."

Taunt.Janna.taunt: "And you thought it was just a harmless breeze!"

Joke.Janna.joke1: "Yes, it's true. For only $2.95 a minute, I will leave you breathless."
Joke.Janna.joke2: "Say hello to the winds of--- (double cough, clears throat) I don't know what came over me."

Champion Select.Gangplank_Select_new2: "Neither the flames nor the depths could claim me."

Upon Starting a Game.Gangplank.start01: "With sword and shot I'll take my island back."
Upon Starting a Game.Gangplank.start02: "They took my ship - I'll take their lives."

Attacking.Gangplank.attack05: "Pistols or blades, don't matter to me."
Attacking.Gangplank.attack13: "I will carve my name in their skulls."

Movement.Gangplank.move01: "I'll burn it all down if I can't have it."
Movement.Gangplank.move03: "I found my hate in the fire."
Movement.Gangplank.move08: "I lost my ship, but not my soul."
Movement.Gangplank.move09: "Do I look like a patient man?"
Movement.Gangplank.move10: "I am reborn of salt and brine."
Movement.Gangplank.move11: "The sea has no memory - but I do."
Movement.Gangplank.move12: "Betrayal stings like salt on a wound."
Movement.Gangplank.move15: "Tides of dead will herald my return!"
Movement.Gangplank.move19: "I'll hack my way back to Bilgewater."
Movement.Gangplank.move22: "A slow death will be their reward."

Joke.Gangplank.joke01: "Yar ha har argh -! (coughs) Had something in my throat."
Joke.Gangplank.joke02: "They're not just oranges - they're blood oranges."

Taunt.Gangplank.taunt02: "The smell of powder sets my blood to boil."
Taunt.Gangplank.taunt03: "Survive this, and you'll need a lot of rum."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntGraves01: "You will never have a grave, Graves."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntGraves02: "You will never have a grave, Graves... see, it's 'cause your name, it's... your name is like a grave, it's - I - never mind."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntGraves03: "Can't light cigars in the bottom of the sea."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntGraves04: "Will your partner try to avenge you? I hope so."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntGraves05: "You talk a lot for a dead man, Graves."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntMissFortune01: "Only thing worse than a traitor is a bad shot."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntMissFortune02: "Can't wear the crown till the king's dead, little girl."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntMissFortune03: "I don't leave anything to fortune any more."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntTwistedFate01: "Sealed your fate when you crossed me, boy."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntTwistedFate02: "The seafloor is littered with your ilk, gambler."
Taunt.Gangplank.tauntTwistedFate04: "I don't need a good hand to see your fate."

Upon Buying....Gangplank.itemBilgewaterCutlass03: "A dirty blade for a dirty job."
Upon Buying....Gangplank.itemStatikkShiv01: "Always have a shiv at the ready."
Upon Buying....Gangplank.itemBloodthirster01: "Sometimes you gotta get your hands bloody."
Upon Buying....Gangplank.itemTrinityForce02: "A captain can't have any blind spots."

Champion Select.Corki_Select: "I'm up to snuff, and gots me an ace machine!"
Champion Select.Corki.taunt: "That just goes to show you you're nothin' but a Whiskey Delta!"

Attacking.Corki.attack4: "I've got a bogey on my tail!"

Movement.Corki.move7: "This is Major Tom to ground control!"

Taunt.Corki.taunt: "That just goes to show you you're nothin' but a Whiskey Delta!"

Attacking.Karma.attack02: "To conquer one's self is to conquer all."
Attacking.Karma.attack05: "Never become a monster to defeat one."

Movement.Karma.move03: "I have seen two paths and made another between."
Movement.Karma.move10: "We have learned as much as we have suffered."

Taunt.Karma.taunt01: "I know your spirit, but I must stop your heart."
Taunt.Karma.taunt02: "If you desire peace, you must prepare for war!"
Taunt.Karma.taunt03: "An ideal is nothing... until you fight for it."

Joke.Karma.joke01: "You know what they say: Karma always catches up to you."

Champion Select.Taric_Select_new: "That glimmer of hope you see, that's me."

Upon Starting a Game.Taric.start01: "There's nowhere left to go but up."
Upon Starting a Game.Taric.start02: "I have risen beyond the call of banners and kings."
Upon Starting a Game.Taric.start03: "There is great power in the stars. Great danger as well."
Upon Starting a Game.Taric.start04: "The most precious jewel is the one we hold in our heart."
Upon Starting a Game.Taric.start05: "The climb may be long, but the view is worth it."

Attacking.Taric.attack05: "Beauty can stir one's heart... or stop it."
Attacking.Taric.attack14: "I climbed Mount Targon. You did not."
Attacking.Taric.attack16: "I find all life beautiful... except yours."
Attacking.Taric.attack17: "This world's fragile beauty must be preserved."
Attacking.Taric.attack18: "The stars keep the darkness at bay."
Attacking.Taric.attackBaron01: "You seem to have too many heads. Let's see if I can help you with that."
Attacking.Taric.attackBaron02: "I know I'm supposed to cherish all life, but come on."
Attacking.Taric.attackBaron03: "The taint of the Void is upon you."
Attacking.Taric.attackDragon01: "Nothing personal, but you've got to go."

Movement.Taric.move01: "I may be merciful, but Targon isn't."
Movement.Taric.move04: "The stars were the question. I was the answer."
Movement.Taric.move05: "The mountain's mysteries are known to me."
Movement.Taric.move06: "Why is it always the ugly ones?"
Movement.Taric.move07: "Easy on the eyes? Don't I know it."
Movement.Taric.move09: "I am no longer the man I once was."
Movement.Taric.move10: "We're all headed toward the same inevitable end. No need to rush."
Movement.Taric.move11: "Demacia was my home, but the stars are my destination."
Movement.Taric.move12: "I have seen the light too clearly to ever fear the darkness."
Movement.Taric.move13: "The mountain reveals the harshest truths in our souls."
Movement.Taric.move14: "Human life is fleeting, a mountain's life less so, but stars... stars are eternal."
Movement.Taric.move16: "My heart is filled with starlight. I give it freely to all."
Movement.Taric.move18: "Truth is worth fighting for, but beauty is worth dying for."
Movement.Taric.move19: "True gems sparkle even in the absence of light."
Movement.Taric.move20: "Elegance never helped win a fight, but it never hurt."
Movement.Taric.move22: "To truly see the stars, I climbed."
Movement.Taric.move23: "We see beauty in the stars, and they see beauty in us."
Movement.Taric.move24: "Just as the mountain is eternal, so is hope."
Movement.Taric.move26: "The mountain's question is unique for each of us."

Taunt.Taric.taunt01: "I answered for my crimes. Now it's your turn."
Taunt.Taric.taunt03: "I bested the mountain. Now it's your turn."
Taunt.Taric.tauntAshe01: "That bow is of the stars, as is its mistress."
Taunt.Taric.tauntDiana01: "Own your destiny, or it will own you."
Taunt.Taric.tauntDiana02: "Who could have guessed the Aspect of the Moon would be so beautiful?"
Taunt.Taric.tauntGaren01: "I will never turn my back on Demacia."
Taunt.Taric.tauntGaren02: "Good to see you again, old friend."
Taunt.Taric.tauntVoidborn01: "I will purge the Void from this world."
Taunt.Taric.tauntVelKoz01: "They say beauty is in the eye of the beholder."
Taunt.Taric.tauntVelKoz02: "I will enjoy sending you back to the Void. In pieces."
Taunt.Taric.tauntJhin01: "The heavens see all you have done."
Taunt.Taric.tauntLeona01: "The sun is but a traveller through the kingdom of the stars."
Taunt.Taric.tauntTahmKench01: "You are weighed down by your petty hungers."
Taunt.Taric.tauntTaric01: "I like the cut of your gem."

Joke.Taric.joke01: "I've been to the top of the mountain... and the bottom of the gutter. There's much to learn from both."
Joke.Taric.joke02: "Beauty can be deadly... and manly. Very manly."
Joke.Taric.joke03: "What did I see upon the mountain? Rocks. Lots of rocks."
Joke.Taric.joke04: "Much like a fine gem, I'm multifaceted."
Joke.Taric.joke05: "You know what they say about big gems, right?"
Joke.Taric.joke06: "My gems aren't merely outrageous, they're fabulous."
Joke.Taric.joke07: "It's okay if you're impressed. The Protector was too."
Joke.Taric.joke08: "I'm much more than a pretty face."

Scoring Kills and Objectives.Taric.spreeKillingSpree05: "In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Taric.spreeKillingSpree06: "Looks like a mountain fell on them."

Upon buying an Item.Taric.itemSapphireCrystal02: "A thing of beauty is a joy forever."
Upon buying an Item.Taric.itemVisionWard02: "I can see my mountain from here."
Upon buying an Item.Taric.itemSunfireCape01: "Wish I'd had this on the mountain."
Upon buying an Item.Taric.itemSunfireCape02: "Can never be too warm... or too beautiful."
Upon buying an Item.Taric.itemWarmogsArmor01: "You can always use a little extra protection."
Upon buying an Item.Taric.itemTargonsBrace03: "I thank the mountain for its gifts."
Upon buying an Item.Taric.itemVoidStaff02: "I will hurl them back with their own weapons."

Other Gameplay.Taric.useHuntersPotion01: "An Aspect still needs help now and again."

Upon casting Recall.Taric.recall04: "Failure has always been my greatest mentor."
Upon casting Recall.Taric.recall05: "No rest for the chosen of Targon."

Champion Select.Veigar_Select: "Know that if the tables were turned, I would show you no mercy!"

Attacking.Veigar.attack5: "I can see the fear in your heart."
Attacking.Veigar.attack6: "Your soul will come to serve me."

Movement.Veigar.move7: "It's only a short way? Is that a short joke?!"

Taunt.Veigar.taunt: "You deny the darkness in your soul! You deny your power!"

Joke.Veigar.joke: "What's black and blue and is about to show you the definition of pain?!"

Attacking.Trundle.attack07: "You can never bash something too many times."

Movement.Trundle.move03: "I like my human with a bit of spice."
Movement.Trundle.move05: "I'm troll judge, troll jury, and execu... troll!"
Movement.Trundle.move07: "I'm not ugly, but they're about to be!"

Taunt.Trundle.taunt01: "I'm gonna crush your dreams... They're in your skull, right?"
Taunt.Trundle.taunt02: "You got a problem with me? Join the club!"
Taunt.Trundle.taunt03: "If you want me to hit you less, die sooner!"

Joke.Trundle.joke01: "Have you seen this thing? Like really close."
Joke.Trundle.joke02: "Troll with the biggest club gets to be king. That's the rule!"
Joke.Trundle.joke03: "It's alright Clubbems, we'll get to smashing soon."

Using Subjugate.Trundle.ChampionSpecific07: "Who does this guy think he is?"

Champion Select.Swain_Select_new: "Fear the power you do not see."

Upon First Move.Swain_039: "You can sit on a throne, that doesn't make you a ruler. It only means you have an arse."
Upon First Move.Swain_040: "The outcome was decided when they brought an army, and I brought a demon."
Upon First Move.Swain_041: "I have seen this place... A vision... A Battle."
Upon First Move.Swain_042: "If they already call me a villain, what will they call me when I succeed?"
Upon First Move.Swain_043: "It is just as the spies described. A pity I had them executed."
Upon First Move.Swain_514: "Dead men tell tales that only I can hear."
Upon First Move.Swain_515: "No quarter. That means no mercy you cretins."
Upon First Move.Swain_516: "A black flag above Bilgewater. A raven's wing."
Upon First Move.Swain_308: "I look out upon humanity, and see only a feast."
Upon First Move.Swain_310: "Men are too weak to rule, ha ha ha, but I am no man."
Upon First Move.Swain_044: "An assassin is due at any moment. It is how I know  LeBlanc cares."

Attacking.Swain_009: "And to think, they called me a "cripple"."
Attacking.Swain_013: "A conquered nation is a loyal one."
Attacking.Swain_016: "We must remind them of their place."
Attacking.Swain_018: "The right to rule, held, in my hand."
Attacking.Swain_019: "This is the least of my crimes."
Attacking.Swain_025: "Pity stays the hand of the merciful, but not mine."
Attacking.Swain_017: "You would do well to die before my ravens find you."
Attacking.Swain_001: "The sooner we kill them all, the sooner we can leave these forsaken wastes."

Movement.Swain_065: "Tell me again all the crimes I've committed, and I'll tell you the price of victory."
Movement.Swain_066: "We are at war. Do not forget it."
Movement.Swain_067: "I have killed more men with words than by my own hand. Not for lack of trying."
Movement.Swain_069: "The more they try to kill me the more they reveal I am on the right path."
Movement.Swain_070: "To redraw the map, the blood of soldiers must be the ink."
Movement.Swain_071: "There is always a choice. The truth is no exception."
Movement.Swain_073: "A new vantage, is all the advantage I need."
Movement.Swain_074: "I suppose I should be grateful they have the decency to fear me."
Movement.Swain_075: "A Noxian knows who he is, and what he must do."
Movement.Swain_076: "The old wounds ache. They are reminders."
Movement.Swain_077: "Decisions have consequences. This I know well."
Movement.Swain_078: "They expect me to play fairly. We aren't even playing the same game."
Movement.Swain_079: "Hmm... I do so enjoy explaining things to idiots."
Movement.Swain_080: "I could kill them all. But it would be far crueler to show them that I am right."
Movement.Swain_081: "Never make a bargain with a demon that you intend to keep."
Movement.Swain_082: "One can read the future in battle lines, assuming one can read."
Movement.Swain_083: "They are five steps from realizing: I am ten steps ahead."
Movement.Swain_084: "I was born a patrician. I became a soldier."
Movement.Swain_085: "Would they even struggle to survive, if they knew what was to come?"
Movement.Swain_086: "I peer through the darkness others fear."
Movement.Swain_087: "When their lives flash before their eyes, so do their secrets."
Movement.Swain_088: "A riddle wrapped in a mystery, hidden within us all."
Movement.Swain_089: "It is not the visions that haunt me, but what I do not see."
Movement.Swain_090: "A calculated risk is no risk at all."
Movement.Swain_091: "Is it not enough for Noxus to be strong?"
Movement.Swain_092: "I cannot lead if I allow fools to stumble about before me."
Movement.Swain_093: "They are blind to the cold logic of this world."
Movement.Swain_095: "What is one more demon, when I already have so many?"
Movement.Swain_096: "The mud on our boots will hide the bloodstains."
Movement.Swain_098: "I've heard what they call me. What a waste of their final words."
Movement.Swain_099: "A voice whispers in the shadows. Though few can hear it."
Movement.Swain_119: "More than what we do not understand, we fear being understood."
