Movement.Swain_120: "Some say the darkness stares back, because they cannot see me."
Movement.Swain_121: "The more I see the more I realize how much remains hidden."
Movement.Swain_123: "I often kill in my visions. When I close my eyes, do not come near."
Movement.Swain_072: "The shadows of our empire, are cast by a raven's wings."

Taunt.Swain_192: "Every day I rule, Noxus becomes a more perfect expression of my will."
Taunt.Swain_193: "The demon is always in the details."
Taunt.Swain_194: "I would not ask of anyone what I would not do myself."
Taunt.Swain_195: "There can be no unity without purpose, and there is one all men are born to."
Taunt.Swain_204: "All roads lead to Noxus, but all visions, to Demacia."
Taunt.Swain_137: "There is nothing noteworthy about Demacia, but that in itself is worth noting."
Taunt.Swain_214: "The world may fall to darkness. But Noxus, will remain."
Taunt.Swain_154: "The truth beneath the gilding. Only war can bring profit."
Taunt.Swain_167: "Suffering pools in the depths where children play."
Taunt.Swain_136: "Creatures of darkness that grant power to their hosts? How original."
Taunt.Swain_201: "Thorns in my side, but your flower is truly something to behold."
Taunt.Swain_205: "You will find this delicate morsel, quite capable of fighting back."
Taunt.Swain_199: "It is better to be feared than loved, Vastaya."
Taunt.Swain_200: "I don't know if you're the wisest being I've ever met, or a pile of mouldering blankets."
Taunt.Swain_202: "Ah yes,  Cassiopeia. I admire your commitment to... metaphor."
Taunt.Swain_203: "It was only a matter of time,  Darius. Do what you must."
Taunt.Swain_206: "Fame has gone to your head, and found ample room within."
Taunt.Swain_207: "Am I to seek revenge for my poor departed arm? If anything girl, you did me a favor."
Taunt.Swain_208: "The mind is the weapon. You are unarmed."
Taunt.Swain_210: "If you take me, you will leave Noxus with something far worse."
Taunt.Swain_211: "We both move pawns in a grand game. And would you look at that? It seems I'm winning."
Taunt.Swain_213: "Life would be boring without surprises. You certainly keep things... interesting."
Taunt.Swain_198: "I suppose this makes us enemies with benefits."
Taunt.Swain_215: "People often ask for a hero, when a villain is what they truly need."
Taunt.Swain_216: "The Vastaya blood is not in my veins. It is on my hands."
Taunt.Swain_217: "The best armor is being forgotten, and you my dear, are quite forgettable."
Taunt.Swain_159: "There can be no balance with a hand on the scale."
Taunt.Swain_218: "Why is he still alive? Another one of Darkwill's loose ends."
Taunt.Swain_219: "Beware ravens? The words of a fool who knew nothing of demons."
Taunt.Swain_162: "Your eloquence: seasoning for a repetitive feast."
Taunt.Swain_220: "Your message is your power. You have learned nothing."
Taunt.Swain_221: "When you run out of insults, try steel."
Taunt.Swain_223: "You're the only man I know who believes his own words, even after he's said them."
Taunt.Swain_224: "If you plan on listing my crimes mind you do not die of asphyxiation."

Joke.Swain_046: "I have to know who has a crush on whom."
Joke.Swain_047: "Which one of you is  Beatrice again?"
Joke.Swain_048: "Caw caw caw caw caw. There, are you satisfied?"
Joke.Swain_049: "I am not smiling, I am threatening to smile. It is still a threat."

Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_171: "Their whispers itch at the back of my mind."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_173: "I am not done with you yet."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_132: "They fight the mist above the seas, never looking beneath."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_153: "An empire, built atop centuries of murder."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_142: "They squabble as the winds howl, and the wards fade."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_145: "Magic spills from their land like blood from a wound."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_158: "A king remains in the mist, and another marches."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_164: "Those born of magic rarely realize its curse, until it is too late."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_165: "A pattern, spreading... It has learnt to be alive."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_149: "So he's heard the rumours.  The girl who came back."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_130: "She claimed it was the Frost Queen's grave. They believed her."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_133: "My my, does your dear grandniece know what ' C' has been up to?"
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_134: "The payment for her suffering in Shurima: a black rose."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_139: "A glimpse, mere seconds into the future."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_140: "A vault empty of relics, but filled with corpses."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_141: "She's spurned so many suitors. A wonder they did not see why."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_144: "Ignorant of the very magic you carry into battle. How Demacian."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_146: "His blood is the only useful thing about him."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_147: "Faces fading in the flames. It was all her fault."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_148: "The first oath. The one she made to him."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_150: "He asked her to do what she could not. To kill me."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_151: "A child who had only known hate, confuses it for love."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_152: "Which is the greater tragedy, that she fell in battle, or that she fell in line?"
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_155: "So many obsessed with the hero. Tell me of the hammer."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_157: "She held their hands as they died, hoping they would drag her with them."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_160: "The echo of a soul... only pain brings it back."
Upon Triggering Ravenous Flock.Swain_163: "She feared what she could not understand: herself."

Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_056: "The raven was a portent. Their time had come."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_002: "I owe you a debt. That is not as ominous as it sounds."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_004: "Perhaps a promotions is in order. How would you like your own war band?"
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_057: "This is not even my final form."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_227: "A one-armed man needs all the help he can get."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_233: "More than men must kneel to Noxus."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_235: "Death comes to even the most fierce."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Swain_244: "Let them find hope in the rubble."

Other Gameplay.Swain_250: "I suppose it's easier than conquering a demon."
Other Gameplay.Swain_107: "Every moment we do not kill them, their advantage grows."
Other Gameplay.Swain_108: "They move swiftly for all the coins weighing them down."
Other Gameplay.Swain_109: "The dagger is at our throats. But their hands quiver."
Other Gameplay.Swain_110: "They think they have won. Prove them wrong!"
Other Gameplay.Swain_112: "Do not fight for conquest. Fight to survive!"
Other Gameplay.Swain_113: "The battle is yet to be decided."
Other Gameplay.Swain_114: "Patience is a virtue but it has its limits."
Other Gameplay.Swain_115: "The advantage is ours if we take it."
Other Gameplay.Swain_102: "Who is it we're fighting? I only see their backs."
Other Gameplay.Swain_103: "Any man who must say "We are winning," is not truly winning."
Other Gameplay.Swain_105: "They flee Noxus on the roads we built!"
Other Gameplay.Swain_106: "One more push, and they will break."

Upon Respawning.Swain_124: "I have already walked the halls of death, in the immortal bastion."
Upon Respawning.Swain_127: "Am I reborn? The truth is rarely so simple."
Upon Respawning.Swain_129: "It is there in the silence after battle. It is there in me."

Attacking.Caitlyn.attack2: "Meet the long gun of the law."
Attacking.Caitlyn.attack4: "So many bad guys, so little time."
Attacking.Caitlyn.attack5: "Who doesn't like being under the gun?"
Attacking.Caitlyn.attack7: "Sorry boys, I keep the fuzzy cuffs at home."

Movement.Caitlyn.move4: "I have the tools for the job."
Movement.Caitlyn.move8: "Me, miss? Not by a long shot."

Taunt.Caitlyn.taunt1: "Want another shot? I wouldn't want to leave things up in the air."
Taunt.Caitlyn.taunt2: "Would you prefer the good cop, or the bad cop?"

Joke.Caitlyn.joke1: "A sniper's greatest tool is precision... and good equipment."
Joke.Caitlyn.joke2: "The whole is greater than the sum of its... parts."

Taunt.Blitzcrank.taunt: "The time of man has come to an end."

Joke.Blitzcrank.joke: "I put the 'go' in 'golem'. That was humor. Other golems find that to be appropriately funny."

Movement.Malphite.move7: "I'm moving as fast as I can."

Joke.Malphite.joke: "Caught between a rock... and a hard place."

Taunt.Katarina.taunt2: "Come on, live a little... while you can!"

Joke.Katarina.joke: "If you run, you won't see me stab you!"

Movement.Nocturne.move5: "People are flames to be blotted out."
Movement.Nocturne.move9: "Are you my nightmare, or am I yours?"

Taunt.Nocturne.taunt: "Bring me more flesh bags to slice up!"

Joke.Nocturne.joke: "Weather forecast for tonight: dark, with a chance of pain!"

Upon Starting a Game.Maokai.start01: "Beset by spirits, my home laid to waste... and they call me twisted."
Upon Starting a Game.Maokai.start02: "Life can come back, once the earth is turned."
Upon Starting a Game.Maokai.start03: "The water of life succumbed to death. The mortals will follow."

Attacking.Maokai.attack06: "It is good to ungnarl my limbs."
Attacking.Maokai.attack09: "To find life, I will snuff yours out."
Attacking.Maokai.attack16: "Vengeance may be hollow, but so is my trunk!"

Movement.Maokai.move02: "Flee into the forest? I am the forest."
Movement.Maokai.move03: "I cannot find peace! Not even in the smallest branch!"
Movement.Maokai.move05: "They trample life! I will trample them!"
Movement.Maokai.move08: "I do nature's bidding... to the very end."
Movement.Maokai.move09: "Oh... where did I put that sapling?"
Movement.Maokai.move10: "Living or dead, they are all the same."
Movement.Maokai.move11: "We must pull up our roots. Darkness corrupts the land."
Movement.Maokai.move13: "Life here existed in a time before death."
Movement.Maokai.move14: "What have you wrought, mortals? What have I?"
Movement.Maokai.move16: "A shadow has fallen, as men have fallen."
Movement.Maokai.move17: "There is beauty here, even now, in the human's fear."
Movement.Maokai.move18: "I will show them what was lost in the ruination."
Movement.Maokai.move22: "Stillness is not peace! It is death!"
Movement.Maokai.move23: "If I am already lost, I will take them with me."
Movement.Maokai.move24: "Once they were human. Now, they are only in my way."
Movement.Maokai.move25: "Mortals irritate me, like an itch beneath my bark."
Movement.Maokai.move26: "I cannot stop. The forest needs me."
Movement.Maokai.move27: "The Mist haunts my every move, yet I resist."
Movement.Maokai.move28: "I will end this misuse of magic!"
Movement.Maokai.move29: "I will fight for every pebble, every blade of grass."
Movement.Maokai.move30: "I once had peace. It is better to have purpose!"
Movement.Maokai.move31: "Once my limbs reached for the sky, now for nearest mortal neck!"
Movement.Maokai.move32: "I can watch the mortals doom themselves from here."
Movement.Maokai.move33: "The green in these plants, it is something I have lost."
Movement.Maokai.move36: "There is life still untouched by the Mist."
Movement.Maokai.move37: "The young sprouts beneath my feet, they tremble."

Joke.Maokai.joke01: "The circle of life starts with death."
Joke.Maokai.joke03: "I love all my saplings, especially how they taste."

Taunt.Maokai.taunt02: "The sapling does not fall far from the treant!"
Taunt.Maokai.taunt03: "If a human screams in the forest, will anyone hear it?"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntShadowIslesAlly02: "I am nothing like you! I can't be!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntShadowIslesAlly03: "For the forest to bloom, I will tolerate your presence."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntShadowIslesEnemy01: "Come and meet your end - and a sapling or two."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntShadowIslesEnemy02: "There is still life enough within me to grant you death."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntShadowIslesEnemy03: "Your existence was not meant to be."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntElise01: "Oh, what mortals will do for beauty. Kill, and wear pointy shoes."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntHecarim01: "Trample that blade of grass, horseman. I dare you."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntHecarim02: "One of many shadows on the Isles. The Shadow of War."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntKalista01: "It is the Isles that were betrayed!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntKalista02: "Spirit of vengeance? And what of the forest?"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntKarthus02: "The saplings wish to hear your dirge. Please, sing it... while I destroy you!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntKarthus03: "You make me glad I don't have ears."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntMordekaiser01: "Another pile of bones wearing a crown."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntMordekaiser02: "Rival to the Ruined King - in ruin."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntThresh01: "It is torture enough being near you, spirit."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntThresh02: "A lantern? Ha! The forest is very dark indeed."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntThresh03: "The soul of the Isles is lost - beyond your grasp."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntYorick01: "So you're what passes for a hero among the fleshlings?"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntYorick02: "The Isles have forgotten more than just your name."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntYorick03: "Have you ever tried to dig through roots? Good luck, human."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntYorick04: "You would scour the Isles without planting a seed."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntAxe01: "An axe is no danger if I cut you down first!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntMage01: "Magic came from nature, and will return to nature."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntAhri01: "I'd like you more if you were a fox."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntBard01: "You make me glad I don't have ears."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntDarius01: "Strength starts in the roots - and you have none."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntFiddlesticks01: "You give sticks a bad name, and fiddles too!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntGaren01: "Stop carving words into my bark! Everyone knows G <3 K!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntGaren02: "Demacia's walls will not stop the Black Mist."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntIvern04: "Make like a tree and vacate the area."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntJayce01: "A voice follows this one! A song, like those in the Mist!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntKindred01: "The forest clings to life, and you would end it!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntLucian01: "The forest clings to life, and you would end it!"
Taunt.Maokai.tauntNautilus01: "Darkness gathers on the Isles - from every depth."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntSona01: "You make me glad I don't have ears."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntZyra02: "The most beautiful flowers have the sharpest thorns."
Taunt.Maokai.tauntZyra03: "It was a mistake to become human. You will share their doom."
Taunt.Maokai.interactionTauntEnemy01: "Impressive words - but I'm a tree. I don't care."
Taunt.Maokai.interactionTauntYorickEnemy01: "Silence, mortal. You only give voice to darkness."

Upon Casting Sapling Toss.Maokai.spellE1: "Give them room to spread their leaves!"
Upon Casting Sapling Toss.Maokai.spellEIvern01: "Greenfather, my sapling wishes to meet you."
Upon Casting Sapling Toss.Maokai.spellEIvern03: "The Greenfather spreads life. The Mist will end it."

Upon Buying....Maokai.itemDoransShield01: "I wondered what happened to that tree."
Upon Buying....Maokai.itemIcebornGauntlet02: "From a land where the trees are hardy and tall... and very, very cold."
Upon Buying....Maokai.itemWarmogsArmor01: "Is it woven from branches? I can never tell."
Upon Buying....Maokai.itemWarmogsArmor02: "To aid the waters within my wood."

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Maokai.kill04: "I would end your burden, but it always returns."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Maokai.kill05: "Enough bark, and there's no need for a bite."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Maokai.killJungle01: "You would fight the forest in the forest?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Maokai.killIvern01: "A friend of the forest no more."

Attacking.Renekton.attack6: "Light meat, dark meat, it's all the same."

Taunt.Renekton.taunt: "Come back when you've collected all the bits of yourself!"
Taunt.Renekton.tauntNasus1: "You should have done a better job locking me away, Nasus!"

Joke.Renekton.joke: "What? Do I have someone in my teeth?"

Ascension.Renekton.attack10: "They will feel pain they've never imagined."
Ascension.Renekton.tauntXerath1: "Xerath, we will give them what they deserve."
Ascension.Renekton.tauntXerath2: "Trapped in a box so long, Xerath! They never should have let us out!"

Champion Select.JarvanIV_Select: "By my will, this shall be finished."

Attacking.Jarvan.attack5: "Ours is but to do and die."

Movement.Jarvan.move8: "Today is a good day to die!"
Movement.Jarvan.move9: "We shall rest when we are dead!"

Taunt.Jarvan.taunt: "Fetch the rest of your team... I'll wait."
Taunt.Jarvan.taunt2: "You like my weapon? Come on over for a closer inspection!"

Joke.Jarvan.joke: "Sunder any army, crumble any mountain, leap the great--- owwawww... oh, my toesies."
Joke.Jarvan.joke2: "Awareness is the key to victory! Be sure you never let your guard dow--- awwowawwoah."

Champion Select.Elise_Select: "Only the spider is safe in her web."

Movement.EliseSpider.move4: "How fast can they run on two legs?"

Joke.EliseSpider.joke1: "Ha! It's all in the body language."
Joke.EliseSpider.joke2: "Ha! Ladies wish they had legs like me."

Taunt.EliseSpider.taunt1: "The spider, I. And you, the fly."

Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.WestAltar.Elise1: "Your power is not worth the price, Elise."
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.WestAltar.Elise2: "Your humanity traded away, and for what?"
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Elise2: "We thank you for your gifts, Elise!"

Champion Select.Orianna_Select: "We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

Taunt.Oriana.taunt: "I know what makes them tick. I know how to make the ticking stop."

Joke.Oriana.joke1: "They come apart so easily. How do you put them back together again?"
Joke.Oriana.joke2: "When you fall, you get right back up."

Taunt.Wukong.taunt: "Improve your skills! Then find me again."

Joke.Wukong.joke1: "No matter how far it is to the top, it's still within my grasp!"
Joke.Wukong.joke2: "I bet I can hit their base from here!"

Champion Select.Brand_Select: "Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

Attacking.Brand.attack6: "Some say the world will end in fire."

Movement.Brand.move8: "This body is just one of many!"
Movement.Brand.move9: "I am the fire that cleanses the world!"

Joke.Brand.joke: "Is it hot in here or is it just me?!"

Taunt.Lee_Sin.taunt2: "You have not earned victory this day."

Joke.Lee_Sin.joke: "Blindness is no impairment against a smelly enemy."

Champion Select.Vayne_Select: "Let us hunt those who have fallen to darkness."

Movement.Vayne.move6: "In the dark all is laid bare."

Taunt.Vayne.taunt: "Hitting me is like boxing with shadows."

Attacking.Rumble.attack6: "The bigger they are, the harder I hit 'em."

Movement.Rumble.move7: "You don't have to tell me twice."

Taunt.Rumble.taunt: "Come on, I'm not even holding the controls!"

Joke.Rumble.joke1: "Turbo on---! Uh... woah---! Just needs a little kick start there."

Upon Overheating.Rumble.overheat1: "Hot hot hot! Oh! Ah! Hot hot hot hot hot!"
Upon Overheating.Rumble.overheat4: "Hot hot hot hot hot hot hot! Ooh, aah!"

Upon Starting a Game.Cassiopeia.start01: "Who will have the fortune of facing me today?"
Upon Starting a Game.Cassiopeia.start02: "So many strings waiting to be pulled."

Attacking.Cassiopeia.attack02: "Do not turn your back on me."

Movement.Cassiopeia.move04: "I'm not so easy to get out of your system."
Movement.Cassiopeia.move06: "Keep your enemies close - and me closer."
Movement.Cassiopeia.move11: "Do you have a longing? Would you like one?"
Movement.Cassiopeia.move13: "If you don't control pawns, you are one."
Movement.Cassiopeia.move19: "I like to leave a lasting impression."
Movement.Cassiopeia.move20: "Wealth is valuable only as a means to power."

Joke.Cassiopeia.joke01: "If you wanna' be on top, you have to reach for it."
Joke.Cassiopeia.joke02: "No legs but I still have a little spring in my step."

Taunt.Cassiopeia.taunt02: "It's just not possible to sink to the level of this competition."
Taunt.Cassiopeia.taunt03: "Sometimes failure just creeps right up on you, doesn't it?"
Taunt.Cassiopeia.tauntAzir01: "Azir, I intend to prove a powerful ally."
Taunt.Cassiopeia.tauntAzir02: "Our interests align, Azir. Let us pursue them together."
Taunt.Cassiopeia.tauntAzir03: "Our interests align, Azir. Let us pursue them together."
Taunt.Cassiopeia.tauntSivir01: "Oh, Sivir, all you ever needed was a sharp prodding."
Taunt.Cassiopeia.tauntSivir02: "Apologies, Sivir, I dispose of tools that have exhausted their use."

Upon Buying....Cassiopeia.attack19: "I do love getting up close and personal."
Upon Buying....Cassiopeia.attack20: "We all wear masks. Some better than others."
Upon Buying....Cassiopeia.attack21: "Let's enjoy our company just a little bit longer."

Upon Casting Recall.Cassiopeia.recall01: "I may leave, but I'm never gone."

Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension05: "The simple seek to achieve Ascension. The wise prepare to exploit it."
Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension06: "A Noxian always rises to the top."
Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension03: "Yes! Now who shall have my attention?"
Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension04: "It seems I must handle things personally."
Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension01: "The power is yours, now! Use it!"
Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension07: "This is Ascension in the hands of a Noxian!"
Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension08: "Failure is an elegant poison. Let it seep in."
Ascension.Cassiopeia.ascension10: "Our every move led only to this moment!"

Taunt.Skarner.taunt: "I... am... ancient! You are nothing more than an insect to me!"

Joke.Skarner.joke2: "Oh no! I seem to have stepped on one of my cousins!"

Attacking.Heimerdinger.attack10: "Stop that! You will damage my turrets!"
Attacking.Heimerdinger.attack17: "I require my adjustable reverse-ratcheting magnetic box wrench!"
Attacking.Heimerdinger.attack18: "Stand back! I am about to do... science!"
Attacking.Heimerdinger.attack19: "They'll have a few screws loose by the end of this!"
Attacking.Heimerdinger.attack20: "This will put a wrench in their plans!"

Movement.Heimerdinger.move06: "Yes, yes, hurry, I have important work to get back to!"
Movement.Heimerdinger.move18: "Aha, 42, I knew it! Now - er, what was the question again?"
Movement.Heimerdinger.move19: "42... there's just something about that number."
Movement.Heimerdinger.move24: "Not enough variables... hmm... not nearly enough variables."
Movement.Heimerdinger.move25: "Order, entropy; a never ending cycle. Or is it?"

Joke.Heimerdinger.joke01: "Why do chemists call helium, curium, and barium 'the medical elements'? Because, if you can't 'helium' or 'curium', you 'barium'! Hm hm!"
Joke.Heimerdinger.joke02: "Why do people say 'you can't trust atoms'? Because they 'make up everything'! Hehe!"
Joke.Heimerdinger.joke03: "There are three key ingredients to invention: excessive imagination, good old fashioned stick-to-it-iveness, and a rocking good hairstyle!"

Taunt.Heimerdinger.taunt01: "I prefer a battle of wits, but you're unarmed!"
Taunt.Heimerdinger.taunt02: "Don't worry, you can learn so much from failure."
Taunt.Heimerdinger.tauntJayce01: "Ah, Jayce. Mind if I borrow some of your 'hexpertise'?"
Taunt.Heimerdinger.tauntVi01: "Groundbreaking hextech innovation employed in the service... of punching."
Taunt.Heimerdinger.tauntZiggs01: "I don't agree with your methods, but by golly, do you get results!"
Taunt.Heimerdinger.tauntViktor01: "If you seek to replace all humans, there will be no one left to appreciate your work."
Taunt.Heimerdinger.tauntZiggs04: "Would you mind taking your hexplosives elsewhere?"

Champion Select.Nasus_Select: "The cycle of life and death continues. We will live, they will die."

Movement.Nasus.move09: "The sky was naught but dying stars."
Movement.Nasus.move16: "The past is a tapestry of what lies ahead."

Attacking.Nasus.attack04: "Life is part of a cycle. Yours is over."

Joke.Nasus.joke01: "Who let the dogs out? Woof. Woof. Woof."
Joke.Nasus.joke02: "No, I will not fetch the ball."
Joke.Nasus.joke03: "My bite is worse than my bark."

Taunt.Nasus.taunt01: "Your legacy shall drift away; blown into eternity, like the sands of the desert."
Taunt.Nasus.taunt02: "There is such potential in one mortal life; you have wasted yours."
Taunt.Nasus.Renektontaunt01: "Rage burned away all that was good in you, my brother."
Taunt.Nasus.Renektontaunt02: "Renekton was lost, long ago. You are but his pale shadow."

Attacking.Nidalee.attack1: "Claw or spear, your end's the same."
Attacking.Nidalee.attack5: "I'll show these house cats real claws."

Attacking.Udyr.attack4: "We will make use of their pelts."
Attacking.Udyr.attack5: "Their death will only feed our rage."

Taunt.Udyr.taunt: "We do not know pity, even for you!"

Joke.Udyr.joke: "If PETA asks, this fur is fake."

Champion Select.Poppy_Select_new: "I'm no hero - just a Yordle with a hammer."
Champion Select.Poppy.taunt01: "Seems you left your brave pants at home. Want me to wait while you go get them?"

Upon Starting a Game.Poppy.start01: "The hammer isn't mine, just keeping it until the real guy shows up."
Upon Starting a Game.Poppy.start02: "I've heard a lot about this hero with a hammer, can't wait to meet him."
Upon Starting a Game.Poppy.start03: "Hmm... if I were a hero, where would I hide...?"
Upon Starting a Game.Poppy.start04: "Not coming back 'til I find that hero."
Upon Starting a Game.Poppy.start05: "One time I thought I found the hero... but he died."
Upon Starting a Game.Poppy.start06: "Today's the day I find that hero."

Attacking.Poppy.attackDragon01: "This guy seems nice. I feel bad about killing him."
Attacking.Poppy.attackDragon02: "I really don't have anything against dragons."
Attacking.Poppy.attackDragon03: "Nothing personal, but... I need to squash you."
Attacking.Poppy.attack18: "This should really be the hero's job."

Movement.Poppy.move01: "What do you mean my hammer's too big?"
Movement.Poppy.move02: "If you're waiting for me to give up, you might be here a while."
Movement.Poppy.move04: "I sure do a lot of walking."
Movement.Poppy.move05: "Yep, it's even heavier than it looks."
Movement.Poppy.move06: "Oh, you like to fight? So does my hammer!"
Movement.Poppy.move10: "Some things are too important to give up on."
Movement.Poppy.move11: "Who knew there were so many heroes?"
Movement.Poppy.move13: "The hammer does most of the work, I just swing it."
Movement.Poppy.move18: "Sometimes you just gotta' do it yourself."
Movement.Poppy.move21: "Know what I could use? A cart."
Movement.Poppy.move22: "I could really go for a nap."

Taunt.Poppy.taunt01: "Seems you left your brave pants at home. Want me to wait while you go get them?"
Taunt.Poppy.taunt02: "This hammer has two sides. Did you want to feel the other one too?"
Taunt.Poppy.taunt03: "Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, uh... hammer!"
Taunt.Poppy.taunt04: "Could you maybe get out of the way? Y'know, so I don't have to flatten you."
Taunt.Poppy.tauntGalio01: "You know, gargoyles and Yordles have a lot in common."
Taunt.Poppy.tauntGaren01: "Oh, wow, Garen, do you think you could sign my shield?"
Taunt.Poppy.tauntGaren02: "Garen, I think you might be the one!"
Taunt.Poppy.tauntJarvan01: "A pleasure to fight for you, your majesty."
Taunt.Poppy.tauntJarvan01.1: "You sure you wanna do this? You don't even have a weapon."
Taunt.Poppy.tauntJayce01: "That's not a hammer! This is a hammer."
Taunt.Poppy.tauntLeona01: "Look at all that shiny armor. Sorry I gotta mess it up."
Taunt.Poppy.tauntTaric01: "I'm about to hammer you in the jewels."

Joke.Poppy.joke02: "A Demacian, a Noxian and a Freljordian walk into a tavern."
Joke.Poppy.joke04: "The Demacian says, 'Uh, I'll have a wine.' No, wait, an ale! Yeah... "
Joke.Poppy.joke05: "Then the Noxian says, 'I'll have a... a wine.' Yeah, he wants a wine."
Joke.Poppy.joke06: "And the Freljordian says, 'I'll drink anything, so long as--- ' Wait, hold on, let me start over."
Joke.Poppy.joke07: "A Noxian, a Targonian and a Piltie are robbing a bank."
Joke.Poppy.joke08: "The bank guy says, 'I'll give you whatever you want.'"
Joke.Poppy.joke09: "The Noxian says, 'I'll take whatever gold you got back there.'"
Joke.Poppy.joke11: "And the Piltie says, 'Can I own this ba--- uh, I own this bank, so...' He doesn't want anything because he owns the bank... "

Upon Knocking Away an Enemy with a fully.Poppy.R6: "Huh. Didn't know I could do that."
Upon Knocking Away an Enemy with a fully.Poppy.jokeEkko01: "Wait, you're here? I thought you were there."

Upon Buying an Item.Poppy.item02: "Yeah, just like the hero would buy."
Upon Buying an Item.Poppy.itemAegis01: "One shield for throwing, and one for holding."
Upon Buying an Item.Poppy.itemFrozenMallet02: "I'll just add it to my other hammer."
Upon Buying an Item.Poppy.itemFrozenMallet03: "Well, two hammers are better than one."
Upon Buying an Item.Poppy.itemNeedlesslyLargeRod01: "Hmm... nice weapon. Does it come in hammer?"
Upon Buying an Item.Poppy.itemWarmogsArmor01: "It's a little big, but I'll grow into it."

Upon Placing a Ward.Poppy.ward01: "Alright, sneakies... I know you're out there."

Upon Completing Recall.Poppy.fountain01: "Wait, what did I come back for?"

Upon Death.Poppy.respawn01: "One thing about me: I'm not good at staying down."
Upon Death.Poppy.respawn02: "That's okay. I'm playing the long game."

Taunt.Gragas_030: "I'll drink you under the table, scrub!"

Joke.Gragas_016: "The only time I have a drinking problem is when I spill it!"

Champion Select.Pantheon_Select: "They are privileged to die at my feet!"

Taunt.Pantheon.taunt: "Getting kicked into a well is the least of your worries!"

Joke.Pantheon.joke1: "My profession?! You know, now that I think of it, I've always wanted to be a baker."

Champion Select.Ezreal_Select: "Time for a true display of skill!"

Attacking.Mordekaiser.attack7: "This whole... living thing is... highly overrated."

Movement.Mordekaiser.move7: "You only need to click once, fool!"

Taunt.Mordekaiser.taunt: "Death would be too good for the likes of you!"

Joke.Mordekaiser.joke: "I like my weapons how I like my music... heavy and metal!"

Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.WestAltar.Mordekaiser2: "I serve you because I must, Mordekaiser."
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Mordekaiser2: "Free me, my lord, so I may aid you!"

Champion Select.Yorick_Select_new: "Fear not... I will make use of your corpse."

Upon Starting a Game.Yorick.start01: "I once had honor before the Ruination."
Upon Starting a Game.Yorick.start02: "This land will never heal. But I will lay it to rest."
Upon Starting a Game.Yorick.start03: "Tired, ancient, and half-dead. Still, I come for you."
Upon Starting a Game.Yorick.start10: "I am the rift between life and death. The thin divide between breath and grave."

Attacking.Yorick.attack12: "You decay and do not know it."
Attacking.Yorick.attack15: "I will not damn you. I will end you."
Attacking.Yorick.attackBaron01: "That is a lot of flesh to raise."
Attacking.Yorick.attackBaron02: "Even your kind will join the mist."
Attacking.Yorick.attackDragon01: "Your kind is supposed to live long. I am sorry."

Movement.Yorick.move01: "What I do is just. Every horrid piece of it."
Movement.Yorick.move02: "The Mist writhes, searching for a place to take root."
Movement.Yorick.move04: "We're dead much longer than we are alive."
Movement.Yorick.move05: "What hell is worse than this limbo?"
Movement.Yorick.move06: "Everyone I knew is dead. How are things with you?"
Movement.Yorick.move07: "They once called these isles undying. Yet die, they will."
Movement.Yorick.move08: "How quick the turn from blessed to cursed."
Movement.Yorick.move11: "The beyond is waiting. Strive to meet it."
Movement.Yorick.move12: "I am no tyrant. These souls act on their own."
Movement.Yorick.move14: "The isles were once paradise; now they're a prison."
Movement.Yorick.move16: "The constant wailing of souls in torment."
Movement.Yorick.move17: "I cling to life by the thinnest thread."
Movement.Yorick.move18: "If they could see what I see, they'd long for death."
Movement.Yorick.move19: "But for the waters, the mist would take me."
Movement.Yorick.move20: "The Ruined King will soon meet the victims of his curse."
Movement.Yorick.move21: "From the ground they come, and to it, they return."
Movement.Yorick.move22: "Ours is a fate worse than death."
Movement.Yorick.move23: "I carry these souls to their end... wherever it may be."
Movement.Yorick.move24: "Water for the living, shovel for the dead."
Movement.Yorick.move25: "Our souls are a small price to pay to cleanse this land."
Movement.Yorick.move26: "I am the first and last of my order."
Movement.Yorick.move28: "I remember when I put them in the ground."
Movement.Yorick.move30: "To most, life is fleeting; to me, it is quagmire."
Movement.Yorick.move33: "Tell me of the beyond... in case I never make it."
Movement.Yorick.move35: "The Ruined King's allies shall fall with him."
Movement.Yorick.move36: "One can stare into the grave too long."
Movement.Yorick.move37: "This journey is long, but I will complete it."
Movement.Yorick.move38: "I do not live in hope. I work to return it."
Movement.Yorick.move40: "Do you hear that? It is the end."
Movement.Yorick.move42: "Hallowed or profane... I no longer know."
Movement.Yorick.move44: "It is to the grave, we go."
Movement.Yorick.move46: "Remember my name. For one day, I will not."
Movement.Yorick.move47: "I do not know what lies beyond. But it is better than this."
Movement.Yorick.move48: "The dead don't hear you, no matter how you cry."
Movement.Yorick.move49: "The dead shall forgive me. I hope."

Joke.Yorick.joke01: "Ah, missed it. There it goes! Where is it at? - ah! Yes!"
Joke.Yorick.jokeAmumu01: "Ah, would you like some friends? Nope, can’t have 'em."
Joke.Yorick.interactionJokeEnemy01: "I suppose I have eternity to think about that one."

Taunt.Yorick.taunt01: "You'll make a fine addition to my cloak."
Taunt.Yorick.taunt02: "For you, I won't dig too deep."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntMutant01: "I pity what you have become. Shall I end your suffering?"
Taunt.Yorick.tauntEkkoZilean01: "I have nothing but time. Show me something else."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntYordle01: "Yours is an easy grave to dig, small one."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntChild01: "They say I was once your age, though I can't quite recall."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntAzir01: "Your corpses against mine. May the best win."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntHecarim01: "Those you ride down will soon rise against you."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntKalista01: "You and I share a common goal. The similarities end there."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntKarthus01: "Enjoy this limbo while you can, for I will soon end it."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntKindred01: "I know you. And I see you always."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntKindred02: "One day, you will take me. May it be soon."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntLucian01: "No, Lucian, I haven't seen your wife."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntLux01: "You remind me that the world is sometimes good - and very naive."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntMaokai01: "I fight to free you as well - though a hatchet would suffice."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntMordekaiser01: "My army will soon storm your gates, revenant."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntRyze01: "Yours is a fool's errand. The world must be allowed to die."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntSinged01: "You think you want immortality. I'll gladly give you mine."
Taunt.Yorick.tauntThresh01: "Those souls are not yours to keep."
Taunt.Yorick.interactionTauntEnemy01: "I've endured more pain than any words can bring."
Taunt.Yorick.interactionTauntEnemy04: "Ah yes, I remember spewing idle words."

Laugh.Yorick.interactionLaughEnemy01: "Ah yes, I remember what laughter sounds like."

Upon Casting Awakening.Yorick.spellQ7: "Some of these faces I know well."
Upon Casting Awakening.Yorick.spellQ10: "Wake up. You have a new task."
Upon Casting Awakening.Yorick.spellQ11: "Die with me brothers, and be free."
Upon Casting Awakening.Yorick.spellQ14: "Welcome back, you won't be here long."

Upon Casting Dark Procession.Yorick.spellW3: "The ruins of these isles rise to smite you."
Upon Casting Dark Procession.Yorick.spellW5: "To destroy the curse, I use it."

Upon Casting Eulogy of the Isles.Yorick.spellR3: "See the  Maiden? She comes for you."
Upon Casting Eulogy of the Isles.Yorick.spellR9: "We are not corruption. We are strength!"
Upon Casting Eulogy of the Isles.Yorick.spellR10: "More, more for the black maw of the mist!"

Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.item01: "Don't bury me with it. You can't take it with you."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.item02: "Even a monk needs bread and water."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemRubyCrystal01: "It pulses with life, as the isles once did."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemRubyCrystal02: "Red is the heart that barely beats in me."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemClothArmor01: "I wouldn't be caught dead in that."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemClothArmor03: "A sack to cover flesh and bone."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemClothArmor04: "The armor of someone soon to die."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemIcebornGauntlet01: "As cold as the hand of death."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemSteraksGage01: "A gauntlet to throw before the king."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemBladeOfTheRuinedKing01.3: "A tyrant who will pay for his crimes."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemBladeOfTheRuinedKing01.4: "And I will use it to undo them."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemDeadMansPlate02: "Taken from one who can no longer use it."
Upon Buying an Item.Yorick.itemDeadMansPlate03: "The dead need no armor, but I do."

Upon Killing a Champion.Yorick.kill01: "Another voice in the cacophony of wails."
Upon Killing a Champion.Yorick.killShadowIsles01: "One more nail in the coffin of the isles."

Upon Casting Recall.Yorick.recall04: "My path is a circle, my work never-ending."

Upon Death.Yorick.respawn02: "I've come too far to stay dead."
Upon Death.Yorick.respawn03: "We do not die, and so we fight on."
Upon Death.Yorick.respawn06: "One day, I will no longer awaken."
Upon Death.Yorick.respawn08: "A futile act, why do you persist?"
Upon Death.Yorick.respawn09: "The beyond is not given. It is earned."
Upon Death.Yorick.respawn11: "There will be no requiem. Not yet."

Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Yorick1: "Get to your task, gravedigger! Make our numbers endless!"
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Yorick2: "Bring out your dead! Bring out your dead!!"
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Yorick3: "Slay them, gravedigger! Make them serve us!"

Taunt.Akali.taunt: "I suggest you run... I want to savor this."

Joke.Akali.joke: "So many noobs... will matchmaking ever find true balance?"

Taunt.Kennen.taunt: "Big targets are the best! There's more to aim at!"

Champion Select.Garen_Select: "My heart and sword always for Demacia."
Champion Select.Garen.move13: "Fear is the first of many foes."

Attacking.Garen.attack07: "I will fight as long as I stand!"

Movement.Garen.move13: "Fear is the first of many foes."

Taunt.Garen.taunt01: "Come forth, you will find honor in death."
Taunt.Garen.taunt02: "The glory of Demacia will never fade."
Taunt.Garen.taunt03: "No matter your numbers, I will not yield."
Taunt.Garen.Dariustaunt2: "Darius, you are a butcher, not a general."
Taunt.Garen.Dariustaunt3: "Extend the hand of Noxus, pull back a stump."

Joke.Garen.joke01: "I've got a lot of weight on my shoulders!"
Joke.Garen.joke02: "Hey, look, I'm holding the world up!"
Joke.Garen.joke03: "I could do this for hours. Really."
Joke.Garen.Katarinajoke1: "Seven thousand and two--- oh, I didn't see you standing there."

Taunt.Leona.taunt: "Next time, try to leave a dent."

Joke.Leona.joke1: "Don't stare directly at me for too long."
Joke.Leona.joke2: "I think I broke a nail, good thing it wasn't mine."

Taunt.Malzahar.taunt2: "Bow to the void! Or be consumed by it!"

Joke.Malzahar.joke: "I think a Voidling just came out!"

Taunt.Talon.taunt1: "Eventually, my blades will find their way into your heart."
Taunt.Talon.taunt2: "Have you anything to offer but weakness?!"

Joke.Talon.joke1: "Ugh, I lost another blade. I wonder who it's in this time."
Joke.Talon.joke2: "The worst part of losing a blade is trying to trace back all my stabbings."

Taunt.Riven.taunt: "A broken blade is more than enough for the likes of you!"

Joke.Riven.joke: "I knew I should have sprung for the blade warranty."
Joke.Riven.ultjoke: "This is why I spend so much time sheath shopping."

Taunt.Shen.taunt: "You're already dead, you just haven't caught up yet."

Joke.Shen.joke: "If light travels so fast, how come it's never caught a ninja?"

Champion Select.Lux_Ban: "But all my light puns would've brightened your day."

Upon Starting a Game.Lux.start02: "The sun is shining - we should too."
Upon Starting a Game.Lux.start04: "I've been hiding my light long enough."

Attacking.Lux.attack09: "I have to focus, but I can't stop smiling!"
Attacking.Lux.attack12: "Curiosity's going to kill one of us."
Attacking.Lux.attack13: "If you hate magic, you're already blind."
Attacking.Lux.attack15: "Hey, who are you calling a lady?"

Movement.Lux.move06: "If you can smile, you can be the light."
Movement.Lux.move13: "I don't have dark secrets - I have bright ones."
Movement.Lux.move15: "The superior tactic is to never give up."

Joke.Lux.joke02: "Well, a double rainbow is a phenomenon of optics that displays a spectrum of light due to the sun shining on droplets of moisture in the atmosphere. Does that explain it?"

Taunt.Lux.taunt01: "We should try being friends first, no?"
Taunt.Lux.taunt02: "Hello, person-who-irrationally-wants-to-kill-me! It's so good to meet you!"
Taunt.Lux.taunt03: "You don't like me? Well, I'd rather talk to a statue."
Taunt.Lux.tauntDemaciaAlly01: "We're all so concerned about what Demacia is, we forget to ask what it can be."
Taunt.Lux.tauntDemaciaAlly02: "I believe in you, not just Demacia."
Taunt.Lux.tauntNoxian01: "Demacia and Noxus are just lines on a map."
Taunt.Lux.tauntNoxian02: "Do you ever charge into battle screaming, "NOXUS!" Aw, too bad."
Taunt.Lux.tauntShadowIsles01: "You know... you couldn't have shadows without light."
Taunt.Lux.tauntGarenAlly01: "Being a hero kind of runs in the family."
Taunt.Lux.tauntKatarina01: "Kat and Garen sitting in a tree~ And you better just be holding hands or I'm telling!"
Taunt.Lux.tauntEzreal01: "Are we supposed to be... dating... or something? We've never even talked."
Taunt.Lux.tauntGalioAlly01: "With my magic, and your anti-magic, there's nothing we can't accomplish."
Taunt.Lux.tauntGalioEnemy01: "Hey, sleepyhead, you coming to the fight or what?"
Taunt.Lux.tauntJarvan01: "I'm a Crownguard but you wear the crown. You're a Lightshield but I wield the light. But eh-uh-I mean, metaphorically, your highness."
Taunt.Lux.tauntLucian01: "I'm sure your wife forgives you for getting her soul taken by a remorseless creature of darkness!"
Taunt.Lux.tauntSona01: "Sona! I'm your biggest fan! I even know what an Etwahl is!"
Taunt.Lux.tauntLeona01: "You brought the sun to a light fight?! That... was... probably a good choice, actually... "
Taunt.Lux.tauntRyze01: "I don't get runes. I mean, are spells really that hard to remember?"
Taunt.Lux.tauntTaliyahEnemy02: "Who do you want to be when you grow up?"
Taunt.Lux.tauntTwitch01: "You look like you need a hug...but is it okay if I hold my nose?"

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Lux.kill02: "The light will guide you - even now."

Upon Respawning.Lux.move16: "The thing about light is... it never really dies."
Upon Respawning.Lux.move17: "We all shine on - like a diamond."
Upon Respawning.Lux.move18: "Losing is just an opportunity to shine even brighter."

Movement.Xerath.move06: "The secrets of magic are mine alone."
Movement.Xerath.move08: "The affairs of mortals are beneath me."
Movement.Xerath.move09: "The world may crumble, but I shall remain."
Movement.Xerath.move12: "I see the forces that hold the universe together."
Movement.Xerath.move13: "I am the will of man unbound by flesh."
Movement.Xerath.move14: "I stand at the brink of infinity."

Taunt.Xerath.taunt01: "It will take only a spark of my magic to end you."
Taunt.Xerath.taunt02: "You may stare, but your mind may collapse."

Taunting an enemy Azir.Xerath.tauntAzir01: "Azir, at long last, we will see what power you truly possess."
Taunting an enemy Azir.Xerath.tauntAzir02: "You are emperor of a wasteland, Azir."
Taunting an enemy Azir.Xerath.tauntAzir03: "Azir, the boy destined to chase the sun."
Taunting an enemy Azir.Xerath.tauntAzir04: "This time, Azir, I will need no surprise to topple you."

Taunting an enemy Nasus.Xerath.tauntNasus01: "Nasus, the loyal pup, ever nipping at my heels."

Taunting an enemy Syndra.Xerath.tauntSyndra: "You chase power, Syndra. I am power!"

Taunting an enemy Thresh.Xerath.tauntThresh: "Those chains cannot hold me either, jailer."

Joke.Xerath.joke01: "Power, immortality, omniscience... but no leg room?!"
Joke.Xerath.joke02: "Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt! Lightning bolt!"

Attacking.Shyvana.attack6: "By the blood of my father, I will end them."

Movement.ShyvanaDragon.move2: "Tremble before the power of a dragon."

Taunt.Shyvana.taunt: "Come get a glimpse into the belly of the beast!"
Taunt.ShyvanaDragon.taunt: "Think you're a dragon slayer? Come here and try."

Joke.Shyvana.joke: "What do you get when a dragon sneezes? (chuckles) Out of the way."

Attacking.Ahri.attack5: "No one will stand in my way."

Joke.Ahri.joke: "If you'd like to play with me, you'd better be sure you know the game."

Taunt.Graves.taunt1: "Don't die, yet! Heh, that was only a warning shot."
Taunt.Graves.taunt2: "Hope you weren't planning to die of natural causes."

Joke.Graves.joke1: "I like my enemies two ways: dead, or about to be."
Joke.Graves.joke2: "Everyone's a hero... till you shoot off a leg or two."

Champion Select.Volibear_Select: "Let the storm follow in my wake."

Movement.Volibear.move2: "Let the storm follow in my wake."

Taunt.Volibear.taunt: "A fool and his head are easily parted."

Joke.Volibear.joke: "Hmm, I suppose you're expecting some unbearable pun."

Upon Killing an Enemy Zilean.Volibear.interaction1: "I have a special claw for you, Zilean."

Movement.Rengar.move9: "There is the hunter and the hunted."

Joke.Rengar.joke1: "All these trophies... I'm gonna need a bigger den!"
Joke.Rengar.joke2: "So much bloodshed... This is my kind of place!"

Taunt.Rengar.taunt1: "You have a warrior's heart. I think I'll take it."
Taunt.Rengar.taunt2: "You've earned a good death. I've earned the kill."

Movement.Varus.move1: "Beware a man with nothing to lose."

Joke.Varus.joke1: "You'd like some real amusement? Come closer."

Taunt.Varus.taunt2: "The cost of your life is one arrow."

Taunt.Nautilus.taunt: "You are in the deep end now!"

Joke.Nautilus.joke: "Sometimes I think this anchor just weighs me down."

Joke.Viktor.joke: "The key to the, uhh... huh? That is the, uhh... what? Urgh! Keep your hand to yourself!"
Joke.Viktor.joke2: "Listen close- urgh, I have important- urgh! This is why I can't take you nice places!"

Movement.Sejuani.move02: "Fight or make room for those who will."
Movement.Sejuani.move06: "Living in fear is not living at all."
Movement.Sejuani.move08: "I will not hide behind another shield."

Taunt.Sejuani.taunt02: "Don't worry, Bristle, I'll leave you the scraps."
Taunt.Sejuani.tauntAshe02: "Which will snap more easily? The bow, or you?"
Taunt.Sejuani.tauntLissandra02: "Are icicles the best you can muster?"

Joke.Sejuani.joke01: "Who wants a treat? Bristle wants a treat? Not until we've trampled our foes to dust!"

Movement.Fiora.move8: "Is this supposed to be a challenge?"

Joke.Fiora.joke2: "I am an artist with a sword, in more ways than one."

Taunt.Fiora.taunt2: "I like you. I hate to kill you."

Movement.Ziggs.move7: "What do you mean this doesn't look safe?"

Taunt.Ziggs.taunt1: "I'll take this one and this one and throw it in your face!"
Taunt.Ziggs.taunt2: "I like my enemies like I like my bombs: about to explode!"

Joke.Ziggs.joke1: "Come on! Does this look dangerous to you?"
Joke.Ziggs.joke2: "You wanna see how to disarm a bomb?"

Attacking.Lulu.attack4: "A solid giggle should do the trick."

Movement.Lulu.move4: "You'll see more with your eyes closed."
Movement.Lulu.move8: "Never look a tulip in the eye..."

Joke.Lulu.joke: "I could go for a twirl... Whoa, whoa whoa ah, wooh!"
Joke.Lulu.joke2: "Let's put on our thinking caps! Hmm... hmmhmm, hmmhmm... ah, I got it!"

Attacking.Draven.attack6: "Seems to be blood everywhere I go."

Champion Select.Hecarim_Select: "Behold, the might of the Shadow Isles."

Taunt.Hecarim.taunt1: "Your life is a burden. I bring you freedom!"
Taunt.Hecarim.taunt2: "You won't live to see your world destroyed."

Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.WestAltar.Hecarim2: " Mordekaiser is not to be trusted, Hecarim!"
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.WestAltar.Hecarim3: "I aid you because I must, Hecarim."
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Hecarim1: " Lead our charge, Hecarim, and may the living tremble!"
Twisted Treeline Altar Capture Responses.EastAltar.Hecarim2: "They will fear the thundering hooves of the dead!"

Joke.Khazix.joke1: "To truly know someone, eat them and walk a mile in their feet."
Joke.Khazix.joke2: "My purpose is eating deadly creatures. My hobby is eating Yordles."
Joke.Khazix.joke3: "I ate an optimist once, but I couldn't keep him down."

Taunt.Khazix.taunt1: "Do not fear death. The best part of you will live on!"
Taunt.Khazix.taunt2: "If I eat you, will I learn how to die?"

Taunt.Darius.taunt1: "Don't turn your back, or expose your neck."
Taunt.Darius.taunt2: "Defy Noxus and taste your own blood."

Taunt.Jayce.taunt1: "This is what the future looks like."

Champion Select.Lissandra_Select: "I will bury the world in ice."

Movement.Lissandra.move06: "Battles come and go. I am eternal."
Movement.Lissandra.move12: "This is but a battle. I've already won the war."

Taunt.Lissandra.taunt01: "I've been killing your kind for centuries!"
Taunt.Lissandra.taunt03: "The world began in ice and it will end in ice."
Taunt.Lissandra.taunt04: "Close your eyes and let the cold take you."
Taunt.Lissandra.tauntAshe: "I've killed so many queens I've lost count!"
Taunt.Lissandra.tauntSejuani: "Kneel before me and I will unleash your power!"

Joke.Lissandra.joke03: "Is it cold in here, or is it just me?"

Battle for Freljord.Lissandra.eventStarts: "At last, our ascension is at hand!"

Joke.Diana.joke1: "A man, a woman and a yordle walk into the sun. They die! Because it burns them alive? Heh heh heh heh."
Joke.Diana.joke2: "Knock, knock. Who's there? The moon... it's far away! You were alone the whole time! Ha ha ha!"

Taunt.Diana.taunt1: "They called me a heretic, now they are dead."
Taunt.Diana.taunt2: "The moon will rise. The night will last forever."

Champion Select.Quinn.taunt01: "I'd keep my head down if I were you."

Movement.Quinn.move02: "A bird's eye view is the best advantage."
Movement.Quinn.move10: "Sometimes I swear that bird is just showing off."

Joke.Quinn.joke02: "Who's there? Fiora who? Valor, that's just mean!"
Joke.Quinn.joke03: "Who's there? Garen who? Yeah, I guess he does say that a lot."

Taunt.Quinn.taunt01: "I'd keep my head down if I were you."
Taunt.Quinn.taunt03: "Valor's shadow is the last thing you'll see."

Movement.Syndra.move6: "More! I can be so much more!"

Joke.Syndra.joke1: "And they said I lacked balance. Ha!"

Taunt.Syndra.taunt1: "Immense power is fun! You should try it sometime."
Taunt.Syndra.taunt2: "A legion couldn't stop me. What chance do you have?"

Upon Starting a Game.AurelionSol.start01: "They call me a comet. They call me a dragon. They have no words for my true form."
Upon Starting a Game.AurelionSol.start02: "Cower, worship, beg, they're all valid reactions."
Upon Starting a Game.AurelionSol.start03: "In a constantly shifting cosmos, a world this static is... refreshing."
Upon Starting a Game.AurelionSol.start04: "There simply are no other dragons like me."
Upon Starting a Game.AurelionSol.start06: "Hope. Wonder. Insignificance. Imagine what they'll feel when I complete the stars."

Attacking.AurelionSol.attack03: "Let's end this on a high note!"
Attacking.AurelionSol.attack05: "Never stand in the path of a star."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attack07: "It's beyond too late to seek cover."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attack11: "Lighten up, destruction needn't be a maudlin affair."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attack12: "Suns never burn for the benefit of dust."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attack19: "I'm going to throw a star at you now. Good luck."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attack23: "Nothing a little star fire cannot fix."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attackDragon01: "Terrestrial dragons - a study of flawed constitutions."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attackDragon03: "You call yourself a dragon? You're low-flame at best."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attackDragon04: "A dragon that still needs wings to fly? Keep trying, you'll get there."
Attacking.AurelionSol.attackDragon05: "I did mean to call you back, but stars needed forging."

Movement.AurelionSol.move01: "This world holds the key to Targon's undoing."
Movement.AurelionSol.move02: "Targon has used me as its weapon for far too long."
Movement.AurelionSol.move04: "I would burn the cosmos to catch Targon in the flames."
Movement.AurelionSol.move05: "The depths of space crawl with terrible entities. Pray they ignore this world."
Movement.AurelionSol.move06: "There are countless colors, but I suppose a single rainbow was a good start."
Movement.AurelionSol.move07: "This sun is off its axis - it's been driving me crazy for eons now."
Movement.AurelionSol.move08: "Planetary life... the insufferable byproduct of dim stars."
Movement.AurelionSol.move10: "Nothing kindles wonder like the beauty of stars."
Movement.AurelionSol.move11: "Celestial dragons live and die by our own beautiful rules."
Movement.AurelionSol.move12: "Love is as real a force as gravity. Try it once in a while."
Movement.AurelionSol.move13: "Stars are not born, they are made... by me."
Movement.AurelionSol.move14: "A star's birth is as violent as it is breathtaking."
Movement.AurelionSol.move15: "I've waited millennia to watch Targon fall."
Movement.AurelionSol.move16: "All beings are made of the same stardust."
Movement.AurelionSol.move17: "With a few more basic elements I could really make this place shimmer."
Movement.AurelionSol.move18: "The stars are not to thank for any good luck one may experience."
Movement.AurelionSol.move19: "This sun could do with a new core."
Movement.AurelionSol.move20: "Any relevant species has been knocked back into the Stone Age once or twice."
Movement.AurelionSol.move21: "I wouldn't navigate by the stars. They are a work in progress."
Movement.AurelionSol.move22: "Each star is one of my hearts."
Movement.AurelionSol.move23: "My works are revered by worlds I have never even visited."
Movement.AurelionSol.move24: "Wherever I am is the fashionable part of the universe. Even here."
Movement.AurelionSol.move27: "A star is so much more than a luminous sphere of wonder."
Movement.AurelionSol.move28: "If you ask me, we have set the bar too low for sentience."
Movement.AurelionSol.move29: "My home is in the cosmos, amongst my stars."
Movement.AurelionSol.move30: "The stories they tell about me? They're probably true."
Movement.AurelionSol.move31: "All terrestrial dragons are but pale imitations of my kind."
Movement.AurelionSol.move32: "Perhaps there is more to this world than I thought - not much, but enough."
Movement.AurelionSol.move34: "Why does anyone wish upon a star?"
Movement.AurelionSol.move35: "Stars never align for anyone - except me, of course."
Movement.AurelionSol.move38: "Only when darkness overwhelms the heavens will Targon realise its folly."
Movement.AurelionSol.move40: "Targon will be the pyre from which I forge a new heaven."
Movement.AurelionSol.move41: "I see a universe drained of light and heat, where not even a story will survive."
Movement.AurelionSol.move42: "I grieve for every star never born."
Movement.AurelionSol.move44: "Whenever I think my work is complete, I end up back here, under this sun."
Movement.AurelionSol.moveEnemyBase01: "May I enter? Just joking - star dragons don't need permission."

Taunt.AurelionSol.taunt01: "Your demise will be sung about for ages to come - only thanks to its proximity to me, of course."
Taunt.AurelionSol.taunt02: "Your survival is not impossible, only very... very... very unlikely."
Taunt.AurelionSol.taunt03: "I shall be the last thing you see. Lucky you."
Taunt.AurelionSol.taunt04: "Make a wish. See if the stars answer. I'll wait."
Taunt.AurelionSol.taunt05: "What is the definition of underwhelming? Oh, right! You."
Taunt.AurelionSol.taunt06: "I used to wander the stars. Now I'm stuck down here, with you."
Taunt.AurelionSol.taunt07: "On other worlds, there is emerging life more complex than you."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntAhri01: "You aspire to be human? Oh, darling, there are so many other variants on mediocrity!"
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntAmumu01: "I am... overwhelmed by an emotion when you are not around. It is called... happiness."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntAnnie01: "Mages are infants grasping at the machinery behind reality. At least you have a plausible excuse."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntAzir01: "You Ascended certainly know how to pick an animal totem."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntAzir02: "Your immortality is but a grain of sand in time's vast desert."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntBard01: "Pick a dimension, Bard, you're confusing them!"
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntBard02: "Were you born this flat, or did you work at it?"
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntCaitlyn01: "The funnier the hat, the greater the prestige, right?"
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntDiana01: "You and Leona embody the same light. Typical Targon redundancy."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntDiana02: "It is always a moon's role to envy the stars."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntDragonTrainerTristana01: "Oh, come on, have a little self-respect!"
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntDunkmasterDarius01: "If dunking is the apex of this primitive sport, then I am the queen of space."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntEkko01: "Made a mistake? Better rewind and repeat until you achieve mediocrity."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntHuman01: "Ah, mankind. Ever fumbling from one brink of cataclysm to the next."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntHuman02: "Humanity, surprisingly adept in the art of wrestling survival from the clutches of extinction."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntHuman03: "As far as fauna goes, humans strike a firm... middle."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntIllaoi02: "I've seen the main act. You're only a third-rate cover band."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntIllaoi01: "You do not understand your god, Illaoi."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntJhin: "Imagine what you could do with a larger canvas."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntJinx01: "Life is short, go crazy once in a while, I get it."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntLeona02: "You and Diana embody the same light. Typical Targon redundancy."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntMalphite01: "There is a saying on this planet - "Dumb as a rock". It's not a compliment."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntMissFortune01: "You are going to kill me? Dressed like that?"
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntNasus01: "Bravo, Nasus, you've ascended yourself into a dog! Now fetch me something more interesting."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntNasus02: "I could teach an old dog millions of new tricks, but I simply don't like you, Nasus."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntPantheon01: "Your fate was sealed the moment you picked up Targon's spear."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntRammus01: "Are you burdened by your own monotony? Because I am."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntRenekton01: "That whole practice of Ascension is adorably amusing, like a kitten trying to walk upright."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntRyze01: "Ah, Ryze, I see you've brought paper to take notes."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntRyze02: "True magic is beyond language. Writing merely butchers the intent."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntRyze03: "Magic tattoos? Where did you get those, magic prison?... oh."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntShyvana02: "A dragon's loyalty is a priceless gift. Do not waste it in the service of fools."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntShyvana03: "Medium flame, and that is me being generous."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntSoraka01: "Twinkle, twinkle, little star, do you wonder what you are?"
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntTahmKench01: "The heavens drag on endlessly... much like a conversation with you."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntTargon01: "The Aspect of Targon? Sparks masquerading as lightning."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntTargon02: "I will cauterize Targon with star fire."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntTaric01: "You're an Aspect? Let me guess - tackiness."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntTryndamere01: "Galaxies exist by my will - but, yes, that is certainly an impressive sword."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntVi02: "You are going to punch a star dragon. Good luck with that."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntZac01: "I empathize with your life as a weapon, but have a little backbone."
Taunt.AurelionSol.tauntZilean01: "You bend time the way a child folds origami - cute, but nothing special."

Joke.AurelionSol.joke01: "Few can impress me. That is a compliment."
Joke.AurelionSol.joke02: "Which star is your favorite? I made that one."
Joke.AurelionSol.joke03: "I made the stars... but you inspire me to make more."
Joke.AurelionSol.joke04: "First you start with some matter, then add star fire and voila! It basically does the rest itself."
Joke.AurelionSol.joke05: "Runeterra? I mean the name of this world literally means 'magic earth'."
Joke.AurelionSol.joke06: "I made the stars to illuminate the perpetual nothing, and mortals use them for... relationship advice."
Joke.AurelionSol.joke07: "A sun is unimaginable celestial power - and thrilled mortals use theirs to coordinate this 'lunch time'."
Joke.AurelionSol.joke09: "Of course I love Runeterra! You have buildings and... more buildings."

Dance.AurelionSol.dance01: "Hello, Runeterra! Are you ready to rock?"

When Hitting an Enemy Champion with a S.AurelionSol.spellIkill03: "The stars weep for you. Just kidding - I already forgot your name."
When Hitting an Enemy Champion with a S.AurelionSol.spellIkill04: "My wish upon a star came true."
When Hitting an Enemy Champion with a S.AurelionSol.spellImultikill02: "Stars are best viewed from a distance."
When Hitting an Enemy Champion with a S.AurelionSol.spellImultikill03: "The stars were not in their favor."
When Hitting an Enemy Champion with a S.AurelionSol.spellImultikill04: "I guess their fate was written in the stars."

Upon Casting Starsurge.AurelionSol.spellQ7: "A little dim - but it still works."
Upon Casting Starsurge.AurelionSol.spellQ9: "This will be quite the deadly spectacle."

Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.item01: "Put it on my tab. The name's Pantheon, with a P."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.item03: "Pay? Do you know who I am?"
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemRodofAges01: "Some things are simply better with age."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemRodofAges02: "Ages? This thing has been around for centuries, tops."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemRodofAges03: "It's been around for ages? So... almost new."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemRodofAges04: "All things appreciate in value over time."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemRabadonsDeathcap02: "As long as it's set at a jaunty angle I'm in."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemOrbofWinter01: "A snow globe? Perfect for my collect - to destroy you. Destroy you!"
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemRylaisCrystalScepter01: "Time to slow things down a bit."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemRylaisCrystalScepter02: "A bit gaudy for my tastes but exceedingly useful."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemLiandrysTorment02: "Perfect for the bimillenial celestial masquerade ball."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemLiandrysTorment03: "If Bard and Kindred can pull off wearing a mask, so can I."
Upon Buying an Item.AurelionSol.itemLudensEcho01: "There are no echoes where I'm from."

Upon an Enemy Turret Dropping Below 30%.AurelionSol.tower01: "All towers fall - it's just what they do when I'm around."
Upon an Enemy Turret Dropping Below 30%.AurelionSol.tower02: "Nothing they build can endure like the celestial firmament."
Upon an Enemy Turret Dropping Below 30%.AurelionSol.tower03: "Towers tend to crumble when I am in the vicinity."
Upon an Enemy Turret Dropping Below 30%.AurelionSol.tower04: "Topple, like all things crafted by mortals."
Upon an Enemy Turret Dropping Below 30%.AurelionSol.tower05: "The architects of these towers misunderstand object permanence."
Upon an Enemy Turret Dropping Below 30%.AurelionSol.towerKill01: "How many must I knock down before they learn?"

Upon Scoring First Blood.AurelionSol.firstblood01: "You may look forward to more of this."
Upon Scoring First Blood.AurelionSol.ace01: "Never stop when you're on a roll."
Upon Scoring First Blood.AurelionSol.ace02: "I shall inscribe this moment in the stars."
Upon Scoring First Blood.AurelionSol.pentakill01: "That ought to keep them talking for the next century or so."
Upon Scoring First Blood.AurelionSol.pentakill02: "Cosmic dragon; five. Everyone else; zero. Please, take notes."

Upon Casting Recall.AurelionSol.recall04: "Always know when to make an entrance - and an exit."

Upon Death.AurelionSol.death01: "Alas, I am simply too beautiful for this world."
Upon Death.AurelionSol.death04: "The brightest stars shine on long after they're gone."
Upon Death.AurelionSol.deathShyvana01: "Darling, you have but set my hearts free."
Upon Death.AurelionSol.shutdown01: "With a lifespan as comically brief as yours, I suppose I can allow you to taste triumph at least once."
Upon Death.AurelionSol.shutdown02: "Ah, the joys of lesser organisms rising up to slay their betters! If only they were aware of the impermanence of being... or the permanence of me."

Upon Respawning.AurelionSol.respawn02: "Because I am a star dragon. That's why."
Upon Respawning.AurelionSol.respawn03: "It's not a comeback if one was never truly gone."

Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstmove06: "The child is gone, the killer will remain."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstmove05: "I will survive eternity, they will die today."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstMove01: "The blood of the fallen will annoint me the new master."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstMove03: "Lives will be taken, and the real plan revealed"
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstMove03.1: "Killing is the plan, let me show you."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstmove04: "The true assassin kills one to save many."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstmove04.1: "Such noble lies, save no one; It's so liberating!"
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstMove02: "Rage inside me will not be contained!"
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstMove02.1: "The spade does not dictate the architect's vision."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstMove07: "Cast off the yoke of Zed's order."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstMove07.1: "It is the order that will break you, Rhaast."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstmove08: "There is fear in your grip and doubt in your heart."
Upon Moving for the First Time.Kayn.firstmove08.1: "I have no heart, that you should fear."

Movement.Kayn.move9: "I was born into a nation of despair and I alone am the remedy."
Movement.Kayn.move10: "I have chosen you, you will serve me."
Movement.Kayn.move11: "I have mastered every weapon of war, no prattling tool will prove an exception."
Movement.Kayn.move12: "Who should I obey? Master Zed or the farm implement with delusions of grandure?"
Movement.Kayn.move14: "The rage is in your hands, let it loose!"
Movement.Kayn.move16: "Zed's order shackles you, I offer freedom!"
Movement.Kayn.move17: "You are not worthy of the power you hold."
Movement.Kayn.move18: "This is the part I like best, the anticipation. No, it's the killing."
Movement.Kayn.move19: "Such an obsequious pupil, I will be your new master."
Movement.Kayn.move20: "Target the strong, I am a weapon not some accessory."
Movement.Kayn.move21: "Neither time nor violence will end me."
Movement.Kayn.move25: "I learned from a young age to embrace the shadows."
Movement.Kayn.move2: "I let you go and you will die."
Movement.Kayn.move4: "I am the weapon, you are a tool."
Movement.Kayn.move8.1: "Give in, and I will show you."
Movement.Kayn.move26.1: "You possess the hubris of a more fearsome weapon."
Movement.Kayn.move1: "There is much darkness around you, in you."
Movement.Kayn.move3: "Tell me, was it desperation that led you to me?"
Movement.Kayn.move5: "I see your nightmares, do they trouble you?"
Movement.Kayn.move6: "I have waited eons to bathe this realm in blood!"
Movement.Kayn.move6.1: "Talk, talk... You'll do nothing without me."
Movement.Kayn.move7: "Ionians, are they all as confident as you?"
Movement.Kayn.move27: "(Laughs) Their screams will echo in this place"
Movement.Kayn.move31: "Stain this fetid swamp with their blood."
Movement.Kayn.move33: "Wait by the river long enough and the enemy dead will float by"
Movement.Kayn.move34: "Oh yeah... Let's turn this river red."
Movement.Kayn.move32: "Oh how I miss the smell of blood in the water"

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killMelee03: "Just like that and the world will be yours to destroy."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killMelee05: "Why murder one, when you can slaughter many?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killMelee06: "Triumph is built on a foundation of death."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killMelee07: "The strong fall so quickly to my blade."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killMelee11: "Those who seek balance find only death."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killMelee13: "This is but a taste of my wrath."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killRanged01: "With each kill, the shadows grow deeper."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killRanged02: "Death delivered with precision is true power."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killRanged03: "What was written in shadow, now in flesh."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killRanged06: "Fear is your shadow! You are cloaked in it."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killRanged07: "The shadows are my realm and your grave."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killAatrox01: "Sorry brother, you were in my way."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killShen01: "Shen, consider this a debt paid to a friend."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killZed02: "It should not have come to this, Zed."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.killZed04: "Live by the shadow, die by the shadow."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.FirstBlood02: "Merely the first to die. There will be more."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.FirstBlood04: "You never forget your first kill, nope, that's not right, I've already forgotten it."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kayn.Quadra02: "Stand back! Kayn doesn't know how deadly this thing gets!"

Taunt.Kayn.taunt01: "There are a thousand ways to kill you in this moment, I'm planning the right one."
Taunt.Kayn.taunt02: "This will be quick, but still painful."
Taunt.Kayn.taunt03: "I was forged to destroy, and you are in my way."
Taunt.Kayn.taunt04: "I will take that pitiful existence you call a life from you."
Taunt.Kayn.tauntAllyAatrox: "Death and war, this will be delicious."
Taunt.Kayn.tauntAllyVarus: "We find Aatrox... and it's a party. Of murder. A murder party!"

Joke.Kayn.joke03: "I'm holdinga sentient weapon of doom, denied blood for eons. You think I am scared of you?"
Joke.Kayn.joke01: "I find your will to live... Amusing.."
Joke.Kayn.joke04: "I smell death... no, it's you. You smell... bad."
Joke.Kayn.joke05.1: "I will make an exception in this case."

Upon Casting Recall.Kayn.recall4: "But there's still so much to kill!"
Upon Casting Recall.Kayn.recall1.1: "Do not question me, or my motives."
Upon Casting Recall.Kayn.recall2.1: "Did such foolishness lead to your imprisonment?"

Upon Placing a Ward.Kayn.placeWard01: "For those who can not see in the dark."
Upon Placing a Ward.Kayn.placeWard03: "Done. Now can we continue the bloodbath?"

Upon Destroying a Ward.Kayn.destroyWard01: "Sight.. A pitiful crutch for the weak."

Upon Buying an Item.Kayn.purchase05: "This will very much upset the balance"
Upon Buying an Item.Kayn.purchase07: "Good choice, pairs nicely with wrath and fury."

Attacking.Zoe.Unknown079: "I've got a magic present for you! Here it comes!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown045: "So this the type of game you like?"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown046: "Delightful little world you have... I like it!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown052: "I don't mean to hurt you. I just do sometimes!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown053: "Your lives are short, but I love sparkles..."
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown055: "This is the precipice of a new reality!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown057: "I can't help myself in doing mean things, sorry!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown058: "You're so funny, acting like magic hurts!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown062: "Ha! Let's get vloopy! ...That's a word, right?"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown076: "Do something fun! The world might be ending... Or not!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown078: "Tag, you're it! Hey, I said you're it!"
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown082: "I don't want to grow up. You can't make me."
Attacking.Zoe.Unknown084: "This is the game you wanna play?"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackAurelionSol04: "Um, I'm a space dragon! And I'm the center of the universe!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackEzreal02: "I'm not saying Lux isn't a good girlfriend buuuttt... you could do better!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackEzreal03: "Do I like you or chocolate mooncake more?! So hard to decide!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackEzreal07: "I did not say I wanna kiss you... yet.."
Attacking.Zoe.AttackEzreal08: "You just haven't realized how cool I am yet!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackLux02: "You are my rival! Prepare to be destroyed!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackLux03: "Do you even know he likes you!?"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackLux05: "I'm not attacking you! I'm expressing my displeasure!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale02: "I'm girly too. I'm a girl, aren't I?"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale03: "Oh! So pretty! I want you to be my friend! Pleeeaaaasee!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale05: "We are going to be best friends!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale06: "Let's like, do something together.. Oh! Do you like mooncake?!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale07: "You need more stardust, I could give you some!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale10: "Can I tell you a secret? I like you!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale12: "Like you, I will try my best! Also, chocolate mooncake!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale14: "I like your hair and clothes, so pretty!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale18: "Why won't you hang out with me?!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackHumanFemale19: "Do you have a boyfriend? Tell me! I must know!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackYordle01: "Are you made of rainbows? So cute!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackYordle05: "You're ugly, but in a cute way."
Attacking.Zoe.AttackYordle06: "Oh you're precious. I could eat you up!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackYordle07: "What a wittle wovewy thing you are!"
Attacking.Zoe.AttackYordle10: "I just want to hug you til you explode!"

Movement.Zoe.Unknown143: "Things totally change so they can be the same but also totally different!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown135: "Starlight is an expression of something inside bursting to get out!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown137: "Trickster never loses. Because Zoe changes the rules."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown123: "Well, this is a pretty chill reality."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown145: "Dusk and dawn are the same. So there's actually two of me. Orrr I could be totally lying."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown136: "I should figure out a new game. One that mortals can play without dying!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown117: "The wheel turns, day becomes night... time to make colors!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown127: "I wanna have fun and chat with someone besides myself! I am a good listener though."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown144: "I like all these things around me! The creatures. And... and the plants!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown139: "Are we done in this reality yet? Hello? Hellooo?"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown091: "Nobody has to grow up if they don't want to. Orrrrr maybe they do. I don't, though."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown094: "I speak of the changes coming. That is our purpose. ...It's a pretty easy job."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown095: "Dusk and dawn; the ending is the beginning."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown103: "I'm not boy-crazy! I just... don't have a boyfriend yet."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown113: "I didn't even know boys existed! Now I just want one to hold my hand and look in my eyes! ...A cute one."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown114: "Daylight is too bright, the night is too dark, I want more colors!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown115: "I should come here every millennium! I like it!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown116: "Ugh, Targon has rules, but blehh, I'm gonna hang out anyway."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown118: "If this wasn't so pretty, I wouldn't care that it's all about to change."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown119: "While I wait, I will stay happy!" Zoe laughs and snorts. "Oh..."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown121: "Time is a tide. All that it gives, it also takes."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown122: "I'm gonna dance in my superpants. Cause otherwise I would be naked!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown124: "Do not look into the eyes of a god, or fly into its ears."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown125: "I am supposed to give them a message! But I forgot the sonic pattern for it..."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown126: "I hope this world survives... I like it!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown128: "The eye that looks ahead for the safe course is closed forever."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown129: "There is mischief in the stars. Also gas clouds. They smell like farts."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown131: "I wanna wanna, go to some place, place place."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown134: "Something good is going to happen. With sparkles!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown141: "No one free is afraid of... mischief."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown142: "What's fun around here? (gasp) What about over there!"
Movement.Zoe.Unknown146: "You know, I wouldn't trust me, but I would totally like me. (inhales) I do like me."
Movement.Zoe.Unknown147: "Every day, every season... ends. And begin something new!"

Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown096: "Hey guys, so, cosmic change time, possible armageddon, twilight of the gods, blah blah blah. You've been heralded."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown112: "There are so many weirdos here... It's awesome!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown106: "I bring a message for you all: a warning, a sigil. But first, I wanna see the sparkle flies."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown090: "Hello? Hey, I'm over here if you want to aim a high-velocity attack against me! Maybe you'll hit me this time!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown092: "Anyone wanna go into that ankle-deep liquid? Hello? Hellooooo!!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown111: "Here we go on an adventure, through this place! Even though we don't know the name of it! It doesn't matter!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown108: "The sky is billions of explosions burning far away! How could you not wanna see them?? I did. They were pretty cool."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown109: "This will be fine! Don't worry about it Zoe, things break all the time. Like reality, planets... y'know, stuff."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown100: "The sun and moon rise in time, to ash and mirth. The mountain takes... all. Change comes."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown099: "When the beings here look up, do they think we're looking back?! We really aren't."
