Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown097: "Heyyyy! I'm gonna have new friends, new friends here, and it's gonna be awesome 'cause they are awesome and we'll have an awesome party with cake and stuff! (gasp) Should I make chocolate mooncake or strawberry mooncake? (gasp) CHOCOLATE STRAWBERRY CAKE!!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown093: "There's this illusion of the reality, but it's not really really real, like it's beside and inside and inside and beside, but never on top... Nevermind, just kidding, but not really.."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown098: "Ohh! I like how the atmospheric refraction is favoring intense short waves today!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown101: "The sky called to me. So I went! It was pretty cool. I like this too, though."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown102: "Psst! Hey! Can you tell me your secrets? I promise not to tell them to... everyone!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown107: "There are holes in reality. And... in donuts."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown104: "We don't try to understand the sense it doesn't make, so we're trying to share that with you. You're welcome."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown110: "There is a day we must all fulfill our destiny. ...That day is taco day!!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.Unknown105: "So, there's these, like, yinger and yangerons, and they spin in this projected pattern which intersects fourth-dimensionally. But it isn't a measurable function. It's got a whoosh, whoom, whoooooooooh!"
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.FirstMoveEnemyAurelionSol01: "Aww, I can hear my favorite wittle space doggy."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.FirstMoveEnemyAurelionSol02: "I think we're gonna get to play with the cosmic space dragon. He's funny, but he needs better manners."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.FirstMoveEnemyAurelionSol03: "Space dragons are so arrogant until you train them. We're gonna train this one."
Upon Leaving Base.Zoe.FirstMoveEnemyEzreal02: "Hey, I'm Zoe! You're Ezreal! I know that! I mean- uh, I found it out! I mean... ugh... kill me now."

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillEnemy01: "Sorry! Beauty always has tears. Even when we're happy."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillEnemy02: "Bye bye! But isn't it better with sparkles and more colors?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillEnemy07: "We all grow up! Well, you died, but... y'know."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillAurelionSol01: "Cosmic space dragon? Kinda chatty. So arrogant."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillAurelionSol02: "I liked your stars, but you're not the big deal you thought you were."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillAurelionSol03: "Aww, space dragon should have gotten back on his leash."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillAurelionSol04: "I'm gonna miss that cosmic dragon... Oh look, butterflies!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillAurelionSol05: "Said he made all the stars, and the humans believed him?!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillEzreal01: "What? No! Why isn't he moving anymore?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillEzreal02: "Oh no, I think I played too rough!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillEzreal03: "But now how is he gonna be my first kiss? He's dead!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillEzreal04: "He was so cute. I mean, uh, not that I noticed. Hehe."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillLux01: "Oh, I'm Lux. I'm so tall, and all the boys liiiike meeee." How do you like THEM, sparkles?!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillLux02: "Oops, I might have gotten a little jealous. Sorry, Lux."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillLux03: "I do not like yellow hair. And Demacia. And light magic. And everything about her!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Zoe.KillLux04: "You probably didn't deserve that, Lux. Sorry, but not really."

Taunt.Zoe.Unknown199: "There is another reality inside all of us. Maybe not you though."
Taunt.Zoe.Unknown200: "You might emerge somewhere else in the sky, somewhen else in time. That would be better."
Taunt.Zoe.Unknown202: "Is this the best physical representation you can manifest? It completely lacks zazz!"
Taunt.Zoe.TauntEzreal01: "If you won't pay attention to me, I'll blow up your world! Probably not... but I might!"
Taunt.Zoe.TauntEzreal02: "I have a question I wanna ask, buuuuut I need you to say yes before I ask it."
Taunt.Zoe.TauntEzreal03: "I'm just saying, if you wanted to hold hands, that would be okay."
Taunt.Zoe.TauntEzreal04: "Are you from here? I walk between worlds. Well, hop, actually. You're cuuuute..."
Taunt.Zoe.TauntResponse02: "Thanks for asking! I like butterflies, unicorns, and watching the end of finite realities!"
Taunt.Zoe.TauntResponse04: "Oh. Wow. That's like, totally off the mandala."

Picking up a Spell Shard.Zoe.Unknown013: "Should I have picked this one up?"
Picking up a Spell Shard.Zoe.Unknown014: "You left a copy of your spell here. I took it. Kthx."
Picking up a Spell Shard.Zoe.Unknown016: "Am I the only one who can see these?"

Joke.Zyra.joke1: "Our seasons are reversed: my spring, your fall."
Joke.Zyra.joke2: "Where are your friends? Mine are all around."

Taunt.Zyra.taunt2: "No place is safe while I'm free!"

Contents.Kai%27Sa_Select: "Are you the hunter... or the prey?"
Contents.Kai%27Sa_Ban: "You wouldn't last a day in the void."

Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0536: "Here is where we make our stand. Do as I say, it's the only way if we want to live."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0042: "This suit lives on me, it calls me home. We survive together."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0118: "You know that feeling when your skin crawls? Like a thousand needles poking through every pore? Blood pounding through every vein? That's just an itch compared to what lives on me."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0062: "The first time I returned from the void, it was to save me. Now it's to save them."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0079: "When memories fade and darkness surrounds you, find the strength inside."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0101: "My appearance may frighten you, but make no mistake: I am on your side, and we fight to the bitter end."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0185: "Come with me if you wanna live."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0434: "Huh, memories of my father come at the strangest moments."
Upon Starting a Game.Kai%27Sa_0329: "These creatures seek the living, even here."

Attacking.Kai%27Sa_0208: "This is my purpose, learn from me."
Attacking.Kai%27Sa_0334: "A lamp's not gonna do it, Jax."

Movement.Kai%27Sa_0002: "I came for the hunt, but I'll stay for the fruit."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0003: "I like it here, I just might stay."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0008: "This skin lives on me, and hunts with me."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0010: "Feed the beast, or be its meal."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0021: "Forgiveness is hard, but so very worth it."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0084: "This place is beautiful, I'm going to save it."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0089: "This skin is fashioned for survival, and honed by instinct."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0094: "It's a good day for a hunt."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0109: "I came back for the others who could not."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0116: "Hold our ground, attack them in theirs."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0177: "Survival means never stopping, the void knows that too."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0180: "This suit hunts in the manner I choose."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0200: "It's fight or flight, only now I do not run."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0465: "This world is changing... we decide into what."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0179: "Danger is real, fear is an illusion."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0036: "Imagine a place where it's always night and you're holding faith for a dawn that never comes. I don't have to imagine. I've been there."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0102: "The skin grows restless, it needs to feed. If it doesn't could I be next?"
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0154: "Anger is useless to me, a wound that will only continue to fester."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0134: "I am the antidote, for the rivers of poison flowing beneath us all."
Movement.Kai%27Sa_0160: "The hunt is binary, kill or be killed."

Using Void Seeker.Kai%27Sa_0592: "They can run, but they can't hide."

Scoring Kills and Objectives.Kai%27Sa_0284: "I forgive you, Malzahar, but I do not forget."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Kai%27Sa_0337: "You're now dead prophet, that is the truth that will be told."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Kai%27Sa_0685: "Goodbye Malzahar, now I will tell this tale."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Kai%27Sa_0707: "Will they now see? I can do this."

Other Gameplay.Kai%27Sa_0243: "Sometimes you have to stop and taste the fruit."
Other Gameplay.Kai%27Sa_0622: "Sometimes you have to stop and taste the... Honeyfruit?"
Other Gameplay.Kai%27Sa_0703: "Don't worry, I will fight alone ‒ I've done it before."
Other Gameplay.Kai%27Sa_0354: "I'll stand our ground while you're away."

Upon casting Recall.Kai%27Sa_0647: "That's enough for the moment, the hunt will resume."

Upon Death.Kai%27Sa_0518: "In the void I had no one. I was a doomed outsider. Here, people are everywhere, and they are all mine."
Upon Death.Kai%27Sa_0517: "Some call me 'Monster', they have no idea what lurks just below us all."
Upon Death.Kai%27Sa_0324: "The void-spawn offer a thousand ways to die, and one way to live: Become like them."
Upon Death.Kai%27Sa_0333: "The things we carry should lift us up, not weigh us down. Memories, love, and hope are the lightest necessities."
Upon Death.Kai%27Sa_0224: "The yoke of fear is a heavy burden. Hunters must be nimble, and walk lightly."
Upon Death.Kai%27Sa_0357: "I grew up deep inside a vast emptiness, I do not wish to grow old in one. That is why we must fight."
Upon Death.Kai%27Sa_0141: "Down there I was surrounded by nothingness, but I was never alone. Memories comfort like the closest companion."

Attacking.Zac.attack05: "These jerks don't know when to quit!"
Attacking.Zac.attack13: "Beat up, or beat down? I'm flexible."

Movement.Zac.move06: "I'm not as squishy as I look."
Movement.Zac.move07: "Fighting is in my blood... I mean... my goo."
Movement.Zac.move08: "I may bend, but I don't break."
Movement.Zac.move09: "Mom always said I was big for my age."
Movement.Zac.move10: "There's plenty of me to go around."
Movement.Zac.move11: "I could really use a snack right now."

Taunt.Zac.taunt01: "It's not how much you can lift. It's how good you look!"

Champion Select.Yasuo_Select: "Death is like the wind - always by my side."

Attacking.Yasuo.attack02: "I'll give you the easy way out."
Attacking.Yasuo.attack08: "At peace with yourself? You will be."
Attacking.Yasuo.attack15: "It is not yet time to die."

Movement.Yasuo.move01: "A sword's poor company for a long road."
Movement.Yasuo.move02: "My honor left a long time ago."
Movement.Yasuo.move04: "Follow the wind, but watch your back."
Movement.Yasuo.move06: "Virtue is no more than a luxury."
Movement.Yasuo.move07: "The road to ruin is shorter than you think."
Movement.Yasuo.move10: "Hmph. One step ahead of the past."
Movement.Yasuo.move14: "I will follow this path until the end."
Movement.Yasuo.move15: "Honor is in the heart, not the name."
Movement.Yasuo.move16: "I will not forget who I am."
Movement.Yasuo.move18: "Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?"

Joke.Yasuo.joke01: "The blade above all things... except a good drink."
Joke.Yasuo.joke02: "Who says I can't handle my drink?"
Joke.Yasuo.joke03: "There are three certainties in life: honor, death, and hangovers."

Taunt.Yasuo.taunt01: "There is only death... mine, or yours!"
Taunt.Yasuo.taunt02: "If you've come to kill me... I hope you brought friends."
Taunt.Yasuo.taunt03: "Killing people is a bad habit... but I can't seem to quit."
Taunt.Yasuo.Riventaunt01: "Which weighs more, Riven? Your blade, or your past?"
Taunt.Yasuo.Riventaunt03: "You can't run from yourself, Riven... I've tried."
Taunt.Yasuo.Ninjataunt03: "Cute mask. Your, uh, mom sew that?"

Attacking.VelKoz.attack11: "Creature appears to seek its maternal unit."
Attacking.VelKoz.attack21: "Flailing appears to be a universal response."
Attacking.VelKoz.attack22: "They possess a variety of internal aromas."

Movement.VelKoz.move07: "There is much to learn about this world."
Movement.VelKoz.move10: "I miss the darkness of the Void."
Movement.VelKoz.move15: "Genders are more easily discerned by the pitch of their cries."
Movement.VelKoz.move16: "To date, none have survived preliminary testing."
Movement.VelKoz.move19: "Ah, the Void. I miss the darkness."

Taunt.VelKoz.taunt01: "It seems your chances of survival are... less than zero."
Taunt.VelKoz.taunt02: "Let's see... yes, infinity more samples required!"

Upon Starting a Game on....Taliyah.startSummonersRift02: "A bird's trust is not in the branch."
Upon Starting a Game on....Taliyah.startSummonersRift04: "Every tapestry begins with a single stitch."
Upon Starting a Game on....Taliyah.startTwistedTreeline01: "The ground here conceals a mighty power."
Upon Starting a Game on....Taliyah.startCrystalScar01: "The wounds of this land run deep."

Attacking.Taliyah.attack01: "Looks like you're stuck between me and a hard place."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack02: "Our paths have woven together for a reason."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack05: "I've given up too much to let you stop me."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack06: "Mastery is a journey. Here's your first lesson."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack07: "Okay, great, that is actually what I wanted to have happen. For once."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack08: "My father always said I was a shepherd's nightmare."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack09: "It will take more than you to break me."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack20: "A rock in my hand is worth two in your face!"
Attacking.Taliyah.attack24: "Either way, I'm going to learn something from this."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack25: "Looks like you've got a thing or two to learn yourself."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack29: "Every rock tells a story. This one might be painful."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack36: "I am the stone beneath your feet."
Attacking.Taliyah.attack38: "The best defense is a strong foundation."
Attacking.Taliyah.attackRiver01: "I'm the rock the river cannot wash away!"
Attacking.Taliyah.firstBloodEnemy01: "A stone can't be polished without a little friction."
Attacking.Taliyah.spreeKillingSpree01: "Great, now who am I going to learn from?"
Attacking.Taliyah.tower01: "That... was... amazing! Let us see if I can do it again!"
Attacking.Taliyah.tower02: "Some walls were meant to come down."
Attacking.Taliyah.attackBaron02: "As before, we will stand against you."
Attacking.Taliyah.attackDragon01: "Your fire is nothing compared to the desert heat."
Attacking.Taliyah.attackDragon02: "I looked for your kind at the ends of the earth."
Attacking.Taliyah.attackVilemaw02: "My weave is made of sturdier stuff."

Movement.Taliyah.move04: "The great Weaver says every lesson is a gift."
Movement.Taliyah.move07: "The desert's beauty lies beneath the sand."
Movement.Taliyah.move09: "Keep your eyes on the horizon and your feet on the ground."
Movement.Taliyah.move10: "My journey is not yet at an end."
Movement.Taliyah.move11: "A tribe without tradition is a flock without a shepherd."
Movement.Taliyah.move12: "It is up to all of us to see beauty in the bare stone."
Movement.Taliyah.move13: "Distance means so little when family means so much."
Movement.Taliyah.move14: "The earth calls, and I must answer."
Movement.Taliyah.move15: "To conquer our fears, we must move forward."
Movement.Taliyah.move16: "So long as the desert blooms, there is hope."
Movement.Taliyah.move19: "True learning is just a stone's throw away."
Movement.Taliyah.move20: "Oh, look, a rock... and another... and another!"
Movement.Taliyah.move21: "I know all of this will lead me home someday."
Movement.Taliyah.move23: "This world is a tapestry of our own making."
Movement.Taliyah.move27: "I keep moving, but my feet are on solid ground."
Movement.Taliyah.move28: "If I stumble, I have the earth to catch me."
Movement.Taliyah.move29: "The world is my loom, and every stone my thread."
Movement.Taliyah.move30: "This world is frayed, and in need of mending."
Movement.Taliyah.move32: "I think I've learned what I need to here."
Movement.Taliyah.move33: "I must push myself harder next time."
Movement.Taliyah.move34: "The warmth of the desert calls me home."
Movement.Taliyah.moveIdle01: "Just when I start to appreciate the view, it is time to move on."

Taunt.Taliyah.taunt01: "Maybe I'm here to teach you something."
Taunt.Taliyah.taunt02: "You're never too old to learn something new."
Taunt.Taliyah.taunt03: "Go ahead, push me. We'll both find out what I'm made of."
Taunt.Taliyah.taunt04: "You're not a problem, you're a learning opportunity."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntIonian01: "The mountains of Ionia taught me much."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntJhin01: "You're no artist, just a hired gun!"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntJhin02: "Beauty is no excuse for so much suffering."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntYasuo03: "I've learned much since we last met."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntYasuo04: "Let me show you what I've learned."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNoxian01: "The promises of Noxus are nothing but lies."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNoxian02: "I will take no part in your war machine."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNoxian03: "You are nothing but plunderers and poachers."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNoxian04: "We will not trade the yoke of one empire for another."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNoxian05: "The earth will rip itself apart before it falls to Noxus."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNoxian06: "Noxus promised learning, but delivered only bloodshed."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntCassiopeia01: "The sands have revealed your true form."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntCassiopeia03: "This is how the desert repays thieves."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntCassiopeia04: "Noxians... why did it have to be Noxians?"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntChoGath01: "You are the scourge upon our world."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntKassadin02: "Tell us what we need to stand against those creatures."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntMalzahar01: "You have betrayed our people to chaos."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntMalzahar02: "The stone of Shurima will stand against those creatures."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntRekSai01: "You will stalk the sands no more."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntRekSai02: "You breed chaos like a rabid ralsiji!"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntVelKoz02: "Want to examine some stone up close?"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntVelKoz03: "How's that for dirt in your eye?"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntAnnie01: "Playtime is going to get a little rocky."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntAurelionSol01: "Even the smallest stone can shake the heavens."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntAzir01: "Remember there is stone beneath your sand."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntAzir04: "There is no empire without the people."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntAzir05: "Close to the ground, the sparrow flies faster than the falcon."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntAzir07: "Better to build on stone than sand."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntAzir09: "Shouldn't you be home polishing your Sun Disc?"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntEkko01: "Did the earth move for you too? Did I just say that out loud?"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntIllaoi01: "Don't worry. I don't stay in one place for long."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntKindred01: "Life and death are two ends of the same thread."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntMalphite03: "Even rock gives under the right pressure."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNasus01: "Our future is not yet off the loom."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNasus02: "Worry is a heavier burden than stone."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNasus03: "Do not give up before the journey is finished."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntNasus04: "Even the most barren desert blooms in time."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntRenekton02: "Stone sealed your tomb once. It will again."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntRenekton03: "I will mend what you have sundered."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntSivir01: "He may be your blood, but we are your people."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntSivir03: "Do not turn your back on what is right."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntSkarner01: "I feel your tribe sleeping below the earth."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntSkarner02: "Is it hard to be the protector of so many?"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntSkarner03: "I know the power that lies beneath."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntTaric01: "Ooh, you're pretty. Guys can be pretty, right?"
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntWarwick01: "It is the shepherd's duty to drive the wolf away."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntWarwick02: "You are nothing but a sheep in wolf's clothes."
Taunt.Taliyah.tauntXerath01: "Yours is the ill wind that begat his wrath."

Joke.Taliyah.interactionJokeEnemy01: "Huh. I guess that's funny where you come from."

Upon Casting Threaded Volley.Taliyah.spellQ1: "Problems should be broken up into little pieces."
Upon Casting Threaded Volley.Taliyah.spellQ4: "If at first you don't succeed, throw another rock!"

Upon Casting Unraveled Earth.Taliyah.spellE1: "It's never good to run from your problems."

Upon Casting Weaver's Wall.Taliyah.spellR1: "Better to build from the ground up."
Upon Casting Weaver's Wall.Taliyah.spellR7: "You can run from a landslide, I prefer to ride it!"
Upon Casting Weaver's Wall.Taliyah.spellR10: "That may have gotten away from me."

Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.item08: "Learning is always faster with the right tools."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemBootsBasic01: "Every girl needs a good pair of boots."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemVisionWard02: "This should make the pattern easier to follow."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemVisionWard03: "Time to see the pattern in the weave."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemVisionWard04: "A rock in the bush is worth five in the hand."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemRylaisCrystalScepter01: "Diamonds really are a girl's best friend."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemAncientCoin01: "This currency carries weight beyond the sands."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemEyeOfTheOasis01: "A vision most welcome in the sands."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemRabadonsDeathcap01: "Let's see what I can pull out of this hat."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemMejaisSoulstealer01: "Time to go big or go home."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemMorellonomicon01: "Time to throw the book at them too."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemAbyssalMask01: "Time to fight magic with more magic."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemHextechProtobelt01: "Rocks should really come with an instruction manual."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.itemVoidStaff01: "A little chaos should shake things up."
Upon Buying an Item.Taliyah.shopClose01: "Choices. Those are my only true possessions."

During Mid Game.Taliyah.interactionTimeMidGame01: "The midday toil is the most difficult."

During Late Game.Taliyah.interactionTimeLateGame01: "Evening is upon us. Let us finish this."

Upon Placing a Ward.Taliyah.ward01: "Clear vision is best when there are many paths."
Upon Placing a Ward.Taliyah.ward04: "Big dreams require a lot of vision."
Upon Placing a Ward.Taliyah.ward05: "Girls with dreams become women with vision."
Upon Placing a Ward.Taliyah.ward06: "You cannot be what you cannot envision."

Champion Select.Camille_Select: "Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."
Champion Select.Camille_Ban: "I will wait for you to be better."

Upon Starting a Game on....Camille.start02: "I remain human - for the most part."
Upon Starting a Game on....Camille.startTwistedTreeline01: "An island of ruination... heh, how glamorous."

Attacking.Camille.attack07: "Don't engage if you don't seek to win."
Attacking.Camille.attack10: "Who are you to try and stop me?"
Attacking.Camille.attack11: "I know what I am. Do you?"
Attacking.Camille.attack13: "A weapon's virtue is proven in combat."
Attacking.Camille.attack15: "Do nothing if you wish to be nothing."
Attacking.Camille.attack16: "Hmph. You may thank me when this is over."
Attacking.Camille.attack19: "You do not want your name on my list."
Attacking.Camille.attack21: "I will make you an irrelevant detail."
Attacking.Camille.attack31: "Let me be clear - I will kill you."
Attacking.Camille.attack34: "Mind your manners - or I'll mind them for you."
Attacking.Camille.attack36: "You will be forgotten before you're dead."
Attacking.Camille.attack38: "You are a means to an end."
Attacking.Camille.attack42: "Either attack or run, your indecision is repulsive."
Attacking.Camille.attackAurelionSol01: "The yoke of mankind looks good on you."
Attacking.Camille.attackBlitzcrank01: "Oh my... can someone put a sheet over this hat rack?"
Attacking.Camille.attackCaitlyn01: "The law protects when it is protected."
Attacking.Camille.attackCaitlyn04: "I am not one of your blunt object enforcers."
Attacking.Camille.attackEkko01: "Child, I've considered every outcome. Plan accordingly."
Attacking.Camille.attackEkko02: "You are not thinking far enough ahead."
Attacking.Camille.attackEzreal01: "Shush now! Leave the talking to the adults."
Attacking.Camille.attackGangplank01: "It would have been better for you to stay dead."
Attacking.Camille.attackHeimerdinger01: "Do you have a formula for being better?"
Attacking.Camille.attackIllaoi01: "I suppose I must teach you a lesson."
Attacking.Camille.attackJanna01: "I've seen bigger tempests in my teacup."
Attacking.Camille.attackKled01: "You know... I don't even believe in you."
Attacking.Camille.attackMaokai01: "Mediocrity is the root of all evil."
Attacking.Camille.attackOrianna01: "Who let you out of your toy box!?"
Attacking.Camille.attackOrianna02: "Time to cut your strings, little puppet."
Attacking.Camille.attackRiven01: "Run along, girl, and mind your elders."
Attacking.Camille.attackSinged01: "How about a taste of your own medicine?"
Attacking.Camille.attackVi01: "Watch it, girl. I am your future."
Attacking.Camille.attackViktor01: "Tell me. Hmph; Is it the third arm that makes you extra-glorious?"
Attacking.Camille.attackViktor02: "Your revolution has ceased to be useful."
Attacking.Camille.attackViktor03: "You have become an obstacle to progress. Time to remove you."
Attacking.Camille.attackVolibear01: "You would look better as a rug in my foyer."
Attacking.Camille.attackWarwick01: "I am the one who keeps the wolves at bay."
Attacking.Camille.attackWarwick02: "We are all monsters. Now, you are just one on the outside."
Attacking.Camille.attackWarwick03: "Didn't your master teach you to heel?"
Attacking.Camille.attackYasuo01: "You are quick, but I am quicker!"
Attacking.Camille.attackYorick01: "Think ahead, or start digging your grave."
Attacking.Camille.attackZac01: "I am a weapon. You're some sort of... pudding."
Attacking.Camille.attackZilean01: "Oh look, it's the worst of times."

Movement.Camille.move01: "Technology and I have a... complicated relationship."
Movement.Camille.move03: "I'm what you would call a deniable asset."
Movement.Camille.move07: "The harsh memory of one's past does not soften with age."
Movement.Camille.move08: "Regret is what tempers the steel of our soul."
Movement.Camille.move09: "The right word cuts more deeply than a knife."
Movement.Camille.move11: "I don't play the game, I make the rules."
Movement.Camille.move12: "It's not lies that cut but the sharpness of the truth."
Movement.Camille.move14: "Violence is a means to an end."
Movement.Camille.move15: "Morality is a beautiful servant... and a dangerous master."
Movement.Camille.move18: "We all have lines. I may have crossed mine."
Movement.Camille.move19: "Another step on the march of progress."
Movement.Camille.move20: "They pay me to find problems... and then dispose of them."
Movement.Camille.move21: "Everything has a place. Forgetting yours is dangerous."
Movement.Camille.move24: "Self-made women need to be more prevalent."
Movement.Camille.move25: "Privilege must be preserved at all costs."
Movement.Camille.move26: "It is not the weapon that defines you, but how you wield it."
Movement.Camille.move29: "Sometimes scars are the most refined attire one can wear."
Movement.Camille.move30: "Progress is served by technology, not controlled by it."
Movement.Camille.move31: "The world is not black or white, but a delicious shade of grey."
Movement.Camille.move33: "The task at hand is the only one that matters."
Movement.Camille.move39: "The luxury of mercy is one I cannot afford."
Movement.Camille.move02: "I bargained my soul for the progress of Piltover."
Movement.Camille.move06: "My skills eliminate the chaos of Piltover."
Movement.Camille.move36: "For the problems of Piltover, I am the solution."

Joke.Camille.joke01: "A Noxian, a Zaunite and a Freljordian walk into my blade. The end."
Joke.Camille.joke02: "A joke? Hmm... what do you get when you cross me in a dark alley? Eviscerated."
Joke.Camille.interactionJokeEnemy01: "In your case, intelligence seems like an unhappy accident."
Joke.Camille.interactionJokeEnemy02: "I hope you still think that's funny when I slit your throat."
Joke.Camille.interactionJokeEnemy04: "Awww... thinking for yourself must be difficult."
Joke.Camille.interactionJokeEnemy06: "Rudeness is a sure way to an ugly death."

Taunt.Camille.taunt01: "If you don't have the talent to fight, at least have the decency to die."
Taunt.Camille.tauntAlly01: "Extremes are easy, it's the balance that is difficult."
Taunt.Camille.interactionTauntEnemy02: "Find bravado where you can, while you can."
Taunt.Camille.tauntCaitlyn02: "Don't go looking for something you don't want to find."
Taunt.Camille.tauntEkko01: "Hourglass kid? Was sundial brat already taken?"
Taunt.Camille.tauntEzreal01: "That little toy of yours won't help you when you're dead!"
Taunt.Camille.tauntRyze01: "Shall I wait while you consult your precious runes?"
Taunt.Camille.tauntVi01: "Ever wonder how you became an orphan?"
Taunt.Camille.tauntVi02: "Mmm, it's like looking into a crude, boorish mirror."

Upon Triggering Adaptive Defenses.Camille.spellI03: "You won't avoid the consequences of your actions."
Upon Triggering Adaptive Defenses.Camille.spellI04: "The difference between success and failure is adaptation!"
Upon Triggering Adaptive Defenses.Camille.spellI05: "If life hasn't changed you, then you have failed!"
Upon Triggering Adaptive Defenses.Camille.spellI09: "Tut tut! A lady never dirties her hands."

Upon Casting Precision Protocol.Camille.spellQ11: "The trick is to be clever and quick."
Upon Casting Precision Protocol.Camille.spellQ12: "The test of good manners is patience."
Upon Casting Precision Protocol.Camille.spellQ15: "Patience is what separates good hunters from dead ones."
Upon Casting Precision Protocol.Camille.spellQ24: "Precision is the only standard that matters."

Upon Casting Tactical Sweep.Camille.spellW03: "There are two sides to every issue, my side and the wrong side."

Upon Casting Hookshot.Camille.spellE03: "You will be where I want you to be."
Upon Casting Hookshot.Camille.spellE06: "Second-guess yourself. You will still be wrong."
Upon Casting Hookshot.Camille.spellE07: "Did you really think you could run?"

Upon Casting The Hextech Ultimatum.Camille.spellR01: "For you, this will be over in a moment."
Upon Casting The Hextech Ultimatum.Camille.spellR02: "You and I will end this. Now."
Upon Casting The Hextech Ultimatum.Camille.spellR03: "You will stay where I want you to stay."
Upon Casting The Hextech Ultimatum.Camille.spellR05: "Always dance with the one who brought you."
Upon Casting The Hextech Ultimatum.Camille.spellRLeave01: "Ask permission if you want to leave."
Upon Casting The Hextech Ultimatum.Camille.spellRLeave03: "You didn't really think I'd let you go that easily?"
Upon Casting The Hextech Ultimatum.Camille.spellRLeave04: "You will leave when I allow it."

Upon First Buying an Item.Camille.item02: "The right tool goes to the one with the heaviest purse."
Upon First Buying an Item.Camille.useBladeOfTheRuinedKing01: "You are strong, but I am stronger."
Upon First Buying an Item.Camille.useRanduinsOmen01: "Meekness was never a virtue of mine!"
Upon First Buying an Item.Camille.useDuskbladeOfDraktharr01: "You can run, but it won't help!"

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.kill01: "You could at least be civilized about dying... "
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.kill03: "Don't take it personally, you were simply outclassed."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.kill08: "Ugh, at least die with some dignity."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.kill09: "This is what a professional looks like."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.kill11: "Ugh, today just got terribly bad for you."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.kill13: "Bloodshed and the upper class have always gone hand in hand."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killDoubleHatter02: "You have made the same mistake twice!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.spreeKillingSpree01: "Were you going to stop me? I didn't think so."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.spreeKillingSpree02: "Anything worth doing is worth doing right."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.spreeKillingSpree03: "The satisfaction isn't in the killing, but in a job well done."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.spreeKillingSpree05: "They do not pay me to make mistakes!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.spreeKillingSpree06: "Remove the strong and watch the weak crumble."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killQuadrakill01: "This is what problem solving looks like!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killCaitlyn01: "That antique of yours is quite poor at close range."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killDarius01: "Bravado is contrary to civility. Much like boys."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killEkko01: "Your affinity with time has only afforded you more mistakes."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killEkko02: "Pay attention, boy. Maybe next time you'll get it right."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killFiora01: "Looks like two blades are better than one."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killFiora02: "A nimble blade wins the fight, but the keen mind wins the war."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killGaren01: "My boy, no one cares about your silly little country."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killHeimerdinger01: "Is that the result you were looking for?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killIllaoi01: "I suppose dying is the ultimate lesson."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killIrelia01: "You should have relied on your weapons more!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killJayce01: "Funny thing about heroes; they all end up dead."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killOrianna01: "Better to be self-made than made to serve."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killRiven01: "And all the Noxian High Command couldn't put Riven together again."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killShen01: "Play in the shadows at your peril."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killTeemo01: "Bandle scout rule number one: be better."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killTwistedFate01: "Living another day was not on the cards."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killVi01: "All the class and manners I expect from a Zaunite."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killVladimir01: "If blood fazed me, I wouldn't be very good at my job."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killYasuo01: "The story of your sword is over."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killYorick01: "It's a fine line between deadly and dead."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killZac01: "Ugh! I think I got some on me."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Camille.killZed01: "Was that deception or were you really that careless?"

Upon Destroying a Turret.Camille.towerOuter01: "Wait long enough and the cracks always show."
Upon Destroying a Turret.Camille.towerInner01: "When the foundation's rotten, the walls give so easily."

Upon Casting Recall.Camille.recall01: "Better to sip regret than swallow death!"
Upon Casting Recall.Camille.recall03: "Value yourself first, lest you be deemed worthless."
Upon Casting Recall.Camille.recall05: "Character is revealed by when one retreats."

Upon Starting a Game.Braum.start01: "Good times, good friends... what could be better?"
Upon Starting a Game.Braum.start02: "If they insist on a fight, I will oblige them."
Upon Starting a Game.Braum.start03: "Ah! We are about to begin the fighting!"
Upon Starting a Game.Braum.start04: "Now, what can we learn from fighting?"
Upon Starting a Game.Braum.start11: "They may have many, but you have me."

Attacking.Braum.attack01: "Why not enjoy some warm milk instead?"
Attacking.Braum.attack05: "When going gets tough, you call Braum."
Attacking.Braum.attack08: "You hit like baby ram! No horns yet!"
Attacking.Braum.attack09: "Now I give more than harsh talking to!"
Attacking.Braum.attack17: "Today we fight each other. Tomorrow, we may fight together."

Movement.Braum.move01: "Sometimes icy heart just needs warm smile."
Movement.Braum.move07: "If you have problem, you come to me first."
Movement.Braum.move09: "The darker the night, the brighter the stars."

Taunt.Braum.taunt01: "If at first you do not succeed, please, tell me what it is like."
Taunt.Braum.taunt02: "Don't worry, Braum was trying little bit."
Taunt.Braum.tauntAlistar01: "You remind me of Agatha. Best cow back home."
Taunt.Braum.tauntAlistar02: "Alistar! I have cow you should meet."
Taunt.Braum.tauntAnnie01: "Mother gave me bear as child too, Annie."
Taunt.Braum.tauntGragas01: "After this, we share a drink! You like goat's milk?"
Taunt.Braum.tauntVi01: "Your hair... we do not see things like this in the Freljord."

Joke.Braum.joke01: "When life gives you curdled milk, be patient. You get very good cheese!"
Joke.Braum.joke02: "The goats are wise; eat everything, climb everything, and if something kicks you, kick it back!"
Joke.Braum.joke03: "Mother always said - float like iceberg, sting like thrown iceberg!"

Upon Casting Unbreakable.Braum.caitlyzreal01: "Good shot! You'll get them next time."

Upon Using a Poro-Snax.Braum.poro02: "Train hard, little poro, and one day you will be strong like... baby!"

Upon Buying....Braum.coin01: "This has the smell of a faraway land. Perhaps I shall see it one day."
Upon Buying....Braum.sightstone01: "No sneaking up on Braum this time."
Upon Buying....Braum.sightstone02: "Sight is the key to victory. Also stone."
Upon Buying....Braum.frozenHeart01: "To friends, I am snowfall. To enemies, I am avalanche!"
Upon Buying....Braum.randuins02: "A shield for my shield? I like it!"

Upon Casting Recall.Braum.return03: "Is very important to take time to rest."

Champion Select.Jhin.move69: "In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."

Upon Starting a Game.Jhin.start03: "I suppose I must make do with this tawdry setting."
Upon Starting a Game.Jhin.start04: "This stage is beneath my talent, but I shall elevate it."
Upon Starting a Game.Jhin.start05: "I will bring them an opera of death."

Attacking.Jhin.attack05: "Your life had no value before me."
Attacking.Jhin.attack29: "When they find you, they will cry."
Attacking.Jhin.attack37: "There is no drama in a peaceful death!"

Movement.Jhin.move03: "The end is important in all things."
Movement.Jhin.move05: "I must wait until a composition is perfect."
Movement.Jhin.move06: "They're puppets. I pull their strings, and then they dance."
Movement.Jhin.move09: "They call me mad. All artists are mad."
Movement.Jhin.move11: "I cannot be good. I must be perfection."
Movement.Jhin.move15: "It's so difficult to work under these conditions."
Movement.Jhin.move17: "I am at my best only during the performance."
Movement.Jhin.move18: "I am pure. My work is pure."
Movement.Jhin.move21: "No poet's words could match my craft."
Movement.Jhin.move22: "Death should never be quick. It should be an opera."
Movement.Jhin.move25: "The world is cruel. It does not have to be ugly."
Movement.Jhin.move26: "Everyone wears a mask. I just chose to create my own."
Movement.Jhin.move27: "This art is a compulsion. I cannot resist it."
Movement.Jhin.move30: "There is nothing for me but this."
Movement.Jhin.move31: "I never hurt anyone. It is the performance that kills."
Movement.Jhin.move32: "Until they stop me, I will keep going."
Movement.Jhin.move33: "I am the singer without a voice. The dancer without legs."
Movement.Jhin.move34: "Only to the audience do I show my true face."
Movement.Jhin.move35: "Each bullet is a piece of my soul. Each shot is a piece of me."
Movement.Jhin.move36: "I swear each performance is the last, but I lie every time."
Movement.Jhin.move37: "I am a slave to this passion."
Movement.Jhin.move38: "My work asks questions, it never has answers."
Movement.Jhin.move39: "Which is the lie? The mask, or my face?"
Movement.Jhin.move40: "An icon doesn't have to explain himself."
Movement.Jhin.move41: "I wonder what they think when they see me."
Movement.Jhin.move44: "This would be easier if blood came in more colours."
Movement.Jhin.move48: "If I keep getting interrupted, how can I be expected to work?"
Movement.Jhin.move49: "I was paid to put on a killer show."
Movement.Jhin.move51: "They will dance, they will sing, they will die!"
Movement.Jhin.move52: "A costume, some makeup, a spray of blood."
Movement.Jhin.move53: "It's very simple - when I shoot, they dance."
Movement.Jhin.move55: "If I get this outfit dirty, I'm going to be so annoyed."
Movement.Jhin.move57: "Death is certain, but killing doesn't have to be ugly."
Movement.Jhin.move58: "I provide catharsis for my clients, and my victims."
Movement.Jhin.move60: "I get nervous before every performance, but I need that feeling."
Movement.Jhin.move61: "The moment before the shot... is painful."
Movement.Jhin.move62: "It is only when the gun fires that I am alive."
Movement.Jhin.move64: "The trigger on a loaded weapon... it whispers for us to act."
Movement.Jhin.move65: "I can't live without the euphoria of performance."
Movement.Jhin.move67: "I want to feel everything. The gun makes it so I do."
Movement.Jhin.move68: "I envy silence... because I must be loud."

Taunt.Jhin.taunt03: "Killing you will be one of my finest works."
Taunt.Jhin.taunt04: "You are mediocrity. My genius will supplant you."
Taunt.Jhin.taunt05: "Only my actions will make you memorable."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIonian01: "You only understand harmony. Discord is required for contrast."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIonian02: "My dear countryman, you remind me how little our culture has advanced."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIonian03: "I am avant-garde - you are stuck in the past."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIonian04: "The Noxian invasion should be a wake-up call. We need more elaborate productions."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIonian05: "I do what others will not. That alone is innovation."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntNoxian01: "I've been asked to do so many boring performances in your nation."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntNoxian03: "Noxians treat killing as a sport. It is an art."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntNoxian05: "Your war was an impressive production, but it lacked soul."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntBard01: "Wait for your cue! You're only here to herald my entrance."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntDraven01: "You shout and throw machetes? How quaint."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntDraven03: "I find your work very, very... obvious."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIllaoi01: "When you speak, I don't hear god, I hear an idiot babbling."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIllaoi02: "Here's the thing, I don't need your god, I need more time for my production."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIllaoi03: "You can take my soul... if you'll shut up."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIllaoi04: "There is such a thing as 'too much gold', my dear."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntIllaoi05: "I thought diamonds were a girl's best friend."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntJinx01: "So many guns, all lacking in meaning or artistry."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntLucian01: "Your story is revenge with guns and ghosts. How droll."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntRekSai01: "I suppose you embody a primitive minimalism, but you lack my technique."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntShen01: "I remember your father! He thought he could censor me."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntShen02: "I have been planning your final performance for a very... long... time."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntShen03: "You helped lock me away. You tried to stop my work. My art cannot be contained."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntShen04: "Your father was a merciful man. Only his failure will be remembered."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntShen05: "Your father's death denied me a performance. You will be his stand-in."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntSion01: "Break a leg! Hehe, oh. 'Break a leg', hehe... ah, delightful. I do cut myself up."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntSona01: "Your music lacks the cruelty of a masterpiece."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntSona02: "You should learn the power of silence."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntSona03: "Step out of my light! They call it background music!"
Taunt.Jhin.tauntSona04: "Your work will be forgotten. I am ahead of my time!"
Taunt.Jhin.tauntTahmKench01: "How inelegant your words are. Surely a fool wrote your script."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntTahmKench03: "Why would anyone listen to a creature so ugly?"
Taunt.Jhin.tauntTahmKench04: "Heh... hehe... that hat is ridiculous, now... who let you wear that horrible thing?"
Taunt.Jhin.tauntTahmKench05: "Oh, before you ask, yes, your whole ensemble makes you look fat. Very fat."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntZed01: "You wanted to kill me back then, didn't you? You will learn - art cannot be killed."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntZed02: "You think you can stop my performance?"
Taunt.Jhin.tauntZed04: "I remember your master. He was worth remembering."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntZed05: "You were wrong to kill your master. I needed him for this performance."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntZed06: "You belong in the shadows. No audience could love you."
Taunt.Jhin.tauntZed07: "I offer an exclusive service. You'll find I murder the competition."

Joke.Jhin.joke01: "Only perfectio - gah! ... only perfection is acceptable."

Upon Firing Whisper.Jhin.I11: "You will learn what beauty truly is."
Upon Firing Whisper.Jhin.I15: "Bliss comes only in the moment before I fire."
Upon Firing Whisper.Jhin.I18: "One, two, three, four, two, two, three, four."

When a Champion Steps on a Lotus Trap.Jhin.E1: "Now that is what I want to see."
When a Champion Steps on a Lotus Trap.Jhin.E3: "Life has no meaning, but your death shall."
When a Champion Steps on a Lotus Trap.Jhin.E4: "I live for the applause, you will die for it."
When a Champion Steps on a Lotus Trap.Jhin.E5: "I knew you would find your mark, eventually."
When a Champion Steps on a Lotus Trap.Jhin.E7: "Face the crowd, and bleed for them."
When a Champion Steps on a Lotus Trap.Jhin.E8: "The face of your killer is identical to mine."
When a Champion Steps on a Lotus Trap.Jhin.E9: "With my technique, killing blooms into artwork!"

Buying Items.Jhin.itemBansheesVeil01: "I love to perform, but I hate crowds."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemBerserkersGreaves01: "These were clearly designed by a caveman."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemEssenceReaver01: "The essence of a thing is found only in its absence."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemHauntingGuise01: "We all wear masks. Mine are just better-crafted."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemLastWhisper02: "I prefer my equipment to make a bang."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemLiandrysTorment01: "Not sure I needed another mask, but oh well."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemPhantomDancer01: "Start the music. I will make them dance."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemRapidFirecannon01: "Rapid fire? Huh. Where's the drama in that?"
Buying Items.Jhin.itemRunaansHurricane01: "The storm is in their hearts. I calm them."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemStatikkShiv01: "It is by my will alone I set my mind in motion."
Buying Items.Jhin.itemStatikkShiv02: "I do prefer my work to have a brisk tempo."

Upon Casting Recall.Jhin.move69: "In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."
Upon Casting Recall.Jhin.move70: "I have risen from the filth and muck. I am the lotus blossom. I am beauty."
Upon Casting Recall.Jhin.move71: "That delightful moment before the curtain goes up."

Upon Starting a Game.Kindred.start04: "Tell me again, little Lamb, which things are mine to take?"

Attacking.Kindred.attack08: "How one dies shows how one lived."

Movement.Kindred.move01: "Those who dread us grant us the most power."
Movement.Kindred.move02: "We are not dreams. We are the waking."
Movement.Kindred.move07: "Beauty fades. That is why it is beautiful."
Movement.Kindred.move08: "Wolf chases what does not willingly go."
Movement.Kindred.move09: "Tomorrow is a hope, never a promise."
Movement.Kindred.move14: "Bits of them stick in my claws!"
Movement.Kindred.move24: "The weft and weave of fate guides---"

Taunt.Kindred.taunt02: "Chasing is the best game in the world... and I always win!"
Taunt.Kindred.tauntEkko01: "We know your name child. Woven across countless almost-lives."
Taunt.Kindred.tauntUnknown01: "Rushing to meet us again, I see."
Taunt.Kindred.tauntRengar02: "Rengar is well-versed in the ways of the hunter."
Taunt.Kindred.tauntSion01: "Come, Sion, let us end this mockery."

Joke.Kindred.joke03: "Words, words, la la la, pew twang pew!"
Joke.Kindred.joke04: "I'm hungry, I'm hungry, I'm bored, chase chase chase!"
Joke.Kindred.joke05: "The weft and weave of fate guides... um... uh... how did that poem go again?"

Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.mark01: "The masks of the Kindred seek you!"
Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.mark20: "Their path is destined to cross ours."
Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.mark15: "I hope this one has strong legs!"
Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.mark16: "I will chase it until it's dead!"
Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.markKill05: "Such befalls all who bear our mark."
Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.markKill09: "All your life has led to this moment."
Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.markKill18: "The weft and weave of fate guides---"
Upon Marking an Enemy.Kindred.markSteal05: "What folly it is to snatch our marks."

Upon Buying....Kindred.itemInfinityEdge02: "Sharp enough to slice the veil between life and death."
Upon Buying....Kindred.itemInfinityEdge03: "A sharper blade makes for a cleaner death."
Upon Buying....Kindred.itemBloodthirster03: "They shall not ignore us so easily."
Upon Buying....Kindred.itemBotRK01: "Forged in a land unwelcome to us."

While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown02.1: "There was once a pale man with dark hair who was very lonely."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown02.3: "All things must meet this man, so they shunned him."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown02.5: "He took an axe and split himself in two right down the middle."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown02.6: "So he would always have a friend?"
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown02.7: "So he would always have a friend."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown03.1: "We will soon awaken from this pale slumber."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown04: "Is this what it feels like to end?"
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown04.1: "I do not know, for this is not our end."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown05.1: "Older than those whose footsteps are long vanished."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown06: "Have they forgotten us yet, little Lamb?"
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown06.1: "All still know us, though they try to forget. Soon we will remind them."
While Waiting to Respawn.Kindred.unknown07: "What do all stories have in common, dear Wolf?"

Champion Select.Jinx_Select: "Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!"
Champion Select.Jinx.move19: "Aww, c'mon, what's the worst that could happen?"

Attacking.Jinx.attack01: "Stay still! I'm trying to shoot you!"
Attacking.Jinx.attack02: "I'll give you to the count of - time's up!"
Attacking.Jinx.attack03: "Duck! Hehe, just kidding, that won't help."
Attacking.Jinx.attack06: "Any last words? Ha! No, just die."
Attacking.Jinx.attack08: "No need to be scared - or alive."
Attacking.Jinx.attack16: "I feel like I forgot to shoot something... "
Attacking.MafiaJinx.attack01: "Scream along if you know the words!"
Attacking.MafiaJinx.attack02: "I've got a recital, and everyone's invited!"

Movement.Jinx.move01: "Let's just behave... said no one, ever."
Movement.Jinx.move02: "Wait, I'm thinking! Urgh... how do people do this?"
Movement.Jinx.move03: "I'm trying to care but I just can't!"
Movement.Jinx.move06: "Now where was I? Oh, right, wreaking havoc!"
Movement.Jinx.move07: "Hold on! I'm about to say something really cool!"
Movement.Jinx.move08: "Ask me if I'm listening! Hint: I'm not!"
Movement.Jinx.move09: "I don't even think once about blowing stuff up!"
Movement.Jinx.move10: "She's such a loser, always ready to cry!' T-t-t-ta!"
Movement.Jinx.move11: "You think I'm crazy? You should see my sister!"
Movement.Jinx.move13: "I'm wearing lots of belts! For no reason at all."
Movement.Jinx.move17: "All part of the plan I just made up!"
Movement.Jinx.move18: "What if I had a gun that... shot other guns?"
Movement.Jinx.move19: "Aww, c'mon, what's the worst that could happen?"
Movement.Jinx.move21: "I really need a new gun. But don't tell my other guns."

Taunt.Jinx.taunt01: "Guns don't kill people. I mean, until you shoot them. Then they kill everything!"
Taunt.Jinx.taunt02: "I'm bringing guns to the knife fight! Hehe."
Taunt.Jinx.taunt03: "Say hello to my friends of varying sizes!"
Taunt.Jinx.taunt04: "Three guns means never having to say 'I'm sorry'."
Taunt.Jinx.Caitlyntaunt01: "Welcome to Snoresville, hat lady! Population: you."
Taunt.Jinx.Caitlyntaunt02: "But where are your other guns, hat lady?"

Joke.Jinx.joke01: "Hey Fishbones, should we blow something up? 'You might inconvenience people and hurt their feelings.' You're the worst weapon ever!"
Joke.Jinx.joke02: "Fishbones, you know what we oughta' do? 'Do the laundry, wash dishes and pay some bills.' Stupid dumb rocket launcher."
Joke.Jinx.joke03: "Hey Fishbones, think we can wreak havoc forever? 'No, you should buy a home and save for retirement.' You know I can replace you, right?"
Joke.Jinx.joke04: "Maybe we should settle down and live peaceful lives. 'Really? I always hoped one day you'd---' Haha, nope! You're a death machine for life!"

Upon Using Recall.Jinx.recall03: "I'll be right back! No one die screaming without me!"

Upon Death.Jinx.ChampionSpecific02: "That was almost not close at all!"

Champion Select.TahmKench_Select: "Call me king, call me demon - water forgets the names of the drowned."

Upon Starting a Game.TahmKench.start01: "I see nothing splendiferous in this table's offerings!"
Upon Starting a Game.TahmKench.start02: "It is my mouth into which all travels end."
Upon Starting a Game.TahmKench.start04: "It is the heart from which the darkest water flows."

Attacking.TahmKench.unknown05: "Beast, you are a rank dish! Ill served!"

Movement.TahmKench.move06: "I have tastes that aren't easily... pacified."
Movement.TahmKench.move08: "All the world's a river - and I'm its king."
Movement.TahmKench.move09: "All creation is born famished and starving."
Movement.TahmKench.move12: "I refuse to succumb to culinary degradation!"
Movement.TahmKench.move13: "We all gourmandize from time to time."
Movement.TahmKench.move14: "The only real sin is to deny a craving."
Movement.TahmKench.move17: "A depth of flavor is what I covet."

Taunt.TahmKench.taunt01: "You are a malodorous offense to my palate!"
Taunt.TahmKench.taunt02: "The baseness of your appetite repulses me!"
Taunt.TahmKench.taunt03: "Your mind is as clear as mud."
Taunt.TahmKench.taunt04: "Child, you're a couple cows short of a steak!"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAatrox02: "War is a manly appetite, and your directness has my admiration."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAatrox01: "Brother, you're as cultured as a crematorium selling barbecue."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAhri02: "I am enthralled by your class and refinement - I must offer you a token of my admirations."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAhri01: "You're as modest as a freshly-paid courtesan."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAkali01: "Hiding in smoke? Young lady, you're as sharp as a bag of slugs."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAlistar02: "Any pejorative of bullheadedness is pulverized by your magnificence."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAmumu02: "Coveting friendship is barely an appetite - but one I do so sympathize with."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAmumu01: "I say, you're as 'fun' as a leaky roof."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAnivia01: "I suppose I must defrost you first."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAshe02: "If you wanna' build an empire of peace, then your mortar will be blood."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAshe01: "Girl, you got as much 'foresight' as a blindfolded mole."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAzir01: "An emperor as humble as he is beloved."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAzir02: "Son, your empire was built on sand."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAzir03: "You're the emperor - of mashed potatoes and gravy."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntAzir04: "Your empire? I look upon your works and despair."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntBlitzcrank01: "If your heart is gold and your body is steel, why's tin between your ears?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntBraum03: "The heart of the Freljord must long for something."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntBraum01: "You're strong like bull, and smart like cow."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntCaitlyn02: "If you want to clean up the city, don't you need to understand where that dirt comes from?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntCaitlyn01: "You're as elegant as an outhouse in a leper colony!"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntChoGath01: "Personally I hunger for things less literal."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDarius02: "Your strength is waning, General. 'Course, I can help you slow time's regress."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDarius01: "You're as subtle as a gold codpiece."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDiana02: "Vengeance is a thirst I could help you quench."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDiana01: "Girl, you're crazier than a mouse in moonshine."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDraven02: "Your hunger for attention deserves to be sated."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDraven03: "I wonder - how can you receive the attention you deserve... while your brother is in the way?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDraven01: "At least the rumor of your vanity isn't overrated."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDrMundo02: "I can show Mundo new places to go - if he pleases."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntDrMundo01: "Your diction is as exemplary as your intellect."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntEkko02: "Time is but another river - and I care not what water I swim in."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntEkko01: "Your youthful rebellion is as tedious as your hairstyle."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntEzreal02: "Why should a hunger for adventure ever be sated?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntEzreal01: "Youthful ignorance is unfortunately your best quality."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntFiora02: "An appetite for a challenge is a craving without liability."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntFiora01: "A duel is a fight between two imbeciles... and you are the greatest."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntFizz01: "Wouldn't you care to travel to your people's destination?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntGangplank02: "You're a man with troubles. I have solutions."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntGangplank01: "Your attempt to be monstrous is as successful as your dictatorship."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntGaren01: "You live by a code that'll never let you get what you want. Let me take you to her."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntGnar02: "Time is just a river, boy, let me take you back where you belong."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntGnar01: "Your conversation makes as much sense as a fish in lingerie!"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntGragas02: "I admire a man of appetites - let me help you find refreshment."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntGragas01: "Your tastes are as elegant as a broken latrine."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJanna02: "There's a storm in your heart, girl. Tell me what you hunger for."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJanna01: "Girl, you're as appealing as a cake in the rain."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJarvan02: "Only a fool wouldn't hunger for the throne. Let me help you find that seat."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJarvan01: "Anything getting through that gold helmet of yours?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJax02: "It is wonderful to be hungry for a challenge."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJax01: "Boy, you are a few candles short of a lantern."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJayce02: "A drive for innovation? It's just a hunger for something new."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJinx02: "An appetite for chaos? Let me feed that mayhem."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntJinx01: "Girl, if brains were dynamite, you'd be a dud."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntKatarina01: "Don't starve your heart, child! Let me deliver you to him."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntLeeSin01: "Truth requires a journey on blind faith."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntLissandra02: "Could I offer you a bargain to replace your previous engagement?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntLissandra01: "Good ideas fall from you like pudding from a harpy."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntLucian02: "Step closer, and I'll carry you to your prize."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntLucian01: "A fool and his love are easily parted."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntMissFortune01: "The road to vengeance requires a journey I would happily provide."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntMissFortune02: "The enormity of the hat doesn't hide the vacancy beneath it!"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntNami02: "A journey to a moonstone is one I could provide."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntNasus02: "Forgiveness is a shore like any other."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntNasus01: "You're like a roofless mansion - impressively useless."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntRenekton01: "I appreciate your mind is unsullied by the complications of reason."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntRyze02: "You are a traveler... and I provide transport."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntRyze01: "You read words and mistake that for understanding."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntSejuani02: "Let me make a meal with your ambition."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntSejuani01: "You're as witty as you are subtle."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntSivir02: "Why not travel to when you were free from these doubts?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntSivir01: "Your tastes are about as sophisticated as your wardrobe."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntTeemo02: "Every heart has its own hunger. Tell me yours."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntTeemo01: "You're as likable as a rat in a bridle shop."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntTwistedFate02: "Bilgewater is a rough town to leave - I could make it easier for you."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntTwistedFate01: "A gambler's luck is only predictable... when he's a cheat."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntVi02: "Child, why would you sublimate a hunger? Have you forgotten who you are?"
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntVi01: "A boxer who thinks with her fists must inevitably punch with her face."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntWukong01: "Do you want to reach your potential? It's a journey I could provide."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntXerath02: "Ah, nothing whets my appetite like the flames of ambition gone awry."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntXerath01: "A slave's mind is never free, but I suspect you got yours on discount."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntYasuo02: "Your destiny isn't in the wind - it's on the river."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntYasuo01: "You're as quick as a turtle on molasses."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntZed02: "Child, a shadow must run from the light eventually."
Taunt.TahmKench.tauntZed01: "So, shiny attire seem like the thing to wear? You are the most intelligent ninja in the world."
Taunt.TahmKench.unknown01: "I presume you are the waiter at this establishment."
Taunt.TahmKench.unknown02: "Are you the waiter of this establishment?"

Upon Being Attacked with Thick Skin Act.TahmKench.E1: "You have succeeded only in ruffling my attire!"
Upon Being Attacked with Thick Skin Act.TahmKench.E3: "Was that an attack, or an hors d'oeuvre?"

Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemFrozenHeart02: "There is something sublime about holding a heart in your hand."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemLocketoftheIronSolari01: "I can provide all manner of refuge."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemLocketoftheIronSolari02: "I am sanctuary for those in my favour."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemLocketoftheIronSolari03: "How did I leave my jacket pocket unadorned for so long?"
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemMercurysTreads01: "I have a hunger for... fine shoes."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemMikaelsCrucible01: "I wonder who might like to bargain for a little freedom."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemRanduinsOmen02: "A little sedation for my more noisesome neighbours."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemRanduinsOmen03: "A handy tool for the next time I'm... in between meals."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemRavenousHydra02: "I pity the hydra. So many heads intent on sharing the meal."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemRavenousHydra03: "Truly this is the best way to enjoy a buffet."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemSpiritVisage01: "My visage was already flawless, now it just has more vigor."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemSpiritVisage02: "I refuse to trouble myself with charlatans."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemSunfireCape01: "A gentleman without a cape is only half-dressed."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemSunfireCape02: "Fire warms the spirit, and charges the appetite."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemWarmogsArmor01: "War is an appetite like any other."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemWarmogsArmor02: "A hearty appetite pairs best with a robust constitution."
Upon Buying....TahmKench.itemWarmogsArmor03: "Say what you will - a large man can not be ignored."

Upon Placing a Ward.TahmKench.ward01: "I prefer to know when my next meal approaches."
Upon Placing a Ward.TahmKench.ward02: "Even when you have no bait, you can still cast a line and hope."
Upon Placing a Ward.TahmKench.ward03: "I search for bargains wherever fools cross my domain."
Upon Placing a Ward.TahmKench.ward04: "A true meal requires foresight to manifest."

Upon Casting Recall.TahmKench.recall01: "Regrettably, I must retire in order to find a digestive."
Upon Casting Recall.TahmKench.recall02: "I shall return to this establishment shortly."

Champion Select.Lucian_Select: "Everybody dies. Some just need a little help."
Champion Select.Lucian.move10: "You don't have the heart for this."

Attacking.Lucian.attack12: "Trick shot? The trick is not to get shot."
Attacking.Lucian.attack14: "H'yeah, I've got a cure for that."

Movement.Lucian.move10: "You don't have the heart for this."
Movement.Lucian.move12: "Some call it magic. I call it good aim."

Joke.Lucian.joke03: "Heheh, and they say I have a grim sense of humor."

Taunt.Lucian.taunt01: "I'll have no trouble killing you, and less trouble killing you again!"
Taunt.Lucian.taunt02: "Death is a mercy, and I have enough mercy to go around."
Taunt.Lucian.taunt03: "Death at the door? Hmph, no. I am the one who knocks."
Taunt.Lucian.interaction01: "You took the better half of me, Thresh. What you left is a dangerous enemy."
Taunt.Lucian.interaction02: "It's not that I fear you, Hecarim. I just hate to put a good horse down."
Taunt.Lucian.interaction03: "Let's crack you open, Mordekaiser, and see what's inside."

Movement.Zed.move11: "What I have done... cannot be undone."

Attacking.Zed.attack2: "I am the blade in the darkness."

Taunt.Zed.taunt1: "Embrace the shadow... or die in darkness!"
Taunt.Zed.taunt2: "The merest shade of me... is enough to defeat you!"
Taunt.Zed.tauntShen: "Challenge me, Shen... you shall not be an orphan long!"

Champion Select.Kled_Select: "I find courage unpredictable, it's total insanity you can rely on!"
Champion Select.Kled_Ban: "Oh, I knew you was all yeller!"

Upon Starting a Game.Kled.start03: "What was that? Oh, I should go for the decakill? Uh, if you say so."
Upon Starting a Game.Kled.start04: "It's my property! All sixty gazillion acres of it!"
Upon Starting a Game.Kled.start06: "Guess we'll have to kill our way out!"

Attacking.Kled.attackMount01: "Slow down so I can kill something!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount06: "Step on my land again, you're done!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount07: "How about a long axe in your guts?"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount09: "You should run! Skaarl likes his food lively!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount10: "Don't interrupt me! I'm trying to start a fight!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount12: "I'm Kled, and this here's Skaarl. Prepare to die."
Attacking.Kled.attackMount13: "This is how it's gonna work: I kill you, then I take your stuff."
Attacking.Kled.attackMount15: "You see my welcome sign back there? No? It was your friend's skull!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount16: "You will salute when you address me!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount18: "Why ain't they saluting me? They should be saluting me! Salute me now!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount19: "You get my invitation to visit? No? 'cause there ain't one!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount22: "I got your welcoming present right here!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount24: "Only coffin's gonna' be this lizard's belly!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount26: "I might have to jump off this lizard and put my boot in your watoosie!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount30: "My brain is on fire, my soul is strong, and my lizard is hungry!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount32: "He looked at me funny! Get him."
Attacking.Kled.attackMount34: "You looking at me? 'cause I'm gonna' kill you!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount36: "You just justified a preemptive retaliatory strike!"
Attacking.Kled.attackMount37: "They came looking for a fight? Let's oblige 'em."
Attacking.Kled.attackMount38: "I am justified, and I am armed!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount06: "I'll say something witty after I kill you!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount07: "I'm gonna' cut you open and use your spine for a back scratcher, because it is itchy! Very itchy!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount08: "I can only express myself through violence!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount16: "You thought I was done? Kled ain't never done!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount20: "You see, Skaarl? I'm doing it alone!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount28: "You're a cockroach, and it's half-past stomping time!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount35: "I'm gonna reach down your throat, and turn your lungs into mittens!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount36: "I'm gonna make you wish you were a hallucination!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount37: "You think I don't hear you laughing?"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount38: "There's fixing to be two sounds: me hitting you, and---"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount39: "Lord Colonel Major Centurion Kled don't run, no he don't!"
Attacking.Kled.attackDismount40: "I came here to... well, I don't know what I came here for, but I'm gonna' defend it!"

Movement.Kled.moveMount01: "This land was made for me - and me alone."
Movement.Kled.moveMount02: "I hate to advocate violence and insanity, but it's worked for me."
Movement.Kled.moveMount03: "Were you just talking, or was it the voices again?"
Movement.Kled.moveMount04: "I do not want my lands tamed. I want them unruly and free."
Movement.Kled.moveMount05: "I'm from all over. It's next to nowhere and shut the hell up!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount06: "I play with guns. I work with an axe."
Movement.Kled.moveMount07: "Mushrooms are healthy! Once you get used to the madness and paranoia."
Movement.Kled.moveMount08: "A man without a weapon ain't worth listening to."
Movement.Kled.moveMount09: "Yeah, I like it out here. Freedom, communing with nature, killing hikers."
Movement.Kled.moveMount11: "I keep hallucinating that you can talk."
Movement.Kled.moveMount13: "Skaarl! This ain't no time for philosophying!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount14: "Killing a few things might loosen this up."
Movement.Kled.moveMount15: "No more of that! You're upsetting the invisible badgers!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount16: "My land begins where I walk. It ends where the sun don't shine!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount17: "Damn cowards, making me ride over to kill 'em."
Movement.Kled.moveMount18: "Well, maybe I am looking to start a fight!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount19: "I do prefer to ride into battle."
Movement.Kled.moveMount20: "Yeah, but... then how we gonna' invade both bases at once?"
Movement.Kled.moveMount22: "Of course I'm paranoid! You tried to kill me yesterday!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount23: "Nah, them we kill them too! Ain't nobody on my team but you."
Movement.Kled.moveMount24: "I came to cut off a piece of that Noxian dream... and I ain't sharing my piece!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount25: "Don't try and understand 'em, just rope, throw and brand 'em."
Movement.Kled.moveMount26: "I grew up mean and now I'm older than murder."
Movement.Kled.moveMount27: "Ain't nothing more beautiful than the Noxian plains... excepting a rich corpse."
Movement.Kled.moveMount28: "All we need is open country, but we gonna' take everything they got!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount29: "I fight better when I've had my... medicine."
Movement.Kled.moveMount30: "No! Planning and strategy? That's city-folk stuff!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount31: "Don't need a plan... long as I got this axe."
Movement.Kled.moveMount32: "Yeah, they just confirming our suspicions, ain't they?"
Movement.Kled.moveMount33: "I don't have trouble communicating. Words is just treacherous bastards."
Movement.Kled.moveMount34: "You ready, Skaarl? This day's gonna' require some mindblowing weirdness."
Movement.Kled.moveMount37: "Hey, it's Forward Admiral Major Kled! I ain't been a Mister since ever!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount38: "Shh! Them brain weasels probably listening for us."
Movement.Kled.moveMount39: "Let's get to killing them interloping intruders!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount40: "Was the battle of Falgrim when I first took the rank of Sergeant General Colonel. Least, I think that's what rank they was. Gotta' remember to ask before killing them."
Movement.Kled.moveMount41: "Ain't nothing like having the wind on your back and blood on your face."
Movement.Kled.moveMount42: "It's your birthday, Skaarl! Let's bake a murder cake!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount43: "Well, my foot wanted to meet your ass, and I'm about to give them a shotgun wedding!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount44: "Shh! It's time to get violent... and weird."
Movement.Kled.moveMount45: "Oh, we find 'em, tie 'em up, then they's like a piñata full of meat."
Movement.Kled.moveMount46: "Damnit Skaarl, d'you hide my mushroom juice again?"
Movement.Kled.moveMount47: "After we finish murdering these folks, what do you think? Tacos? Yeah, tacos."
Movement.Kled.moveMount48: "First, we kill 'em, then we make 'em tell us where they came from."
Movement.Kled.moveMount49: "Remember when we sacked Trevail, and that general thought we'd be willing to share the spoils? Pheh! Officers die just as easy as anybody."
Movement.Kled.moveMount50: "There ain't no land that ain't mine. Just land I ain't got around to claiming."
Movement.Kled.moveMount51: "Just 'cause they're our team don't mean we can trust 'em."
Movement.Kled.moveMount52: "They're all trespassers, we're just killing them five first."
Movement.Kled.moveMount53: "Yeah, yeah, invade Ionia you said, it'll be fine you said!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount55: "Yeah, reminds me of the siege of Rugg. Lot of men died on its high walls. It was fun."
Movement.Kled.moveMount56: "At the gates of Qualthala, they tried using that boiling oil on us, but you can't deep-fry courage!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount58: "Would you stop bitching for one minute?"
Movement.Kled.moveMount59: "I am deep-fried courage, and an apple pie of angry!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount60: "Because I know someone is trying to sneak up on us!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount61: "Yeah, they think they so clever! Brains don't win fights, brains is what splatter on you!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount62: "Well, you the only thing I trust."
Movement.Kled.moveMount65: "Well, just 'cause you're a hallucination and I don't speak lizard don't mean I can't understand you!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount66: "You do come up with the best ideas."
Movement.Kled.moveMount67: "No, it's when I don't drink mushroom juice that I have a problem!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount68: "I am Kled! High Major Commodore of the First Legion Third Multiplication Double Admiral Artillery Vanguard Company! You will respect my authority!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount69: "We was having a nice conversation, then they showed up... uninvited!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount70: "Noxus was created to train the faithful."
Movement.Kled.moveMount71: "What are you whining about? I already fed you half a platoon!"
Movement.Kled.moveMount73: "Naw, it's just like the assault on Glorft. You seen one artillery vanguard in a commando fleet action, you seen 'em all."
Movement.Kled.moveMount74: "Noxus ends where I say it ends."
Movement.Kled.moveMount75: "Ain't much I love. Only this big sky, and this dumb lizard."
Movement.Kled.moveMount77: "The sky is my roof, the open plains are my bed, and this lizard is the only company I need."
Movement.Kled.moveMount78: "This big sky, this green land. Now how could I share this with anyone?"
Movement.Kled.moveMount79: "Woo, it's darn pretty round here. Glad it's mine."
Movement.Kled.moveMount80: "You can't be lonely when the land is this beautiful."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount01: "This world is rough. You gotta' be tough or die."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount02: "Yes, a sane man would run, but I ain't the running kind!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount05: "This is just a victory waiting to happen!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount06: "This desert sky's gonna' open up with a rain of heavenly bloodshed and glorious violence!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount07: "I am the brutal instrument of my own destiny!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount08: "Ain't nobody gonna' give you nothing. Gotta' take it yourself."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount10: "I didn't become a Rear Forward Brigadier Admiral from running!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount11: "I don't need that lizard! Kled's got his own ideas."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount12: "I don't need nothing but this axe... and this gun... and this hat."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount13: "Why's all these intruders so far away?"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount14: "I know that lizard ain't talking, but I still hear him. Shut up, lizard. Shut up!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount16: "Hey, what was that? Of course I don't need Skaarl... but he helps."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount17: "What was that? Run straight into the tower?"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount18: "I don't need a team to start a teamfight!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount19: "Sure! I'll kill all of them myself!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount21: "I said I wasn't not backing off, no how!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount22: "Even if I lose, I win! Just means I get to come back and kill you later!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount23: "I know you're listening, brain weasels! I ain't falling for it!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount24: "I am Sir Admiral Major Kled, and I smell a victory potpourri!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount25: "First thing you learn as a Lieutenant Sergeant Commodore: rely only on yourself."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount28: "I didn't not earn the rank of Sergeant double Admiral by not running!"
Movement.Kled.moveDismount30: "Oh, she'll see, she'll see! She'll come strolling back when I turn them interlopers into a purée."
Movement.Kled.moveDismount31: "Ain't nobody tough as Kled! I've got gravel in my guts and a fire in my head!"

Taunt.Kled.taunt01: "Don't worry, them voices ain't telling me to kill you no more...! Yeah, of course we still gonna' kill 'im."
Taunt.Kled.taunt02: "You do realise... you're on my property?"
Taunt.Kled.taunt03: "I figure I'll help you kill 'em... before I kill you."
Taunt.Kled.taunt04: "Usually I find conversation boring and useless. You remind me I'm right."
Taunt.Kled.taunt05: "You feel like arguing about something? It'll make what happens later easier for you."
Taunt.Kled.taunt06: "So... when exactly you planning on getting the hell outta' here?"
Taunt.Kled.taunt07: "Woo, no sir, I ain't gonna' kill you and feed you to my lizard! Them's just... malicious rumours!"
Taunt.Kled.taunt08: "Oh, before I forget, what, uh... rank are you, exactly?"
Taunt.Kled.tauntNoxian01: "You may be from Noxus, but you ain't Noxian."
Taunt.Kled.tauntNoxian03: "You know, I like you, brother. As much as I can like a lily-livered jungle-sniffer."
Taunt.Kled.tauntNoxian04: "You sure you're Noxian? You look a little Ionian to me."
Taunt.Kled.tauntNoxian05: "Watch your stepping! That's my land you're gallivanting on!"
Taunt.Kled.tauntAatrox01: "Drinking from battle? What kind of dumb crap is that?"
Taunt.Kled.tauntAatrox02: "Telling people you're a god? Hell, you're barely a paring knife."
Taunt.Kled.tauntAatrox03: "Something caught in your throat? 'cause you sound desperate!"
Taunt.Kled.interactionTauntEnemy02: "Thems fighting words! See, Skaarl? That's why I don't like people."
Taunt.Kled.interactionTauntEnemy03: "Shut your mouth hole! Them badgers are listening."
Taunt.Kled.interactionTauntEnemy04: "I'm just a Yordle standing in front of you, asking you to shut the hell up!"
Taunt.Kled.interactionTauntEnemy05: "Of course you realize, this means war."

Joke.Kled.interactionEnemyJoke01: "So, that's what considered funny in the city, huh?"
Joke.Kled.interactionEnemyJoke02: "I got a joke too! It's called me kicking your teeth in!"
