Joke.Kled.interactionEnemyJoke03: "That it? That was your joke, huh?"
Joke.Kled.interactionEnemyJoke04: "Was you making fun of my Skaarl?"
Joke.Kled.interactionEnemyJoke05: "Real funny! Knew a funny guy in the Draken Campaign - took a javelin in the spine, couldn't walk after that. Used him as a coat rack."

When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlLowHealth02: "Dang nabbit, you're gonna' get us killed!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlLowHealth09: "Don't you run off on me! Skaarl!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlFlee06: "I ain't never forgiving you, you flea-bitten-!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlFlee07: "Go home, get! I never needed you no how!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlFlee09: "No, no! The other way! Get back here!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlFlee19: "I will--- I ain't backing down! I don't back down! Never!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlFlee20: "Where you going? We got 'em right where we want 'em!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlReturn05: "If you does that one more time I'll skewer you and roast you myself!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlReturn11: "Boy am I glad to see you!"
When Skaarl Gets to Low Health.Kled.skaarlReturn16: "Yeehaw! I knew you couldn't quit me, Skaarl!"

Upon Casting Beartrap on a Rope.Kled.spellQ12: "Come back, I gotta' put an axe in your brain!"

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill01: "This is Noxus, son! Winner takes all!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill03: "Thought you could take my land, huh? How'd that work out for you?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill05: "Don't worry, Skaarl! We'll come back so you can eat 'em later."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill06: "Whoops! Looks like I accidentally stabbed you with my long axe - until you were dead!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill07: "You were a visitor, now you're mulch!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill08: "Skaarl, that was what we call a predictable scenario."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill09: "I told 'em what was gonna' happen if they came onto my land!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill10: "Next time you visit, bring more stuff I can take!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill11: "I might be a deranged lizard-riding bandito, but I whooped you real good!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill12: "Now, I might have overreacted to you unlawfully entering my property - but I don't think so!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill13: "Ahahahaha! I warned him! I did warn him!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill14: "It's funny, 'cause he died right on the border of my land, and more off my land!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill16: "Don't let the door hit you on your way to hell!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill20: "We didn't come here to teach lessons in humanity!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill23: "Nothing like a river of blood to send a message."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.kill24: "Y'know, a long time ago, being crazy meant something."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killYordle01: "Just 'cause we was kin don't mean I ain't feeding you to Skaarl!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killYordle02: "Hey cous', glad you came to visit!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killYordle04: "Afraid I had to cut your visit short."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killYordle06: "Aw, you are so cute... 'fore I ripped your fuzzy head off!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killYordle07: "I could feel bad about killing you, or we could stomp on your corpse!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killAatrox01: "He died as dumb as he sounded."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killAatrox02: "And he ain't even had the indignity to call himself a demon."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killAatrox03: "Never had much to say, but I'm sure glad we shut him up."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killCassiopeia02: "I mean, before we killed her. Snake for legs? Crazy!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killCassiopeia04: "Was that lady half-snake, or that snake half-human? She is... confusing. Dead, but confusing."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killDarius01: "Hey, lizard food! What exactly was you general of?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killDarius04: "He wanted to unify Noxus. Guess that makes me a secessionist."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killIllaoi01: "Skaarl? You eatin' good tonight! That girl's got some meat on her!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killIllaoi03: "I gotta' stop the mushroom juice... I swear that girl had some tentacles or something!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killJhin02: "Hey, fancy pants! Got your cloak dirty!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killJhin03: "I don't know what he was. I just needed him to shut up."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killJhin04: "I can respect crazy, but what kind of fool reloads in the middle of a fight?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killKatarina01: "A sinister blade? Heck, girl, Skaarl's got farts more sinister than you was."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killKatarina03: "No, obviously she didn't have any! That's the darn point!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killLeBlanc01: "She had one crazy getup! Them city-folk clothes is getting ridiculous."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killLeBlanc04: "All your little city-girl dreams just got stomped."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killRekSai02: "Damn varmint left holes all over the yard."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killRekSai03: "Queen of what? Darn thing made Skaarl look smart!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killRiven01: "Pure Noxian girl. Almost liked her. Almost."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killRiven02: "Seems to have lost your bounce, girl."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killRiven03: "All that hippy hop! Getting on my nerves!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killSion01: "How many times do I gotta' kill him?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killSion03: "Too stupid to live, too dumb to die."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killSion04: "I don't think you can eat that one."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killSion06: "Huh. I liked him better when he was alive."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killSwain02: "Master Tactician? He can keep that title."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killSwain04: "I figure he gonna' taste like chicken."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killTahmKench03: "I knew he was a liar, 'cause he used them big words."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killTalon01: "I've seem some dumb outfits, Skaarl, but a cape made out of knives? Woo, ha! That took the cake!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killTalon02: "Another dead city boy, thinking he could sneaky-sneak on my land."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Kled.killTalon03: "Let that be a lesson for all them sneaky-sneaks!"

Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward01: "I keep my eyes open - all the time."
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward02: "I ain't paranoid - I'm ready. Real ready."
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward03: "They's always trying to sneak up on us. Trying, that is."
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward05: "Them sneaky-sneaks ain't gonna' sneak on us, no sir!"
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward06: "It's mine, and I got my eye on it!"
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward07: "Yeah, any of them varmints sneak up on us, we'll know."
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward08: "It ain't paranoia if everyone is out to get you."
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward10: "There's no such thing as paranoia; your worst fears can come true at any moment."
Upon Placing a Ward.Kled.ward11: "Paranoia is just another word for ignorance."

Attacking.Ekko.attack07: "Good a time as any to act reckless."
Attacking.Ekko.attack13: "This is how we say 'hello' in Zaun."

Movement.Ekko.move18: "Fool me once... and I'll just rewind."
Movement.Ekko.move20: "My pasts have a way of catching up."
Movement.Ekko.move21: "I'd rather make mistakes than make nothing at all."
Movement.Ekko.move25: "If there are limits... I haven't found them yet."

Joke.Ekko.joke01: "Uh... if anyone sees my paradox, ask 'im where I am."
Joke.Ekko.joke02: "The timeline was already this broken when I found it. I swear."
Joke.Ekko.joke03: "Let me be honest - I have no idea what I'm doing."
Joke.Ekko.joke04: "This is the longest second of my life."
Joke.Ekko.joke06: "How many Pilties does it take to make a hammer? All of 'em! Hehe..."
Joke.Ekko.joke07: "How many Pilties does it take to make a hammer? Zero! They make 'em in Zaun!"
Joke.Ekko.joke08: "How many Pilties does it take to make a hammer? Two, if you count Jayce's reflection! Haha! Oh, Jayce."

Taunt.Ekko.taunt02: "I've seen your future - and it's got broken bones."
Taunt.Ekko.taunt03: "Won this fight already - doing it again for fun."
Taunt.Ekko.tauntDrMundo01: "Go where you want, Mundo - outside of Zaun."
Taunt.Ekko.tauntJayce01: "I like you better on paper, poster boy."
Taunt.Ekko.tauntJayce02: "Nice face - shame if something happened to it."
Taunt.Ekko.tauntJinx01: "I had a crush... until you started talking to the gun."
Taunt.Ekko.tauntTwitch02: "I lost a pet rat once. Is that you, Mr. Tails?"
Taunt.Ekko.tauntUrgot01: "Take my time machine, Urgot. You clearly need it more."
Taunt.Ekko.tauntZac01: "I'll poke your eye out- head out- face off? How do you even work?"
Taunt.Ekko.tauntVi04: "One day, you'll come back to Zaun."
Taunt.Ekko.tauntZilean02: "I really hope you're not the future me."

Upon Casting Chronobreak.Ekko.sniper02: "Next time, shoot where I'm gonna' be!"

Upon Buying....Ekko.itemGuardianAngel02: "Yep. Put an angel on the job. I could use a break."
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemGuardianAngel03: "I'm sure I won't be needing this... but I'll take it anyhow."
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemGuardianAngel04: "A second chance? I thought I was on my fifth!"
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemHextechGunblade01: "I love hitting Pilties with their own toys."
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemHextechGunblade02: "Put a gun on a sword; typical Piltover brilliance."
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemLudensEcho01: "It's like it was made for me."
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemRabadonsDeathcap01: "Not much of a hat guy... but this thing is awesome!"
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemRodofAges01: "Some things do get better with time."
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemRodofAges02: "Yep; this thing has a bright future."
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemVoidStaff01: "Can't hide your weak spots from me!"
Upon Buying....Ekko.itemZhonyasHourglass02: "Stops time? Huh. Thought I'd never get a break."

Upon Being Revived by Chronoshift.Ekko.revive01: "You gotta' teach me that trick, Zil!"
Upon Being Revived by Chronoshift.Ekko.revive02: "I coulda' survived that - but thanks anyway."

Upon Respawning.Ekko.respawn01: "Yep... that went exactly how I didn't want it to go."

Upon Casting Recall.Ekko.recall01: "I need to rethink a couple things."

Champion Select.Vi.taunt2: "If I want your opinion, I'll beat it out of you."

Movement.Vi.move1: "Here I come to save the day... or wreck it."
Movement.Vi.move9: "If you hit a wall, hit it hard!"
Movement.Vi.move11: "I let my hands do the talking."

Taunt.Vi.taunt1: "I've got five reasons for you to shut up."
Taunt.Vi.taunt2: "If I want your opinion, I'll beat it out of you."
Taunt.Vi.taunt3: "I like you as far as I can throw you... not even."
Taunt.Vi.tauntCait1: "Care for a spot of tea? Or maybe a spot of punch in the face."
Taunt.Vi.tauntCait2: "Oh, look at me... I'm on the case."
Taunt.Vi.special2: "Aww, was that supposed to hurt, Cait?"

Joke.Vi.joke1: "We can either do this the hard way or... oh wait, no, there's just the hard way."
Joke.Vi.joke2: "Hmm, I like your smile. Gives me something to aim at."
Joke.Vi.joke3: "I like your smile. Makes a nice target."
Joke.Vi.joke4: "Why can't I get a straight answer? It's always just 'Oh no! Stop hitting me! Ow, my face!'"
Joke.Vi.joke5: "Welcome to the party. Try the punch."

Attacking.Aatrox.attack10: "Rage against the dying of the light."

Movement.Aatrox.move03: "Peace is the greatest lie of all."
Movement.Aatrox.move10: "I know what lurks in the hearts of men."
Movement.Aatrox.special02: "This one's rage will shape the world."

Joke.Aatrox.joke01: "Nobody understands me! They called my work a hack job."
Joke.Aatrox.joke02: "This is no mere massacre; this is my masterwork!"

Taunt.Aatrox.taunt01: "Fight and be remembered as a hero, or die and be remembered as a coward."
Taunt.Aatrox.taunt01_alt: "Fight as a hero, or die as a coward."
Taunt.Aatrox.taunt01_alt2: "Fight and be remembered, or die and be forgotten."
Taunt.Aatrox.taunt02: "Die with fear in your heart, or win with blood on your hands."
Taunt.Aatrox.taunt03: "Even those who have nothing can give their lives."

Champion Select.Nami_Select: "I decide what the tide will bring."

Movement.Nami.move7: "We are all tied to the ocean."
Movement.Nami.move13: "I still hear the song of the sea."
Movement.Nami.move11: "The softest water wears down the hardest rock."

Joke.Nami.joke1: "Sometimes you're the catch. Sometimes you're the bait."
Joke.Nami.joke2: "The sea holds fearsome creatures... and them."

Upon Starting a Game.Azir.move01: "Shurima will once again stretch to the horizon."
Upon Starting a Game.Azir.move03: "The world is a desert. I am the oasis."

Attacking.Azir.attack02: "The unworthy have no place in history."
Attacking.Azir.dragon03: "Even dragons look up to the sun."
Attacking.Azir.vilemaw01: "This spider will be trampled in our march."
Attacking.Azir.vilemaw02: "You may be large, Vilemaw, but you remain an insect to me."
Attacking.Azir.vilemaw03: "It is you who are in my web, spider."
Attacking.Azir.baron03: "What is a baron to an emperor?"

Movement.Azir.move04: "The power of the sun lives in Shurima."
Movement.Azir.move05: "You need not follow, but you must witness."
Movement.Azir.move08: "My empire lives in every grain of sand."
Movement.Azir.move15: "We will unearth what has been lost."
Movement.Azir.move16: "None know the will of the desert better than I."
Movement.Azir.move18: "The Ascended shall guide humanity to greatness."

Joke.Azir.joke01: "So, a pigeon walks into a bar..."
Joke.Azir.joke02: "For emperors, it's all about how you carry yourself."

Taunt.Azir.taunt01: "There is only Shurima. All else is but a mirage."
Taunt.Azir.taunt02: "What is the desert, but the ashes of my enemies?"
Taunt.Azir.taunt03: "When every trace of you is lost, I will remain."
Taunt.Azir.tauntSivir03: "Rise with Shurima, Sivir, or fall beneath it."
Taunt.Azir.tauntRenekton01: "Renekton, once a noble warrior, now naught but a mad beast."
Taunt.Azir.tauntXerath01: "You are but a grain of sand, Xerath."
Taunt.Azir.tauntXerath02: "Emperors have no rivals, Xerath. Only liabilities."
Taunt.Azir.tauntXerath03: "Xerath, it is time your spark went out."
Taunt.Azir.tauntXerath04: "You have already failed, Xerath. You must now accept it."
Taunt.Azir.tauntXerath05: "Traitor, I cast you to the winds."
Taunt.Azir.tauntXerath07: "Xerath, the time of your judgment has come."

Upon Buying....Azir.itemBoots02: "May the sands of Shurima always be under our feet."
Upon Buying....Azir.itemZhonyas01: "Shuriman sands flow ever in our favour."

Ascension.Azir.ascensionStart02: "Here, we shall decide the future of Shurima!"
Ascension.Azir.ascensionStart03: "The future will be written by the Ascended!"
Ascension.Azir.ascensionStart04: "Today, you will see the power of Ascension!"
Ascension.Azir.unknownNasus01: "It has been a long wait, Nasus, but it will be worth it."
Ascension.Azir.unknownNasus02: "Let us return to our rightful place, Nasus."
Ascension.Azir.unknownSivir01: "It is our right to rule, Sivir."
Ascension.Azir.unknownSivir02: "Together, we shall strive toward victory, Sivir."
Ascension.Azir.ascensionSelf01: "I am testament to the glory of Shurima!"
Ascension.Azir.ascensionSelf02: "It is my time. Put your faith in me."
Ascension.Azir.ascensionSelf04: "You need not follow me... but you cannot stop me."
Ascension.Azir.ascension01: "It is your turn to carry our great legacy."
Ascension.Azir.ascensionVictory01: "This is but one step on a long and glorious path."
Ascension.Azir.ascensionVictory02: "At last, Shurima will reach its destiny!"
Ascension.Azir.ascensionVictory04: "None shall ever question the power of Shurima!"

Attacking.Thresh.attack1: "Writhe, like a worm on a hook."
Attacking.Thresh.attack9: "Oh, yes! It's about to get much worse."

Movement.Thresh.move6: "Oh, the eternity we shall spend together."
Movement.Thresh.move8: "What is the worth of a soul?"
Movement.Thresh.move9: "I am the thing under the bed."

Joke.Thresh.joke1: "Screaming won't do you any good, but it's music to my ears."
Joke.Thresh.joke2: "There is life. There is death. And then there is me."

Taunt.Thresh.taunt1: "Ever seen your soul? Would you like to?"
Taunt.Thresh.taunt2: "You're falling apart. What to do with the pieces?"

Champion Select.Illaoi_Select: "I'm not big on sermons - broken bones teach better lessons."

Upon Starting a Game.Illaoi.start01: "It is my burden to carry an eye of god. It is my privilege to see the truth."
Upon Starting a Game.Illaoi.start02: "We cannot comprehend the design. A raindrop cannot comprehend a river valley."
Upon Starting a Game.Illaoi.start03: "To die is to drown - so I will swim well, till I can swim no more."

Attacking.Illaoi.attack15: "Ha ha ha, you think you can beat me?"
Attacking.Illaoi.attack16: "They need wisdom. They don't need teeth."
Attacking.Illaoi.baron01: "I slayed greater serpents as a child."
Attacking.Illaoi.baron02: "Here they call you a monster. In Buhru, we would call you dinner."

Movement.Illaoi.move01: "If I hate something, I destroy it. If I want something, I take it."
Movement.Illaoi.move02: "I am a teacher. Bilgewater will learn."
Movement.Illaoi.move03: "We are born knowing what to do. We must only act."
Movement.Illaoi.move05: "It is terrible to be satisfied. The world needs us to chase dreams."
Movement.Illaoi.move06: "This ends one of two ways - they run, or I break them."
Movement.Illaoi.move07: "I don't scare, I don't tire, and I don't stop."
Movement.Illaoi.move08: "Good? Evil? Why should we care for such things?"
Movement.Illaoi.move09: "Life is the sweetness of fruit, and the joy of battle!"
Movement.Illaoi.move10: "There is joy in food... and fighting."
Movement.Illaoi.move14: "Ah, everyone has a plan, until they get punched in the face."
Movement.Illaoi.move15: "Men live, men die. Change is good."
Movement.Illaoi.move16: "They will learn or they will die."
Movement.Illaoi.move17: "There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those."
Movement.Illaoi.move18: "The ocean is calm. It is our desires that stir it."
Movement.Illaoi.move19: "Even if I die, I die in motion."
Movement.Illaoi.move20: "The waves will drag you down, unless you fight to shore."
Movement.Illaoi.move21: "How could I love only one man? They break too easily."
Movement.Illaoi.move23: "Wisdom is frequently a kick in the head."
Movement.Illaoi.move26: "We are not one soul. We are many."
Movement.Illaoi.move27: "Many gods ask for worship. They are weak gods."
Movement.Illaoi.move28: "My god is not love - it is a kick in the pants."
Movement.Illaoi.move29: "Without change, something sleeps inside us, and seldom awakens."
Movement.Illaoi.move30: "Many die. Worthy souls find new forms."
Movement.Illaoi.move31: "Bearded Lady, Nagakabouros, names don't matter! Action does."
Movement.Illaoi.move32: "It is the storm that is life."

Taunt.Illaoi.taunt01: "Live your life, chase what you desire, what else matters?"
Taunt.Illaoi.taunt02: "A fool and his spirit are easily parted."
Taunt.Illaoi.taunt03: "Watch your mouth, or I'll slap the soul out of you."
Taunt.Illaoi.taunt04: "Fight me, if you have the spirit."
Taunt.Illaoi.taunt05: "I want you to hit me as hard as you can."
Taunt.Illaoi.taunt06: "Smile, child, or I'll shove your jaw into your brain."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntAscendant01: "You wanted to be a god! Instead, you are a useless antique!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntAscendant02: "Foul creature, you would stop time when all things must move!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntAscendant03: "You soul is a fetid, stagnant pool, untouched by the tide!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntAscendant04: "You are not free from death! You are dead."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntAscendant05: "You powers are stolen from the flow. You have damned your homeland."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntDemacia01: "What is truly noble and good would never ask you to serve another!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntDemacia02: "Duty, honor, nations? These are stagnant falsehoods!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntDemacia03: "You are slaves enchained by lies when we were born to chase our desires!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntDemacia04: "Laws, rules, these are falsehoods! Truth is chaos!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntFreljord01: "Your people pretend to be strong. I think they are afraid."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntFreljord02: "Your people seek a worthy death. Mine, a worthy life."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntShadowIsles01: "You are a cycle without purpose. I will end you!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntShadowIsles03: "You are a cloud of broken souls, you are an abomination."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntShadowIsles04: "You will trouble this land no more."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntShadowIsles06: "I am your enemy because you offend my god - because you cannot change."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntShadowIsles07: "You will challenge me? Ha ha ha ha... even death fears my god."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntYordle01: "Why would I need a spirit's help? I am guided by Nagakabouros."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntYordle02: "Little one, I don't need empathy. Seek those who do."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntYordle03: "Go back to where men are weak, and need your inspiration."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntAatrox01: "We know your true name. We do not fear you."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntAkali01: "Life is not balance. It is motion!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntBraum01: "Northman. There are motions I would like to show you."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntBraum02: "I know you are strong. I wonder if you have stamina."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntDarius02: "You move well. Now, you must only find joy in the motion."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntDiana01: "Your god was forgotten. Mine cannot be ignored."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntElise01: "False prophet! You don't even serve a true god!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntFiora01: "I do not challenge you, I bring you the test!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntGangplank01: "I broke men's hearts. I broke men's spines. You're the first who's going to get both."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntGangplank02: "You paid your tithe to the mother. Now show me what she taught you."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntGangplank03: "You have learned your lesson, now fight! Kill! Conquer!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntGangplank05: "I do not want excuses. The failure was yours."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntGangplank06: "Did she not show you the way forward? Go!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntGaren01: "Honor? Duty? Ha! What your heart demands is all that matters."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntGragas02: "You have followed our ways as if born to them."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntJanna01: "The tempest is Nagakabouros. You serve, but are blind."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntJax01: "I do not challenge you, I bring you the test!"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntKarma01: "Trust the motion. All spirits are Nagakabouros'."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntKatarina01: "No love is impossible, my god demands you follow your desires."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntLeona01: "You worship the sun - it is my god that drives it through the sky."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntLeona02: "Your faith asks for obedience - it is weak."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntMissFortune02: "It is you who have shown Gangplank his path. For that, I thank you."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntMissFortune03: "Gangplank was drowning. Your actions reminded him to swim."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntRekSai01: "You are in motion - but only as a parasite on a host."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntRekSai02: "Ugly thing. You weren't designed by god, you were made by fools."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntRekSai04: "You are a foul creation - born from ignorance."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntRekSai05: "What kind of stupid god made you?"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntTahmKench01: "You move only from hunger that consumes itself."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntTahmKench02: "Creature, why would I listen to lies when I can see the truth?"
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntTahmKench03: "Your fine words don't disguise your foul design."
Taunt.Illaoi.tauntTwistedFate01: "Aw, child, you are cute, but I doubt you will be for long."

Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.E10: "This is the motion. All is Nagakabouros."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.E11: "I do not walk alone. I am with my god. It is here."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.E12: "You cannot hide from god. You cannot hide from the test."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel01: "Live your journey - or die in mine."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel02: "Your spirit is held - take it if you can."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel04: "You speak of having a soul. It was never yours. None of them were."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel06: "Change, or you will be pulled down."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel08: "You are drowning - I want you to swim."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel11: "Each of your lives has served the vortex."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel13: "We learn from action. Move, or die."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel15: "This will be a good day - if you live."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel16: "Drive forward - it is destiny that calls you."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel20: "My god doesn't want you to kneel. It wants you to fight."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel21: "You have been given the tools to know your destiny."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel22: "The failure of your lives is written on your soul."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel24: "We are all free. Seeing the truth only reminds us."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel26: "All of us are lost, all of us are blind. You must swim towards your destiny."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel27: "Countless lifetimes lead our bodies foward, and drive our spirits towards their true destiny."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel28: "I don't want you to fail, I want you to learn."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel29: "Child, you must earn your soul. Prove yourself."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel30: "The battle is lost only when you surrender. Fight for your soul."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel31: "You are the tinest sliver of energy held briefly in shape. Where this energy flows is your destiny."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel32: "This moment is waiting to be seized."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel33: "Every day is waiting to be taken."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel34: "I don't want you to worship. I want you to learn."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel35: "I will break you if that's what it takes."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel36: "Give up, and your life is nothing."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vessel37: "Each lifetime is a spirit. Each lifetime is a chance. Take it."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselTentacle07: "Do not tire, do not slow, push onward."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselTentacle08: "Exactly. If you want your soul, take it."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselTentacle09: "Keep going, keep striving. This is our way."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselTentacle13: "Your souls wait for you. Take them back if you can."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselTentacle14: "This is the way of Nagakabouros - motion!"
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselTentacle16: "To challenge, to fight... this pleases Nagakabouros."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselFreedom02: "Pray I don't have to teach you again."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselFreedom05: "Learn well, or you will be tested again."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselFreedom07: "You have been tested. You have done well."
Upon Casting Test of Spirit.Illaoi.vesselFreedom09: "Did you blunder into victory, or did you learn?"

Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.item01: "It is not what we have, it is what we can throw away."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.item02: "Things should be held only when we need them."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.item03: "Only what moves, only what lives... has value."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.item04: "When I am done with this... it will make a fine offering."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.item05: "I like this. I should buy everyone one of these."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.itemBootsBasic01: "I am going to walk all over them."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.itemBootsAdvanced01: "My god is motion, but speed is useful."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.itemDeadMansPlate01.1: "All on Buhru take this test - I passed it long ago."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.itemRanduinsOmen01: "Who is Randuin? Was she a priestess?"
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.itemSteraksGage01: "Sterak? It is the fury of the mother I will bring."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.itemTitanicHydra01: "The Kraken. The Serpent. The Hydra. A god's appearance is limited only by those observing it."
Upon Buying an Item.Illaoi.itemWarmogs01: "It is my god that protects me - but these metal clothes are nice."

Upon Starting a Game.Ivern.start01: "Live each day as if it's your first."
Upon Starting a Game.Ivern.start03: "Feels good to stretch the old beanstalks."
Upon Starting a Game.Ivern.start04: "What a wonderful day. Gooseberries would love it."

Attacking.Ivern.attack10: "It's okay, Gromp is a slow learner too."
Attacking.Ivern.attack11: "So this is how the scorpion feels."
Attacking.Ivern.attack15: "Some buds need a little push to blossom."
Attacking.Ivern.attackBrush02: "Nothing in here but us, uh, stalks of grass!"

Movement.Ivern.move02: "Never trust a butterfly with a secret."
Movement.Ivern.move05: "Laugh like a hyena, and friends will gallop to your side."
Movement.Ivern.move06: "Sprint like a snail, and you will never twist your ankle."
Movement.Ivern.move08: "I find that the stranger life gets, the more it seems to make sense."
Movement.Ivern.move09: "Every river reaches the ocean in its own way."
Movement.Ivern.move12: "One day, I'll root in one place and be everywhere."
Movement.Ivern.move13: "Everything is connected in the strangest ways."
Movement.Ivern.move14: "I love how the grass is fluffy on my toes."
Movement.Ivern.move16: "I tread lightly so as not to hurt the dandelions."
Movement.Ivern.move18: "Sun and rain are the only magic I need."
Movement.Ivern.move20: "Animals have more to offer than warm pelts and meat."
Movement.Ivern.move21: "I follow only the sun! Eh, and sometimes a river. This one time, a scorpion."
Movement.Ivern.move22: "I wonder what adventure today has in store for all of us."
Movement.Ivern.moveJungle01: "Hm, now where did I leave my roots?"
Movement.Ivern.moveJungle02: "No-one who wanders is every truly lost."
Movement.Ivern.moveJungle03: "I am never lost in the wilderness... hehe, only in conversations."
Movement.Ivern.moveJungle04: "I want to put my toes in the river."
Movement.Ivern.moveJungle08: "I wonder what the ducks are plotting today."
Movement.Ivern.moveJungle09: "The cleverness of mushrooms always surprises me!"
Movement.Ivern.moveEpicMonster01: "Why aren't dragons and void beasts friendlier?"
Movement.Ivern.moveEpicMonster02: "Dragons and void beasts are beyond my aid."
Movement.Ivern.moveEpicMonster03: "I get the feeling dragons don't like me too much. Oh well."
Movement.Ivern.moveEpicMonster04: "That creature is not of this world."
Movement.Ivern.moveRedBrambleback01: "Brambleback, thanks for helping the beavers move their lodge."
Movement.Ivern.moveRedBrambleback03: "Brambleback, remember the Kumungu affair? I still think it was your fault."
Movement.Ivern.moveBlueSentinel02: "I'm telling you, Blue, you and Daisy would make a cute couple."
Movement.Ivern.moveRiftScuttler02: "Found any good crawdads lately, Scuttles? Let me know if you do."
Movement.Ivern.moveRiftScuttler03: "I know I still owe you some razor clams, Scuttles. You know I'm good for it."
Movement.Ivern.moveGromp01: "Lord Grompulous Kevin Ribbitton of Croaksworth. I am at your service, my liege."
Movement.Ivern.moveKrugs02: "I loved your last story, Krugs! Really need to punch up act three, though."
Movement.Ivern.moveKrugs03: "Few understand the true spirit of the noble Krugs."
Movement.Ivern.moveRaptors01: "When's the last time you had your beaks sharpened?"
Movement.Ivern.moveRaptors02: "Have you hear the Crimson Raptor's singing? She's come a long way."
Movement.Ivern.moveWolves01: "No, Wolves, we're not playing fetch now."
Movement.Ivern.moveWolves02: "Wolves hate being alone, even the lone ones."
Movement.Ivern.moveWolves03: "I told you to get that second head looked at, Wolfy."
Movement.Ivern.moveWolves04: "Everyone needs to run with a wolf pack every now and then."

Taunting.Ivern.tauntAlly02: "I'm a treehugger! You should know that about me."
Taunting.Ivern.taunt01: "Let reverence for life take root in your heart."
Taunting.Ivern.taunt02: "May the sun warm you all of your days."
Taunting.Ivern.taunt03: "All life is precious, yes... even yours."
Taunting.Ivern.taunt04: "Be grateful for the breeze and the grass beneath your feet."
Taunting.Ivern.tauntJhin01: "Life is so much more beautiful than death."
Taunting.Ivern.tauntLulu01: "Finally, someone who understands nature like I do."
Taunting.Ivern.tauntMalphite01: "Mountain man, it's me! The tree guy!"
Taunting.Ivern.tauntMaokai01: "Are you going to Treemoot this year? I'm going to dress up as a sassafras!"
Taunting.Ivern.interactionTauntEnemy02: "Oh, you got me on that one!"

Joke.Ivern.joke02: "Be grateful for this moment. And this one. Oh, and this one. Oh, and this one's good too!"
Joke.Ivern.joke03: "Have an Ivern-crisp apple. Don't ask how I make them."

Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIsummon02: "To take, one must first learn to give."
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIsummon03: "Nature gives so much more than it asks for in return."
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIsummon06: "Say hi to your spawn for me!"
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIsummonBlueSentinel04: "You look just like my friend Daisy."
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIdispelBlueSentinel02: "They want to take your essence! Hide!"
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIdispelRedBrambleback02: "Red! It's the Kumungu affair all over again!"
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIdispelRedBrambleback04: "Run, they seek to steal your fire!"
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIcollect05: "Sharing is caring, says the dung beetle."
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIsummonRiftScuttler04: "Scuttles, you're a gentlecrab and a scholar."
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIdispelRiftScuttler03: "Scuttle, keep an eye on that suspicious extradimensional monstrosity, would you?"
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIsummonKrugs04: "Krugs, bring it in for a cuddle."
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIdispelKrugs02: "Hide, Krugs, run back to your wife!"
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIdispelRaptors01: "Where did you Raptors get all this gold?"
Upon Placing a Grove.Ivern.spellIdispelWolves02: "Hunters on the prowl, run and hide!"

Using Triggerseed.Ivern.spellEself01: "I've got two thumbs and a shield!"

Using Daisy!.Ivern.spellR12: "Watch out, Daisy's really protective of me."
Using Daisy!.Ivern.spellR14: "I think Daisy has a crush on you."
Using Daisy!.Ivern.spellR21: "Careful, Daisy doesn't know her own strength!"

Scoring Kills and Objectives.Ivern.kill01: "Once in a blue leaf, the earthworm will best the robin."

Upon Buying an Item.Ivern.item01: "Take all the gold, I really don't need it."
Upon Buying an Item.Ivern.item02: "Hey, it's a thingy people use. Thank you."
Upon Buying an Item.Ivern.item03: "This looks like it's going to grow on me."
Upon Buying an Item.Ivern.itemBoots01: "Oh, I love boots. Where do they go again?"
Upon Buying an Item.Ivern.itemBoots03: "These are so much better than the mudloafers I've been using."

Other Gameplay.Ivern.ward03: "Keep an eye out for new friends."
Other Gameplay.Ivern.ward04: "Let me know if anyone tramples you."
Other Gameplay.Ivern.ward07: "A worm's eye view often turns into a bird's eye view."

Upon Death.Ivern.respawn01: "Oh, that old body was getting creaky."
Upon Death.Ivern.respawn02: "Dying isn't so bad - now that the dying part's over."
Upon Death.Ivern.respawn03: "The end of life is filled with life."
Upon Death.Ivern.respawn04: "Hm. This new body's a little stiff! Must be an oak!"

Upon Starting a Game on....Kalista.start01: "Turncoats, oath breakers and betrayers... we hate them all."
Upon Starting a Game on....Kalista.start02: "The blood of kith and kin stains their hands."
Upon Starting a Game on....Kalista.start03: "There can be no justice. Only revenge."

Movement.Kalista.move16: "Nothing shall turn us from our path."

Joke.Kalista.joke01: "There will be no escape - I said no escape!"
Joke.Kalista.joke02: "We act as one - two - three - cease this!"

Taunt.Kalista.taunt05: "Let's see how many spears you can endure!"
Taunt.Kalista.taunt06: "Soft are the targets of our spears today!"
Taunt.Kalista.tauntCassiopeia02: "You too shall have a blade in your back, snake."
Taunt.Kalista.tauntGraves02: "Graves, you have only to speak our name."
Taunt.Kalista.tauntKarthus01: "You toy with powers you do not comprehend, Deathsinger."
Taunt.Kalista.tauntKarthus02: "Death is not solely your purview, Karthus."
Taunt.Kalista.tauntKarthus03: "Only a fool would embrace death, Karthus."
Taunt.Kalista.tauntLissandra01: "We see the course of your deception, Ice Witch."
Taunt.Kalista.tauntVarus01: "There is no loss greater than betrayal, Varus."
Taunt.Kalista.tauntVarus03: "You have pledged yourself to a false agent, Varus."

Upon Buying....Kalista.itemInfinityEdge01: "Its edge is keen as the spear's tip."
Upon Buying....Kalista.itemInfinityEdge02: "So shall others feel the bite of steel."
Upon Buying....Kalista.itemLastWhisper02: "Nothing can protect them from our retribution."
Upon Buying....Kalista.itemBloodthirster02: "As they weaken, so shall we grow stronger."
Upon Buying....Kalista.itemBanshees03: "We will not be at the mercy of those who hide behind magic."
Upon Buying....Kalista.itemBotRK01: "Once, he was a noble king, until grief overcame his reason."
Upon Buying....Kalista.itemBotRK02: "In the end, it was not his blade that stole our lives."
Upon Buying....Kalista.itemBotRK03: "As once it symbolized hope, so now shall it incite despair!"

Upon Using The Black Spear.Kalista.link05: "Do not forsake us, as he did."
Upon Using The Black Spear.Kalista.linkDeath03: "We shall bring your killers to their knees."

Unknown.Kalista.unknown08: "Your pain is no more than a trifle to us."

Dance.Bard.joke01.1: Bard lets a  Meep onto his shoulder and lets it run to and fro across his arms.

Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start01: "My fellow travelers, you are all about to witness my majestic epicness! ... unless I get killed, but... probably not!"
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start02: "Okay, everybody, I'm here, I'm here... the party starts now!"
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start03: "Magic is in the heart. Magic is in the rhythm."
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start04: "You see this cape? Ha! I say goddamn I'm sexy!"
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start05: "I can't wait to get in there. I don't know what I'm going to do, but I am going to get in there!"
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start06: "Xayah? Xayah? Crap. What was I supposed to do?"
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start09: "Consequences only matter if I don't get away."
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.start10: "We are seen dancing and thought insane - by those who can't hear the music."
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.startXayah01: "Alright, let's go! This way or that way?"
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.startXayah01.3: "I know what'll make you feel better... "
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.startXayah06.1: "Well, I mean... I don't have to remember the plan if you do."
Upon Starting a Game.Rakan.startXayah07: "When are we going to do this?"

Attacking.Rakan.attack08: "It ain't a party without a fight!"
Attacking.Rakan.attack13: "I got one more thing for you!"
Attacking.Rakan.attack23: "You will see the dance of death."
Attacking.Rakan.attack32: "Hey! I got a joke for you!"
Attacking.Rakan.attack36: "Oh! I need to get in there!"
Attacking.Rakan.attack37: "Hey, what did the five fingers say to the face?"
Attacking.Rakan.attack53: "I like parties with a little violence!"
Attacking.Rakan.attack56: "I have killed for her! I will kill for her again."
Attacking.Rakan.attack62: "Count it down! One, two, they dead!"
Attacking.Rakan.attack63: "I'm here! We can get it started!"
Attacking.Rakan.attackMelee09: "You going to take that from me?"
Attacking.Rakan.attackMelee16.1: "I can't hear you over all the fun I'm having!"
Attacking.Rakan.attackXayah05: "Should we give them a fighting chance?"
Attacking.Rakan.attackXayah13: "You love it when I slap fools?"
Attacking.Rakan.attackXayah15: "What do you want to do later?"
Attacking.Rakan.attackXayah20: "Do we need any of these fools?"

Movement.Rakan.move01: "Our magic is a fury. It is a song you cannot resist."
Movement.Rakan.move02: "Should I be... running? Yeah, I should... probably be running."
Movement.Rakan.move03: "I look around these forests and I see freedom. I hear the music."
Movement.Rakan.move04: "Crap. I totally forgot why I'm here."
Movement.Rakan.move05: "I am only as wild as magic."
Movement.Rakan.move06: "Magic is supposed to be scary. Love is supposed to hurt. Ecstasy needs a little fear."
Movement.Rakan.move07: "If you aren't a little frightened, you ain't alive."
Movement.Rakan.move10: "Humans made promises. More than I can remember. They kept none."
Movement.Rakan.move11: "Humans talk about their treaties. We talk about their lies."
Movement.Rakan.move12: "Long ago, our kind danced upon the mountains like flames. Now only the embers remain."
Movement.Rakan.move14: "The only way to understand magic is to plunge into it, move with it, dance and dance!"
Movement.Rakan.move16: "Gotta get myself hyped, okay... one, two... one, two... woo! Alright!"
Movement.Rakan.move17: "The humans call it battle. It's just a dance."
Movement.Rakan.move18: "I feel like my allies aren't recognising how amazing my cloak is! I mean, seriously! Rude!"
Movement.Rakan.move19: "They will see my dance, then they will know magic's joy... and its fury."
Movement.Rakan.move20: "Okay, Rakan, get 'em watching you, then you burn 'em up."
Movement.Rakan.move21: "I look good, I feel good, let's kick some ass!"
Movement.Rakan.move22: "I got my look right, I got my moves right... time to show it!"
Movement.Rakan.move25: "I'm going to take all they got, then laugh as I throw it away."
Movement.Rakan.move26: "I've been kicked around since I was born. It's alright! It's okay! I'm staying alive!"
Movement.Rakan.move27: "They will see me. They will see my dance!"
Movement.Rakan.move28: "I will walk in. I will dance. They will party."
Movement.Rakan.move30: "Ha! I'm G to the D! Golden diamonds, boy! Woo!"
Movement.Rakan.move31: "I'm just trying to live the moment."
Movement.Rakan.move32: "I don't need anything - but the right now."
Movement.Rakan.move34: "Man, have you seen that forest over there?"
Movement.Rakan.move35: "I got freedom, I got a lady, I got a cause I'd die for. That's who I am."
Movement.Rakan.move38: "I don't need to understand the plan! I trust my love."
Movement.Rakan.move39: "It's all filthy and dangerous - and that's why I love it!"
Movement.Rakan.move42: "Why is it taking so long to get back to the action?"
Movement.Rakan.move43: "It's a revolution. And it's good times."
Movement.Rakan.move44: "I'm offended by how little attention I was given."
Movement.Rakan.move45: "Humans think that to believe in something, you have to be serious about it. That's their problem."
Movement.Rakan.move46: "They ain't ready for what I'm bringing!"
Movement.Rakan.move47: "Ain't nothing I say should be taken seriously! That's why it's the truth!"
Movement.Rakan.move49: "This looks like another dangerous situation. Thankfully, I can improvise."
Movement.Rakan.move50: "They're gonna' try and test me? Haha!"
Movement.Rakan.move51: "Danger is as fun as you let it be."
Movement.Rakan.move52: "I am definitely more confident in dangerous situations."
Movement.Rakan.move53: "I have got to stop talking to myself. Damnit, Xayah, where are you?"
Movement.Rakan.move54: "You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it."
Movement.Rakan.move55: "I can't wait to see what I'm going to do."
Movement.Rakan.move56: "There's wildness in the bees and the flowers. It's just a fury humans don't see."
Movement.Rakan.move57: "I am Vastaya. I am born of magic. This is my destiny."
Movement.Rakan.move58: "Is my cloak right? Yes it is! I was worried there for a second."
Movement.Rakan.move60: "They're scared of darkness, they're scared of magic. They are scared of where I'm from."
Movement.Rakan.move62: "It's magic that's wild. I'm just here for the party."
Movement.Rakan.move63: "For humans, magic is like fire. For us, it is water and air."
Movement.Rakan.move64: "Ladies and gentleman, I am here to entertain! Myself, mostly - but you too!"
Movement.Rakan.move65: "Humans claim it is theirs. They fence us away and cover it in refuse."
Movement.Rakan.move66: "It don't take a lot of words to tell the truth."
Movement.Rakan.move67: "Our people are bleeding. My lady's gonna' heal them."
Movement.Rakan.move68: "I don't want a world that's safe."
Movement.Rakan.move69: "I don't want a war - but I want to be free."
Movement.Rakan.move70: "What human's call magic, we call life."
Movement.Rakan.move71: "I'm here! I'm gone, I am so gone."
Movement.Rakan.move75: "If Xayah says someone has to die, they die - and they deserved it."
Movement.Rakan.move76: "Woo! I am so into this! What is this?"
Movement.Rakan.move77: "If it don't get out of control, it ain't a party."
Movement.Rakan.move78: "I think they underestimate my charm. How is that even possible?"
Movement.Rakan.move79: "I'm so fine, I gotta kiss myself!"
Movement.Rakan.move83: "They want us in cages. We refuse."
Movement.Rakan.move84: "I need my love to hurt. I need the world to be scary. I don't apologise for it! I feel good!"
Movement.Rakan.move85: "I'm gonna' burn this place down, then help them build it back up - so I can burn it again!"
Movement.Rakan.move87: "Xayah? Hey! Damn, where is she? I hate it when she leaves."
Movement.Rakan.move88: "Without wild magic, we have no children, we have no future."
Movement.Rakan.move89: "When I get sad, I stop being sad and be awesome instead. True story."
Movement.Rakan.move90: "I do not wish to kill the mortals. I want them to hear the music."
Movement.Rakan.move91: "The humans will never understand our kind until they hear the song."
Movement.Rakan.move92: "I will make them dance. I will make them hear."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby04.1: "No, I... yeah. Hey, have you seen this cape?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby06.3: "I wasn't. I never think. Ugh... thinking."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby08: "How can humans not hear the magic?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby12: "Do you love me because I'm beautiful, or because I'm sexy?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby17.1: "I'm... trying something new. Do you like it?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby17.4: "... nah. Freedom fighting is a good look for me."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby20: "What are those things humans wear on their feet?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby20.1: "I need shoes. Red ones. I need them so bad."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby21: "Did I tell you I love you?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby24: "Xayah? I think we got a problem... "
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby26: "What would you do if I died?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby35.1: "Yes. I was... definitely talking about you, honey."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahNearby35.2: "If anybody's gonna' die first, it's gonna' be me. I can't see you die. Also, black is a terrible color on me."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant03: "You can't tell me you weren't impressed!"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant05: "After this, how about we get some human food?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant07.1: "I'm not going to tell you. That's the really cunning bit!"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant12: "Did you see the clothes those guys were wearing?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant16: "Who is that gorgeous thing over there?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant17: "Hey, I'm not gonna kill you, she is! Say hi, honey."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant21: "How will we know if the plan works?"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant21.1: "I am not a piece of meat."
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant23.1: "We have a secret call? I just like that sound! Caw caw!"
Movement.Rakan.moveXayahDistant26: "If I vanished, what would you do?"

Joke.Rakan.joke01: "Do you want to smell it? Not for you!"
Joke.Rakan.joke02: "You want to smell it? No flower for you!"

Taunt.Rakan.taunt01: "You know, I ain't really about making fun of people, but you... make that difficult."
Taunt.Rakan.taunt02: "I got three rules. You're breaking two of them with that outfit."
Taunt.Rakan.taunt08: "So, when you got dressed this morning, was this the look you were going for?"
Taunt.Rakan.taunt09: "There's this thing called grooming. You should try it."
Taunt.Rakan.taunt10: "Hey, I'm right here. So, can you be less uptight and lame now?"
Taunt.Rakan.tauntXayah01: "I ain't gonna' kill you. She is!"
Taunt.Rakan.tauntRengar01: "So, just tiger stuff? Buddy, you've got to mix it up."
Taunt.Rakan.tauntRengar02: "I know you're Vastaya, but your tribe... lacks style!"
Taunt.Rakan.tauntRengar03: "So, you just... run around in the jungle, huh? I mean, I'm not judging, if that's what you're into. Nerd."

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.kill01: "Come on, fool thought he could match my style?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.kill02: "Got a feeling I shouldn't have done that."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.kill03: "I'm not about killing - but I'll put in the work."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.kill07: "Step up again, I'll slap you down again."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killXayah01: "I find this parallel universe stuff very upsetting."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killXayah02: "Well. I always was the pretty one."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killXayah04: "I bet she's going to be angry about that later."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIonian01: "Your kind started this war. We will end it."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIonian02: "You put us in a cage? I put you in the ground."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIonian03: "We don't want your harmony! We want our freedom!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIonian04: "I showed you the dance. You should've moved."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIonian05: "I don't want to like killing, but this time, I did."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killZed02: "You came to visit us! Did you think we would forget?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killZed04: "You were a shadow without a flame."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killZed05: "Messed with my girl. What did you think I was going to do?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killJhin01: "He had some style - for a human."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killSwain02: "Kind of feel bad for the guy. His feathers were weak."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killSwain04: "Power was not meant to be contained. Now, it is free."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killSwain05: "You were given Vastayan blood, yet chose to be blind."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killUdyr01: "It is from our blood your gifts came, and my hand that took it back."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIllaoi01: "What was with that girl's dumb purse?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIllaoi02: "Girl thought she could pull out my soul - but I got too much soul!"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killIllaoi03: "Big girl had too much going on."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killRekSai02: "Was that a land shark? I mean, why? Why is that a thing?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Rakan.killRekSai03: "Perfect predator? I got an instinct about how stupid that thing was."

Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward01: "I need to see if people can see how awesome I am!"
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward02: "When you open your eyes, you see everything is limitless."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward03: "I need to know when the action's coming."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward04: "Well I don't want to miss the start of the party."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward06: "The world's a big place. Don't want to miss any of it."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward07: "I'm pretty sure I'm supposed to scout around. Pretty, pretty sure."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward08: "I'll just put that there. That's a good place. I hope. Yeah... "
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward10: "Yep, if I'm going to see the human world I need to start."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward11: "I'm going to show people some of the strange."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward13: "I am not blind to any possibility."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward14: "I know people are watching. How could they not be?"
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward15: "If you look at things the right way, it's awesome."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward16: "The world isn't about collecting stuff, it's about seeing stuff."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward19: "Mankind is blind. I want them to see."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward20: "Vision is the first step towards understanding."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward21: "Aw, crap, I hate having to have a plan."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward23: "I think Xayah told me to improvise. At least, that's the only part of the plan I remember."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward24: "Let's see what these animals can do."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward26: "Our kind will see the truth soon enough."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward27: "I want to feel everything. That's the only way to live."
Upon Placing a Ward.Rakan.ward31: "I should totally get paid for this."

Champion Select.Xayah_Select: "I can never resist an invitation to dance."
Champion Select.Xayah_Ban: "Fine, I'll just be over here... sharpening my feathers."

Upon Starting a Game.Xayah.start01: "If love is feeling so deeply for another that you want to chew your way under their skin, then I love Rakan... "
Upon Starting a Game.Xayah.start02: "The Vastayan named the world. We named the trees, the wind, the mountains. We know their power."
Upon Starting a Game.Xayah.start03: "The world owes the Vastaya a great debt. I'm here to collect."
Upon Starting a Game.Xayah.start04: "I'm just an ordinary girl. An ordinary girl with an infinite supply of death quills."
Upon Starting a Game.Xayah.start05: "They'll probably label me a war criminal one day, but not today."
Upon Starting a Game.Xayah.start06: "We pledged ourselves to each other in the middle of a tavern brawl. The whole place reeked of vomit, sweat and blood. It was so romantic!"
Upon Starting a Game.Xayah.start07: "Ah, silence, so golden. Like Rakan. Kind of miss him. Even if he is... noisy."

Attacking.Xayah.attack01: "Dance like your life depends on it."
Attacking.Xayah.attack03: "Move your feet, or lose some toes."
Attacking.Xayah.attack06: "This is how I deal with unwanted attention."
Attacking.Xayah.attack09: "A dance with me ends in blood."
Attacking.Xayah.attack14: "A thousand cuts is only the beginning."
Attacking.Xayah.attack16: "Violence is my favorite form of negotiation."
Attacking.Xayah.attack27: "A Vastayan feather is a kingly gift."
Attacking.Xayah.attackRakan04.2: "Only if we want to have fun."
Attacking.Xayah.attackRakan07: "This reminds me of our first dates!"

Movement.Xayah.move01: "Sabotage takes patience and time - and lots of feather daggers."
Movement.Xayah.move02: "I'll do whatever needs to be done - twice, just to be sure."
Movement.Xayah.move04: "Oh, I was born to ruffle feathers."
Movement.Xayah.move05: "Our Vastayan essence fades with each passing day."
Movement.Xayah.move06: "I will rest when our homelands are restored."
Movement.Xayah.move07: "All women desire Rakan. Like they'd know what to do with him."
Movement.Xayah.move08: "They say I don't know when to quit. Like that's a weakness."
Movement.Xayah.move09: "We Vastaya are only half of our full glory."
Movement.Xayah.move10: "Rebellion puts the fire in my blood."
Movement.Xayah.move12: "Talking to anybody about anything is never on my to-do list."
Movement.Xayah.move13: "If our existence is everyone else's chaos, so be it."
Movement.Xayah.move14: "Talking to people makes me want to stab them... so I do."
Movement.Xayah.move15: "Victors are the sole authors of history. Time to write our chapter."
Movement.Xayah.move16: "Tavern brawls just seem to find me."
Movement.Xayah.move17: "Chaos is the preferred state of nature."
Movement.Xayah.move19: "Nature bends towards chaos. Give in, or break."
Movement.Xayah.move20: "I really hate anyone who's not me - or Rakan."
Movement.Xayah.move21: "Nature is wild and untamed, not balanced."
Movement.Xayah.move24: "If Rakan were here, I'd make out with him until his ears bled. He loves it when I do that."
Movement.Xayah.move26: "Magic is not some river that can be easily channeled. It is a churning sea that goes where it pleases."
Movement.Xayah.move27: "I hate flowers. Tiny skulls stuffed with twigs, on the other hand... "
Movement.Xayah.move28: "Sometimes people die for a good cause - namely, mine. That's why I'm an optimist."
Movement.Xayah.move30: "I prefer to work at night, because, y'know, the sun? Bright? Yuck!"
Movement.Xayah.move31: "Pandemonium follows me everywhere I go. It's like a puppy I once fed... "
Movement.Xayah.move32: "Ionia used to be so nice - before humans tamed all that wild cataclysmic magic."
Movement.Xayah.move33: "Once, magic was everywhere, or as the Vastaya say: (chants)"
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby10: "Okay, last time, it was totally my fault."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby10.6: "What we have is greater than some human word."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby18: "If you need me, whistle. You know how to whistle, don't you?"
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby19: "If you don't want to do this... "
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby19.4: "'cause then... I wouldn't get to hear you ask."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby25.2: "I would... burn this world to the ground and build a castle from the ashes, where I would live alone forever."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby32: "I swear, you will be the death of me."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby34: "If we get separated, I'll find you."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanNearby36: "I need you to be more careful."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanDistant11.3: "I saw you. Everyone can see you."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanDistant11.9: "Until we are free. Until magic is free."
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanDistant22.1: "You used the secret call! Is everything alright?"
Movement.Xayah.moveRakanDistant24: "Hey, I need you here! Uh, never mind, just... go that way!"

Joke.Xayah.interactionJokeEnemy01: "I'm not laughing. I needed to say that just so you understand."
Joke.Xayah.interactionJokeEnemy02: "Next time, try using more hard 'k' sounds."
Joke.Xayah.interactionJokeEnemy04: "Hahaha... I don't know what that is."

Taunt.Xayah.taunt02: "Please, for the sake of us both, go far away."
Taunt.Xayah.taunt03: "I'm going to murder you a thousand times."
Taunt.Xayah.taunt04: "Am I supposed to be intimidated right now? I'm not sure what's going on."
Taunt.Xayah.taunt05: "Please, don't make me tryhard. I'm not in the mood."
Taunt.Xayah.taunt06: "Can I just hate you to death?"
Taunt.Xayah.taunt07: "I can't even--- I don't know where to begin."
Taunt.Xayah.taunt08: "The next one to call me 'edgy' is getting choked to death."
Taunt.Xayah.taunt09: "I will punch your soul in the face."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntSupport01: "Get out there and take a bullet for me - like a gentleman."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntSupport02: "You're not bad for someone who isn't Rakan."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntSupport03: "If we do this right, only one of us get shot."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntSupport05: "Make me look good, and I'll make you look good, got it?"
Taunt.Xayah.tauntSupport06: "How am I supposed to work with - whatever this is?"
Taunt.Xayah.tauntMage02: "Mages are lucky if they can cast a minor hex."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntYordle01: "Yordles. Why did it have to be Yordles?"
Taunt.Xayah.tauntYordle02: "Yordles are the reason no-one takes us Vastaya seriously."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntAhri01: "You want to be mortal? You are mu'takl."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntRengar01: "I don't want to spill Vastayan blood, Rengar."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntWukong01: "We were not made to fight each other."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntAmumu01: "Aw, poor sad little mummy! I just want to take you home."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntAurelionSol01: "I don't want to hurt you, space dragon. We could be such good friends."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntBard01: "I can't wait to burst your bubble."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntCaitlyn01: "Who does your wardrobe? Fire them. Immediately."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntCamille01: "Wait, magic powered sword legs? Is this a joke?"
Taunt.Xayah.tauntEkko01: "Is this another timeline where I beat you up again?"
Taunt.Xayah.tauntGaren01: "When I'm done with Ionia, I'll come for Demacia."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntIllaoi01: "Where can I get one of those delightful katanic god-clutch purses? Does it come in purple? The god, not the bag."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntKled01: "I want to travel the world with you."
Taunt.Xayah.tauntTahmKench01: "Your talking is not improving this wonderful silence."
Taunt.Xayah.interactionTauntEnemy02: "Ouch. I'm going to need some aloe."
Taunt.Xayah.interactionTauntEnemy03: "I wasn't listening to what you said, but I sure am outraged."
Taunt.Xayah.interactionTauntEnemyRakan01: "I think we're supposed to laugh, now?"

Dance.Xayah.dance04: "Alright, put your back in to it!"

Upon Buying an Item.Xayah.item01: "This is overpriced - but I must have it."
Upon Buying an Item.Xayah.item02: "I want to buy all the things!"
Upon Buying an Item.Xayah.item05: "I know I'm being price gouged, but I'll splurge."
Upon Buying an Item.Xayah.item06: "Where did you get all these wonderful things?"
Upon Buying an Item.Xayah.item08: "Hook me up with that magical creature discount?"
Upon Buying an Item.Xayah.item09: "Do I really need this? Ah... yes."
Upon Buying an Item.Xayah.item10: "But how much does it cost for me?"

Upon Killing a Minion.Xayah.killMinion03: "Nothing is ever easy, but that was really easy."
Upon Killing a Minion.Xayah.killMinion04: "That was too easy - but so much fun."
Upon Killing a Minion.Xayah.killMinion05: "Don't feel bad, they're just magically animated sheets of cloth."
Upon Killing a Minion.Xayah.killMinion06: "They mindlessly marched right to their deaths - like everyone in Noxus."

Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.kill02: "As far as obstacles go, that was about a... three out of ten?"
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.kill13: "Hm, dodging seems to be a weak spot of yours."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.kill14: "I warned you. Oh, wait, did I? Crap. My fault."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.kill15.4: "Couldn't have done it without you, mieli."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.kill15.5: "Well. I'll have to do it more often, then."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.kill15.6: "Probably, but there are two of us."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killRakan10.1: "I was trying to have a moment, Rakan."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killNami03: "The Vastaya will sing songs of you. I promise."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killNami05: "Shame. You could have been so useful alive."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killNami06: "Every drop of Vastayan blood spilled is a waste."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killLux01: "Wasn't she just a ray of sunshine? I hate sunshine."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killTaliyah01: "And that's where plucky optimism gets you."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killPentakill02: "It's more of a slaughter than a massacre, really."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killPentakill03: "I wish they could have seen the looks on their faces."
Upon Killing an Enemy Champion.Xayah.killPentakill05: "I wasn't joking when I said nothing stands in my way."

Upon Idling Near an Allied Rakan.Xayah.idleRakan04.1: "Oh, here we go again. Mhm. Mister Scatman, uh huh. ... oh, he's got me going now... "

Upon Destroying a Turret.Xayah.tower05: "I could dance right now. Aw, but there's more work to be done."
Upon Destroying a Turret.Xayah.tower06: "Can you feel the magic flowing? I can."
Upon Destroying a Turret.Xayah.tower08: "I've been known to implode a sacred obelisk or two."
Upon Destroying a Turret.Xayah.tower09: "I will unblock the rivers of Vastayan essence."
Upon Destroying a Turret.Xayah.tower10: "Each totem that falls strengthens the Vastayan cause."
Upon Destroying a Turret.Xayah.tower13: "They should really get a refund from those masons."

Upon Placing a Ward.Xayah.ward02: "Sometimes, I have to watch my own back."
Upon Placing a Ward.Xayah.ward07: "I never walk into a trap unprepared."
Upon Placing a Ward.Xayah.ward08: "I hate surprises - unless I'm doing the surprising."
Upon Placing a Ward.Xayah.wardDestroy01: "And they won't be needing that any more."
Upon Placing a Ward.Xayah.wardDestroy04: "Good thing I didn't do anything embarrassing."
Upon Placing a Ward.Xayah.wardDestroy05: "There's more than one way to blind an enemy."
Upon Placing a Ward.Xayah.wardDestroy06: "Well, that's just an invasion of privacy."

Upon Casting Recall.Xayah.recall01: "I'm going now. Where? Anywhere not here. That's where."

Upon Death.Xayah.respawn01: "Death was a nice vacation from the tedium - but nothing good can last, I suppose."
Upon Death.Xayah.respawn02: "Death was nice and peaceful. Thanks for ruining it."
Upon Death.Xayah.respawn03: "I always wanted to be buried and resurrected in this outfit."
Upon Death.Xayah.respawn04: "Oh, I wasn't finished with these fools yet."
Upon Death.Xayah.respawn05: "Oh, I wasn't finished with these fools yet."

Upon starting a Game.Ornn_153: "A day away from my forge is a day wasted."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_161: "All I need is myself, and... hammer."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_100: "The best meal is a herd of cattle, with dark beer, and cherries... Mmm..."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_101: "I'm going this way. Do not follow me. Please."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_102: "I made this hammer. It was so good I named it... Hammer."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_103: "I will go over there, it looks quiet, it will be nice."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_105: "I have fur. It is soft. Do not hug me."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_106: "The Freljord is a place for building, fighting, and eating. Home, sweet home."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_107: "If all goes well, our paths will never cross again. It never goes well."
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_267: "Singed fur... Jealous blood... My brother is near!"
Upon starting a Game.Ornn_269: "I cannot choose my brother, only the weapons to slay my brother."

Targeting an Enemy Champion.Ornn_021: "I will hit you until minerals fall out!"

Attacking.Ornn_039.1: "You're a weakling try a bit harder!"
Attacking.Ornn_040: "I don't like the look of that thing."
Attacking.Ornn_041: "We never talk, might as well fight!"
Attacking.Ornn_043: "Give me the ale and no one gets hurt."

Movement.Ornn_047.1: "Sorry if I burn you and you need ice."
Movement.Ornn_158: "It is childish to favor one tool over another, but hammer is my favorite."
Movement.Ornn_144: "Humans have done some things right: beer, dark beer."
Movement.Ornn_145: "Once a human kneels, they rarely stand again."
Movement.Ornn_147: "I do not need company, only wall, to keep out company."
Movement.Ornn_148: "Once I made a harpoon out of a mountain and a world tree. That was a weird century."
Movement.Ornn_149: "Bah, look at all these lazy trees."
Movement.Ornn_151: "The other gods don't understand me. Hmph, good."
Movement.Ornn_152: "The last time I ate a plant was never."
Movement.Ornn_154: "My work speaks in the roar of flame and the ringing of steel."
Movement.Ornn_155: "I will make an axe that is also a sword. And possibly a spoon."
Movement.Ornn_156: "Everything is better when it is molten. Lead, iron, chocolate cake."
Movement.Ornn_160: "I enjoy being alone, fewer unintended casualties."
Movement.Ornn_162: "The Freljord forges men out of... whatever children are. Dirt, goblins."
Movement.Ornn_163: "Ornn builds things, go see Ornn. Nobody ever says thank you."
Movement.Ornn_165: "Gods do not need followers. Followers need gods."
Movement.Ornn_184: "The architecture here is not wholly terrible."
Movement.Ornn_186: "I did not want to cool off, but this feels nice."
Movement.Ornn_187: "Volibear made the first river. You do not want to know how."

Taunt.Ornn_225: "You remind me of a young me, who is less impressive."
Taunt.Ornn_226: "Huh, you are not entirely an arse."
Taunt.Ornn_227: "Working with you is almost like working alone. Almost."
Taunt.Ornn_228: "Something you should know about me...(Long grumble)."
Taunt.Ornn_230: "This is a waste of my time."
Taunt.Ornn_232: "*Sigh* I do not care at all."

Joke.Ornn_116: "Buy a joke book. And a clown."
Joke.Ornn_119: "I now like you less, I did not think that was possible."

Using Living Forge.Ornn_001: "Do not hang that on a wall."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_002: "I trust you know how to use that."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_004: "If you want a weapon, here's a weapon. If you want conversation, here's a weapon."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_008: "This does not mean we are friends."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_009: "A good axe will fell a tree, a great axe will fell an army."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_010: "The weapons I forge do not have names, they have ambitions."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_012: "You may be worthy of that. Do not prove me wrong."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_014: "That is for wielding, not for entertaining."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_015: "I was looking at that one too."
Using Living Forge.Ornn_016: "I didn't make that, you didn't buy it."

Using Searing Charge.Ornn_070: "A strong sneeze would've had the same effect."

Scoring Kills and Objectives.Ornn_190: "That was more fun than I expected."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Ornn_255: "Too much sorcery, not enough elbow grease."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Ornn_258: "Honestly though, I was just leaning on it."
Scoring Kills and Objectives.Ornn_259: "It's always the magic parts that break."

Other Gameplay.Ornn_076: "Whatever this drink is made of, it is working."
Other Gameplay.Ornn_266: "(Grunts) I do not know how to feel about this thing, but okay."
Other Gameplay.Ornn_136: "Was like that when I found it"
Other Gameplay.Ornn_137: "(Grumbles) We're ready Ornn... we'll be right behind you..."
Other Gameplay.Ornn_138: "Just leave everything to me as usual."
Other Gameplay.Ornn_140: "I'm used to this level of disappointment."

Upon casting Teleport.Ornn_244: "A fight's where I want to be."
Upon casting Teleport.Ornn_249: "Hmm, this is fast, but it can't be good for you."

Upon Death.Ornn_209: "I didn't die, my forge missed me."
